name: Stranded Graveyard
description: Site of Grace found inside the Stranded Graveyard, just before the lift leading outside to The First Step.

name: White-Faced Varre (First Location)
description: White-Faced Varre, Location 1. Found right next to The First Step Site of Grace. Provides Lore info. You will encounter this NPC multiple times in different locations.

name: Merchant Kal
description: General Goods Vendor. Found sitting by the fire in the ruins of the Church of Elleh. Sells the Telescope and Crafting Kit key items.

name: Bloody Finger Hunter Yura (First Location)
description: First encounter with this NPC, warns you about the dragon in the nearby ruins.

name: Nomadic Merchant West Limgrave
description: General Goods vendor found southeast of the Coastal Cave entrance along the beach, sitting by a fire under a collapsed stone structure.

name: Flying Dragon Agheel
description: Fight at higher levels. Rewards a Dragon Heart you can use at the Church of Dragon Communion.

name: Agheel Lake North
description: Site of Grace found next to the main road east of the Gatefront Ruins.

name: Pumpkin Helm - x1 - WAYPOINT RUINS
description: Dropped when defeating Mad Pumpkin Head boss.

name: Fevor's Cookbook (1)
description: Found on a corpse on the graveyard south from Summonwater. Unlocks Sleep Pot Recipe.

name: Dragonfire
description: Incantation. Can be obtained by making a Dragon Heart offering at the altar found in the ruins of the Church of Dragon Communion.

name: Stormhill Shack
description: An important quest starts here! Make sure to visit to unlock Spirit Ash upgrades.

name: Stormhill Evergaol
description: Stormhill Evergaol is a round platform that can be easily found at the west of Stormhill.

name: Church of Dragon Communion
description: The ruins of a church where dragon rituals were performed. The most prominent sight here is the corpse of a large white dragon laying amongst the ruins. There is also an altar where you can obtain powerful Incantations in exchange for Dragon Heart offerings.

name: Dragon-Burnt Ruins
description: Located in the lake of Limgrave.

name: Coastal Cave
description: A dark and humid cavern home to the Demi-Human Chief boss. Must be completed to access the Church of Dragon Communion.

name: Church of Elleh
description: Ruins of an Old Church. There is a Merchant and a Smithing Table in the area.

name: Stormgate
description: The entrance to the Stormhill heavily guarded.

name: Finger Severer
description: Multiplayer Item. Found on a corpse by the wall just past the Site of Grace in the Stranded Graveyard. Found along with the Tarnished's Furled Finger.

name: Small Golden Effigy
description: Multiplayer Item. Found on the Summoning Pool a few steps west of The First Step Site of Grace.

name: Church of Elleh
description: Site of Grace found within the ruins of the Church of Elleh.

name: Soldier of Godrick
description: Optional Boss. Found within in the Stranded Graveyard if you jump down the pit into the Tutorial Area.

name: Whetstone Knife
description: Key Item. Found in the southeastern area of Gatefront Ruins. There is a set of stairs that leads to a small room with a treasure chest. This item is found alongside the Ash of War: Storm Stomp upgrade.

name: Lordsworn's Straight Sword
description: Straight Sword. Dropped by Noble soldiers in the Gatefront Ruins.

name: Boc the Seamster (First Location)
description: Location 1. Roaming around this location, you will hear someone call out. Look for a small group of trees and attack the small yellow tree to dispel the illusion and reveal Boc. Awards Mushroom x10 after speaking to him twice.

name: Beastman of Farum Azula (Groveside Cave)
description: Optional Boss. Found at the end of the Groveside Cave mini-dungeon. Drops the Flamedrake Talisman.

name: Ash of War: Stamp (Sweep)
description: Ash of War Upgrade. Found by defeating an invisible Teardrop Scarab roaming around the beach. You will see glowing footprints appearing in a set pattern around the area. Stand in front of its path and attack as it approaches you to reveal the creature.

name: Coastal Cave
description: Site of Grace found inside Coastal Cave, near the beginning.

name: Demi-Human Chief
description: Optional Boss. A duo of Demi-Human bosses found deep within the Coastal Cave. Required to defeat in order to access the Church of Dragon Communion location. Drops the Tailoring Tools and Sewing Needle key items upon defeat.

name: Groveside Cave
description: Site of Grace found inside the Groveside Cave, right before the boss fight.

name: Boc the Seamster (Second Location)
description: Boc the Seamster Location 2. After meeting him for the first time, Boc will move into the Coastal Cave. You will find him writhing on the ground next to the Site of Grace.

name: Dragonclaw
description: Incantation. Can be obtained by making a Dragon Heart offering at the altar found in the ruins of the Church of Dragon Communion.

name: Dragonmaw
description: Incantation. Can be obtained by making a Dragon Heart offering at the altar found in the ruins of the Church of Dragon Communion.

name: Church of Dragon Communion
description: Site of Grace just outside of the Church of Dragon Communion.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [1] - Church of Dragon Communion
description: Upgrade Material. Obtained by defeating a Teardrop Scarab in the cliffs behind the church.

name: Groveside Cave
description: Small cave north from Church of Elleh.

name: Gatefront Ruins
description: Heavily Guarded Area. A Map fragment, some weapons and hidden cellar offer notable loot.

name: Map (Limgrave, West)
description: At the foot of a pillar. Unlocks Western Limgrave on your map

name: Lordsworn's Greatsword
description: Greatsword. Found inside a Wagon Chest.

name: Gold-Pickled Fowl Foot
description: Near the waterfall, beware of the lurking skeletons

name: Land Octopus Ovary
description: Defeat Land Octopus to obtain.

name: Strip of White Flesh
description: Found on a dead body, sitting across a Soldier.

name: Twinblade
description: Underground. Can be found once you take the stairs down Dragon-Burnt Ruins.

name: Stonesword Key - Dragon-Burnt Ruins
description: Stoneword Key Found inside a small room, protected by a Rat.

name: The First Step
description: Site of Grace found just outside the Stranded Graveyard, named The First Step.

name: Cave of Knowledge
description: Site of grace located inside the Cave of Knowledge

name: Limgrave Tunnels
description: On the northern area of the Agheel Lake, you can find the rich Limgrave Tunnels

name: Limgrave Tunnels
description: Limgrave Tunnels Site of Grace, located just below the main elevator.

name: Large Glintstone Scrap
description: Accessed from Limgrave Tunnels. Underground. It can be found on a body, inside a little hut guarded by dogs.

name: Minor Erdtree (Mistwood)
description: A Minor Erdtree found in the Mistwood sub-region of Limgrave in the east.

name: Renna
description: Renna appears in the Church of Elleh after you get your horse from Melina. Gives the Spirit Calling Bell and Lone Wolf Ashes.

name: Spirit Calling Bell
description: Key Item. Given by Renna. Return to the church after getting your horse to find her sitting by the ruins.

name: Tailoring Tools
description: Key Item. Dropped by the Demi-Human Chief boss upon defeat.

name: Sewing Needle
description: Key Quest Item. Dropped by the Demi-Human Chief boss upon defeat. Return it to Boc the Seamster in the Coastal Cave to further his storyline.

name: Morning Star
description: Hammer-type Weapon. Found in a chest inside a broken wagon along the road.

name: Golden Rune [2] (A)
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse along the road.

name: Smithing Stone [2]
description: Upgrade Material. Found in a corpse in the middle of the road, near the group of enemies scavenging the broken cart.

name: Ash of War: Mighty Shot
description: Ash of War Upgrade. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found along the road as it slopes upwards.

name: Castle Morne Rampart
description: Site of Grace found near a campfire.

name: Nomadic Merchant Castle Morne Rampart
description: Nomadic Merchant. General Goods vendor found sitting by a campfire near the Castle Morne Rampart site of grace. Sells Stonesword Key

name: Castle Morne
description: Optional Dungeon. A large castle on the southern tip of the Weeping Peninsula. The Leonine Misbegotten boss can be found here.

name: Smithing Stone [2] A - Castle Morne
description: Upgrade Material. From the main courtyard entrance of Castle Morne, head up the steps on the left side to find the item on a corpse. Beware the skeletal dogs in the area.

name: Smithing Stone [1] - X3 CASTLE MORNE
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse in the left side at the back of Castle Morne's courtyard.

name: Ailing Village
description: A small, abandoned village inhabited only by its Frenzied Villagers.

name: Callu Baptismal Church
description: Church ruins found just south of Ailing Village. Inhabited by a lot of rats and one giant rat monster.

name: The Flame of Frenzy
description: Incantation. Found on a corpse by one of the pillars on the left side of the Callu Baptismal Church.

name: Sacred Tear (Callu Baptismal Church)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found on the ground in front of the altar at the Callu Baptismal Church.

name: Bridge of Sacrifice
description: A large stone bridge connecting Limgrave to the Weeping Peninsula. Lots of enemy soldiers and ballistae around.

name: Bridge of Sacrifice
description: Site of Grace found on the Weeping Peninsula end of the Bridge of Sacrifice.

name: Smithing Stone [1] - Bridge of Sacrifice
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse on the eastern edge of the Bridge of Sacrifice, near the middle section.

name: Stonesword Key  - Bridge of Sacrifice (Weeping Peninsula)
description: Stoneword Key Found on the ground by a wooden barricade at the southern end of the Bridge of Sacrifice.

name: Irina (First Location)
description: NPC found sitting on a rock at the beginning of the main road in eastern Weeping Peninsula. Hands you Irina's Letter and asks that you deliver it to her father at Castle Morne in the south.

name: Arteria Leaf
description: Rare Crafting Material. Found on a corpse sitting on a chair at the beach. Guarded by 4 Spirit Jellyfish.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (2)
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse, fallen with its chair at the beach. Guarded by 4 Spirit Jellyfish.

name: Poison Mist
description: Incantation. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the forested area.

name: Castle Morne Lift
description: Site of Grace found at the entrance of Castle Morne, before ascending the lift.

name: Earthbore Cave
description: A small dark cave on the side of the cliffside between Limgrave and Weeping Peninsula.

name: Impaler's Catacombs
description: Mini-dungeon. The entrance can be found by following the cliffside on the eastern edge of Weeping Peninsula.

name: Stonedigger Troll (Limgrave)
description: Optional Boss. Found at the end of Limgrave Tunnels. Drops Roar Medallion

name: Trina's Lily
description: x3 Trina's Lily under the giant ruined structure. Beware of the Giant Crab guarding them.

name: Crab Eggs
description: Found on a body located on the edge. Beware of the small skeleton army you have to face before.

name: Seaside Ruins
description: Site of grace located in the wilderness.

name: Trina's Lily
description: Drop down the Site of Grace to the lower platform, you will find it being guarded by a white wolf.

name: Earthbore Cave
description: Site of Grace found inside the Earthbore Cave, near the entrance.

name: Runebear
description: Optional Miniboss. Found in the lower level of Earthbore Cave after leaping down into a hole near the end. Drops the Spelldrake Talismanupon defeat.

name: Spelldrake Talisman
description: Talisman. Acquired by defeating the Runebear boss inside Earthbore Cave.

name: Rainbow Stone (B)
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse among some sacks and wooden objects.

name: Ash of War: Gravitas
description: Looted from a Slender Wayfarer that uses the Gravitas skill as one of its attacks when it fights. You can find the enemy roaming by the beach side at the stone arch that has a bonfire, near the Seaside Ruins Site of Grace.

name: South of the Lookout Tower
description: Site of Grace found directly south of the Forest Lookout Tower.

name: Church of Pilgrimage
description: Church ruins found atop cliffs in the northern section of Weeping Peninsula.

name: Church of Pilgrimage
description: Site of Grace found at the Church of Pilgrimage.

name: Sacred Tear (Church of Pilgrimage)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found on the ground in front of the altar at the Church of Pilgrimage.

name: Gilded Iron Shield
description: Shield. Found on a corpse sitting on a grave in the graveyard.

name: Blood Grease
description: Consumable Item. Two can be found by a grave with a wooden pole next to it.

name: Tombsward Catacombs
description: A hidden mini-dungeon. The entrance can be found behind a leaning pillar on the side of the mountain.

name: Tombsward Catacombs
description: Site of Grace found inside the Tombsward Catacombs, a few steps from the entrance.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [9]
description: Cookbook item. Found inside the Tombsward Catacombs, locked behind an imp statue barrier. Requires a Stonesword Key to break the seal.

name: Lump of Flesh
description: can be looted from a corpse by the beachside near the Seaside Ruins Site of Grace in south of Limgrave. The corpse is being guarded by a Giant Crab.

name: Prattling Pate (Thank You)
description: Reusable Item. Obtained inside the Tombsward Catacombs. Found on a corpse at the end of the main path, past the flamethrowing pillar.

name: Haligdrake Talisman
description: Talisman. Drop down from the cliff near the Seaside Ruins site of grace. Explore the lower area and between fallen columns, there is a small entrance. Enter and take the path until you fing a hanging body.There you will find the Haligdrake Talisman - this is the unreachable item seen in the Cave of Knowledge starting tutorial

name: Golden Seed (F)
description: Golden Seeds allow the user to upgrade the number of Crimson and Cerulean Flask Uses, but not the amount of Wondrous Physik flasks available.

name: Roar Medallion
description: Dropped by  Stonedigger Troll. Located in Limgrave Tunnels.

name: Golden Rune (1) - x1 Dragon-Burnt Ruins
description: Over a big stone, where some bats are nesting. Defeat them to loot the body.

name: Recusant Henricus
description: Hostile invader equipping a maze and wearing full body armor.

name: Arteria Leaf
description: Near the area of the Flying Dragon Agheel. It is surrounded by Poison Pods, against a tomb.

name: Stonesword Key - Stormhill Shack
description: Stoneword Key found at Stormhill Shack next to the Site of Grace.

name: Hammer Talisman
description: Enhances stamina-reducing attacks against blockers.

name: Stormhill Shack
description: Site of Grace found right next to Stormhill Shack..

name: Ash of War: Unsheathe
description: Can be obtained from a Teardrop Scarab located in the water. Beware of the Giant Crab nearby.

name: Agheel Lake South
description: Site of Grace located over a rocky terrain, near a herd of Sheep.

name: Starlight Shards - Southern Limgrave
description: Starlight Shards: Do a Spiritspring Jumping, and keep jumping until you reach the top.You will find the item over a cup-like monument, on the edge.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy A
description: Reveals co-op and hostile summoning. Dropped by Recusant Henricus when invading.

name: Brass Shield
description: Found southeast of the map in Limgrave. Head southeast from the Agheel Lake South site of grace, head to the top of a cliff and you'll see a statue of an object that looks like the half piece of a bowl or a circle. Face the other way, to see a Knight. Defeat it to obtain a Brass Shield.

name: Royal House Scroll
description: Head southeast from the Agheel Lake South site of grace, head to the top of a cliff and you'll see a statue of an object that looks like the half piece of a bowl or a circle. Face the other way, to see a Knight. Keep going to a structure to see a man standing watching over the big structure, alongside a dead body. In that body, you will find the Royal House Scroll.

name: Roderika
description: In Stormhill Shack there's a Woman with a Red Hood. She is Roderika and has a quest for the player that unlocks Spirit Ash upgrades

name: Great Epee
description: Head southeast from the Agheel Lake South site of grace, head to the top of a cliff and you'll see a statue of an object that looks like the half piece of a bowl or a circle. Face the other way, and get down, you will find a group of enemies. The Great Epee is inside a chest. on the right side.

name: Waypoint Ruins
description: Waypoint Ruins consists of a group of broken buildings and abandoned campsites, now overrun with poisonous flowers and their crazed caretaker.

name: Ash of War: Determination
description: It drops from a Teardrop Scarab, north of Agheel Lake, near a group of soldiers.

name: Frustrated Spirit
description: Laying down on the floor, next to the remains of a burnt pillage.

name: Duelist's Furled Finger
description: Creates competitive multiplayer summon sign.

name: Small Red Effigy
description: Sends competitive sign to summoning pool.

name: Starlight Shards B
description: Starlight Shards: Found at the very west of Stormhill at the edge of the Cliff on a stone monument.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (1) a
description: Located on the field, on a dead body sitting on a chair.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (1)
description: As a drop when defeating a Teardrop Scarab at the top of a ruined building.

name: Arrow's Reach Talisman
description: Found in a chest inside the Tower above Stormgate that can be accessed going all around it.

name: Mad Pumpkin Head (Waypoint Ruins)
description: Field Boss. Found directly below the Waypoint Ruins.

name: Sorceress Sellen (First Location)
description: Considered a witch and exiled member of the Raya Lucaria Academy, Sorceress Sellen sells Sorceries.

name: Ash of War: Golden Vow
description: Ash of War: Golden Vow provides Sacred affinity and the Golden Vow Skill. Dropped upon defeating Mounted Knight.

name: Waypoint Ruins Cellar
description: Site of grace in the cellar of the Waypoint Ruins.

name: Beast Crest Heater Shield
description: A large shield kept inside a chest at a camp.

name: Erdtree Avatar
description: Miniboss found guarding the Erdtree. Drops the Opaline Bubbletear and Crimsonburst Crystal Tear upon defeat.

name: Immunizing Cured Meat
description: Found in the small group of Poison Flowers in the outskirts of the Waypoint Ruins.

name: Opaline Bubbletear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar boss upon defeat.

name: Crimsonburst Crystal Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar boss upon defeat.

name: Golden Rune [6] (A)
description: Consumable item. Dropped by an elite singing Bat enemy found along the cliffs south of the Minor Erdtree. You can hear the bat singing as you approach the cliffs. He is guarded by other Giant Bats.

name: Forest Lookout Tower
description: Easily found not very far from the bridge.

name: Sliver of Meat
description: Crafting Material. Found on a corpse where a singing Bat is sitting.

name: Lightning Strike
description: Incantation. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the lower section of the crevasse. When approaching from either the eastern or western cliffs, look for stone platforms jutting out of the cliffside to safely descend to the area. Beware as the area is constantly being pummeled by lightning and there are several Giant bats guarding the scarab as well.

name: Great Turtle Shell
description: Small Shield. Found on a corpse atop the eastern-most tower of the Castle Morne Ramparts. This area can be reached by using Torrent to jump from the Spiritspring located just east of the Site of Grace nearby.

name: Night's Cavalry (Weeping Peninsula)
description: Night's Cavalry Miniboss found patrolling the roads around the Castle Morne Ramparts. Only appears at night. Drops Ash of War: Barricade Shield

name: Warming Stone
description: Consumable Item. 2 can be found on a corpse atop the eastern-most tower of the Castle Morne Ramparts. This area can be reached by using Torrent to jump from the Spiritspring located just east of the Site of Grace nearby.

name: Beside the Crater-Pocked Glade
description: Site of Grace found near a forested area.

name: Oridys's Rise
description: Lookout Tower. Initially sealed by a barrier. Inspecting the statue at the entrance, you are asked to "seek three wise beasts". These can be found as Ghostly Tortoises that you need to attack. The first is just a few steps directly to the north, opposite the entrance. There is another one hiding in the bushes left of the steps leading up to the tower. The last one is found in a pond slightly west of the tower and is invisible until struck. Attack near the center of the pond to reveal the Tortoise. Once all three have been defeated, the tower's seal is broken.

name: Memory Stone - Oridys's Rise
description: Memory Upgrade Material. Found in a chest at the top floor of Oridys's Rise.

name: Demi-human Forest Ruins
description: Demi-Humans congregate here to worship their queen. Defeating her will reward players with the Demi-Human Queen's Staff, which is excellent for beginner mages.

name: Stonesword Key - North East Weeping Peninsula
description: Stonesword Key. Found on a corpse sitting in a chair at the northern edge of the plateau, overlooking the sea.

name: Impaler's Catacombs
description: Site of Grace found within the Impaler's Catacombs, near the entrance.

name: Imp Head (Cat)
description: Helm. Found on a corpse inside the Impaler's Catacombs.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [4]
description: Cookbook item. Obtained in the south of Mistwood. Found on a corpse at the side of the road close to the Siofra River Well.

name: Third Church of Marika
description: The Ruins of an Old Church found in the Mistwood. The most prominent sight here is a statue of a lady with her arms outstretched.

name: Spiked Cracked Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Found on an altar next to the Minor Erdtree in Mistwood.

name: Greenspill Crystal Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Found on an altar next to the Minor Erdtree in Mistwood.

name: Golden Rune [2] - X1 CASTLE MORNE
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse partially hanging on a ledge at the top level of the castle. Beware the harpies nearby.

name: Smithing Stone [2] B - Castle Morne
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse being chopped up by a Misbegotten.

name: Behind the Castle
description: Site of Grace found by taking the ladder at the back of the main courtyard to the top level. Follow the path ahead, past the harpies and then drop down the broken section of the wall on the right.

name: Stonesword Key - Castle Morne
description: Stonesword Key. Found on a corpse partially hanging from a wooden platform. The platform can be found by walking down west from the nearby Site of Grace and back onto a section of the castle. Look to the left edge.

name: Pickled Turtle Neck (B) x1 - Castle Morne
description: Consumable Item. Found on a corpse in a small room with a caged ghost. Beware of the Skeletal Slime that drops from the ceiling when you collect this.

name: Twinblade Talisman
description: Talisman. Found in the tower section of the walls of Castle Morne. Climb up the ladder and go around the tower to find a chest containing the talisman.

name: Beside the Rampart Gaol
description: Site of Grace found at the back of the castle, at the lower level.

name: Whip
description: Whip. Found on a corpse inside the building known as the Rampart Gaol. This building is first accessed by walking atop the western wall of the castle. Look to the left for a building with a blue roof. Jump onto this roof and then jump down to the cliffs below. Follow the cliffs southeast until you return to a section of the castle with a big square opening. Descend into the opening by landing on the wooden beams. There is a corpse with a Smithing Stone [2] on one of the beams and there are several Rats and a Harpy at the ground level. The corpse with the whip is sitting against a wall.

name: Stillwater Cave
description: A dark and murky water, poisonous cave. Infested with Giant Bats and large Poison Flowers.

name: Lake-Facing Cliffs
description: Site of grace facing the vast lake

name: Leonine Misbegotten
description: Optional Greater Enemy Boss. Can be found by heading southeast from the "Beside the Rampart Gaol" Site of Grace, through the wooden bridge and down a ladder onto the shores below. Drops the Grafted Blade Greatsword upon defeat.

name: Grafted Blade Greatsword
description: Greatsword. Dropped by Leonine Misbegotten upon defeat.

name: Morne Moangrave
description: Site of Grace accessible after defeating the Leonine Misbegotten boss.

name: Cuckoo Glintstone - Purified Ruins
description: Found on a dead body, against a wall. Beware of the group of Soldiers.

name: Shabriri Grape - Purified Ruins
description: Can be found in a hidden cellar. The path is blocked by debris and barrels that you can roll onto or attack to destroy. Once downstairs, you can find it on your left.

name: Two Fingers Heirloom
description: Talisman. Found in a chest inside a hidden cellar in the Purified Ruins. The cellar entrance is concealed by wooden planks and barrels that you can roll onto or attack to destroy.

name: Claymore
description: Greatsword. From the main courtyard entrance, hug the right wall past the burning corpses and harpies to reach the entrance to the building in the north. The sword is found in a chest to the left as you enter.

name: Purified Ruins Waygate
description: Leads to the entrance of the Academy

name: Ash of War: Ground Slam
description: Ash of War Upgrade. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found rolling down the hill west of the Minor Erdtree in Mistwood.

name: South Raya Lucaria Gate
description: Site of grace at the entrance of the Raya Academy.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy - X1 CASTLE MORNE
description: Multiplayer Item. Found on a corpse to the right of the gallows on the top level on the castle. This area is accessed by hugging the right wall from the main courtyard area, past the burning corpses and harpies and then following the linear path to reach the roof.

name: Smithing Stone (1) a
description: A Smithing Stone found on top of a corpse that lays on the ground. Found together with 3 other dead bodies and a rounded group of chairs.

name: Meeting Place Map
description: Can be found at the entrace of the Raya Lucarian academy, on lying corpse.

name: Steel-Wire Torch
description: Torch. Found on a corpse at the end of a narrow path at the top level of the castle. Guarded by two harpies.

name: Fire Grease - X2 CASTLE MORNE
description: Consumable. 2 can be found on a corpse near the the burning pile of corpses in the courtyard.

name: Mistwood Ruins
description: An old ruin occupied by a Lesser Runebear. The site is home to a few prized Trina's Lilies.

name: Blue-White Wooden Shield
description: Can be found on the outskirts of the buildings, towards the west side.

name: Smithing Stone (1) B
description: Found together with a Smithing Stone [2] inside a stone statue surrounded by trolls.The creatures can be manipulated into hitting and cracking the sculpture open in order to grab the Stones.

name: Smithing Stone (2) B
description: Found together with a Smithing Stone [1] inside a stone statue surrounded by trolls.The creatures can be manipulated into hitting and cracking the sculpture open in order to grab the Stones.

name: Forlorn Hound Evergaol
description: An Evergaol on Southern Limgrave. This location does not allow use of Spirit Ashes or Summons.

name: Smithing Stone [2] - Mistwood Ruins
description: Upgrade Material. Found in a chest in the center of the Mistwood Ruins.

name: Divine Tower of Limgrave
description: Site of grace near the Tower of Limgrave

name: Axe Talisman
description: Talisman. Found in a cellar underneath the Mistwood Ruins.

name: Fort Haight
description: A Fort by the coast. Heavily guarded by knights and invested with Rats. Once cleared, many treasures can be found here.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [6]
description: Cookbook item. Can be looted from the chest in the room at the top of the main stairs of Fort Haight.

name: Iron Fist Alexander (First Location)
description: Alexander, a huge cauldron with arms and legs, is stuck on the ground and needs help.

name: Smithing Stone [1] - Fort Haight
description: Upgrade Material. Found by looting a corpse on the battlements of Fort Haight.

name: Dectus Medallion (Left)
description: Key Quest Item. Found in a chest that can be reached by climbing the ladder in the tallest tower of Fort Haight.

name: Mistwood Outskirts
description: Site of Grace situated next to the main road North of Mistwood Ruins, in the middle of a group of large stones.

name: Stormfoot Catacombs
description: A deep catacomb littered with fire traps and creatures.

name: Grave Glovewort [1] - 5x Stormfoot Catacombs
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. The first one is found by a sarcophagus in the room with the boss door. The second one is found in the next room, behind a pillar near the entrance to the narrow corridor. The third is found after climbing the ladder in the hallway where the second flamethrower pillar is. The fourth is found in a room west of where you got the third one. The final one is found to the left of the boss' door's lever.

name: Map (Limgrave, East)
description: At the foot of a pillar with ancient writings on it. Unlocks Eastern Limgrave on your map.

name: Tombsward Ruins
description: The ruins of a former burial ground.

name: Erdtree Burial Watchdog (Stormfoot Catacombs)
description: Optional Boss found at the end of Stormfoot Catacombs. Drops Noble Sorcerer Ashes upon defeat.

name: Divine Fortification
description: Incantation. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found atop a collapsed stone structure overgrown with yellow moss.

name: Third Church of Marika
description: Site of Grace located at Third Church of Marika, an antique building in ruins featuring a large statue of a woman with her arms wide open.

name: Flask of Wondrous Physick
description: Laying on the ground in front of the statue. Bestows various special effects.

name: Crimson Crystal Tear
description: A crystal mixed to enhance the effects of the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Located in front of the statue in Third Church of Marika.

name: Smithing Stone (2)
description: Upgrade Material. Found in a corpse at the bottom of a cliff. The site is full of Wolves fighting a huge Lesser Runebear.

name: Ash of War: Sacred Blade
description: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab, situated next to a noticeable whirlwind.

name: Finger Reader (Collapsed Bridge)
description: She is sitting on at table at the start of the collapsed bridge.

name: Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon
description: One of the demigods. She can be fought at the top of Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook (7)
description: It can be taken from a dead man sitting at the edge of the collapsed bridge.

name: Ash of War: Storm Wall
description: Find a Teardrop Scarab, defeat it to obtain the Ash of War.

name: Sacred Tear (Third Church of Marika)
description: Allows the user to upgrade the Crimson and Cerulean Flask Potency. Located on the ground in front of the statue in Third Church of Marika.

name: Academy Scroll
description: Key Item. Give to a mage to unlock more sorceries. It's by one of the big gravestones where the Skeleton Mages are rising.

name: Church of Irith
description: A church found behind the walls of Stormveil Castle. Easily accessible by riding west along the walls.

name: Church of Vows
description: Church of Vows is a forgotten church guarded by Miriel, Pastor of Vows.

name: Sending Gate (Bestial Sanctum)
description: Teleporter to the Bestial Sanctum in Caelid. See D, Hunter of the Dead for details.

name: Miriel, Pastor of Vows
description: Miriel is the steward of Church of Vows.

name: Ash of War: Bloody Slash
description: Ash of War Upgrade. Dropped by a Beast Crest Heater Knight fought at the top of the ramparts of Fort Haight.

name: Erdsteel Dagger
description: Dagger. Rewarded by Kenneth Haight for clearing out Fort Haight.

name: Golden Seed - Fort Haight
description: Flask Upgrade. Found right in front of the entrance to Fort Haight.

name: War Counselor Iji
description: Blacksmith - sells Upgrade Materials such as Somber Smithing Stone [1] through [4].

name: Siofra River Well
description: A cylindrical structure that takes players underground to the southern section of the Siofra River.

name: Gold Sewing Needle
description: Sewing needle made of gold.Unique item made to alter demigod attire.Located inside a chest at the right of Church of Vows' main entrance.

name: Golden Tailoring Tools
description: Tools made of gold brought with the red-haired Radagon when he married into the Carian line.Located inside a chest at the right of Church of Vows' main entrance.

name: Golden Rune [1] B
description: Found on the ground East of Church of Vows.

name: Nomadic Merchant East Limgrave
description: Nomadic Merchant. General Goods vendor found sitting by a campfire next to the road between Mistwood Ruins and Fort Haight.

name: Weeping Evergaol
description: Evergaol imprisoning the Ancient Hero of Zamor boss. Requires a Stonesword Key to unlock the portal mechanism.

name: Fourth Church of Marika
description: An abandoned church on a plateau in the western landmass of the peninsula.

name: Sacred Tear (Fourth Church of Marika)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found on the ground in front of the altar at the Fourth Church of Marika.

name: Fourth Church of Marika
description: Site of Grace found within the Fourth Church of Marika.

name: Tombsward
description: Site of Grace found west of the Minor Erdtree, at the base of the plateau.

name: Tower of Return
description: Dilapidated tower found near the edge of the landmass. Beware the mounted knight and foot soldiers nearby. There is a Transporter Chest at the very top.

name: Teleporter Chest to Leyndell
description: Teleporter Chest. Found atop the Tower of Return. Transports you to Leyndell, Royal Capital upon opening.

name: Isolated Merchant's Shack (Weeping Peninsula)
description: Site of Grace outside the Isolated Merchant's Shack.

name: Isolated Merchant's Shack (Weeping Peninsula)
description: A wooden hut far to the west of the Weeping Peninsula.

name: Isolated Merchant
description: General Goods vendor found sitting in his shack. Sells the Lantern and Lost Ashes of War, among other useful items.

name: Night's Cavalry (Limgrave)
description: Night's Cavalry roams the bridge near Agheel Lake North, only appears at night. Drops Ash of War: Repeating Thrust

name: Witchbane Ruins
description: Ruins found south of the Fourth Church of Marika. Teeming with hostiles.

name: Ancient Hero of Zamor
description: Optional Boss imprisoned within the Weeping Evergaol.

name: Church of Vows
description: Church of Vows Site of Grace. Located at Church of Vows prior to the main entrance.

name: Kenneth Haight (First Location)
description: Kenneth Haight is first encountered at this spot. He is seen dramatically calling out for someone to aid him in his plight.

name: Smithing Stone (1)
description: At the side of the bridge, on a body.

name: Saintsbridge
description: Site of grace, located just at the tip of the bridge

name: Deathtouched Catacombs
description: Located west of Saintsbridge, a door with a grieving spirit beside it.

name: Deathtouched Catacombs
description: Site of grace just inside Deathtouched Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort [1] - 5x Deathtouched Catacombs
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. The first one is located in the first large room left of the boss' door, right in front of the stairs. The second one is an alcove under the stairs in the same room. The third is found by going through the very narrow corridor adjacent to the stairs in the same room. The fourth one is found by going through the doorway south of where you collected the previous one, sitting on an L-shaped ledge. The fifth one is found by dropping down from where you collected the fourth.

name: Bloodrose - Deathtouched Catacombs
description: Can be found inside the Deathtouched Catacombs. On a body, against a wall, past a big hall with many Skeletons.

name: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [1]
description: Dropped by one of the Nobles in that enemy outpost.

name: Thops
description: Tops is a former student of the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Teaches basic Sorceries, and will move if you give him a Glintstone Academy Key.

name: Boc the Seamster (Third Location)
description: Boc the Seamster Location 3. After meeting him for the second time, Boc will move to Liurnia of the Lakes. Find him kneeling by the Lake-Facing Site of Grace, a cliff above to the entrance to Stillwater Cave.

name: Uchigatana
description: Found inside the Deathtouched Catacombs. It is in a body, hanging from the upper platform. You need to use the lever in order to reach that room. Beware of the Skeleton Archers.

name: Black Knife Assassin
description: Field Boss. Can be found inside the Deathtouched Catacombs. Drops Assassin's Crimson Dagger.

name: Assassin's Crimson Dagger
description: Dropped by Black Knife Assassin, found inside Deathtouched Catacombs.

name: Hyetta (First Location)
description: Hyetta, Location 1.Hyetta roams The Lands Between in search of the distant light, drawn to her destiny by a guiding shine she feels in the back of her eyes when eating Shabriri grapes.

name: Deathroot - Deathtouched Catacombs
description: Inside Deathtouched Catacombs. Found on a chest behind the Black Knife Assassin.

name: Stormveil Castle
description: The first Legacy Dungeon of Elden Ring. Recommended level 30+ and Weapons +4. The stronghold of Godrick the Grafted. Other Bosses include Many Armed Key Master and Lion Guardian.

name: Divine Tower of Limgrave
description: Accessible only from Stormveil Castle, this location allows the player to activate the power of Godrick's Great Rune.

name: Stormveil Main Gate
description: Site of Grace found right by the castle's southern gate.

name: Smithing Stone [2] A - Stormveil Castle
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse on the outside of the castle walls. Reachable by climbing on broken sections nearby.

name: Golden Rune (6) - Stillwater Cave
description: Found on a dead body, inside Stillwater Cave.

name: Smithing Stone [3] A - Stormveil Castle
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse around the southwestern cliffs. Watch out for the Bladed Talon Eagles roosting in the area.

name: Golden Rune (5) - Stillwater Cave
description: Found on a dead body, inside Stillwater Cave. In the same room as the Golden Rune (6).

name: Stormveil Cliffside
description: Site of Grace found on the cliffs outside the castle walls in the southwest. There is a Summoning Pool nearby.

name: Rampart Tower
description: Site of grace located at the Rampart Tower of the Stormveil Castle.

name: Marred Leather Shield
description: Shield. Found on a corpse on a wooden platform, outside the castle walls.

name: Claw Talisman
description: Talisman. Found on a corpse atop a tower accessible by ladder. The tower has several none-hostile Eagles at the top.

name: Hookclaws
description: Claw weapon. Found on a corpse in the corner of a small corridor on the first level of the wine cellar, filled with crates and patrolled by a single Castle Guard.

name: Rusty Key
description: Key Item. Found on a corpse inside the room with the Banished Knight.

name: Golden Rune (3) - Purified Ruins
description: Found in the Purified Ruins. On a body, against a few barrels in a narrow corridor.

name: Curved Sword Talisman
description: Talisman. Found in a chest inside a dark room in the Wine Cellar with the Banished Knight.

name: Stonesword Key (A) - Stormveil Castle
description: Stonesword Key. Found on a corpse inside a building section with a broken roof. Accessed from the very top of the Rampart Tower with careful platforming.

name: Dozing Cross-Legged
description: Gesture. Found on a corpse on the largest roof in the area. Accessible from the top floor of the Rampart Tower with careful platforming.

name: Hawk Crest Wooden Shield
description: Medium Shield. Found on a corpse inside the Armory. Requires a Stonesword Key to dispel the fog gate barring entry.

name: Misericorde
description: Dagger. Found on a corpse inside the Armory. Requires a Stonesword Key in order to dispel the fog gate barring entry.

name: Iron Whetblade
description: Key Item. Found on a corpse inside the Armory. Requires a Stonesword Key in order to dispel the fog gate barring entry.

name: Finger Reader (Academy Bridge)
description: Palm Reader. Can be found at the edge of the broken bridge that leads to the Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Chrysalids' Memento
description: Key Quest Item. Found on top of the pile of corpses surrounded by Rotten Strays in a small room. This room is adjacent to the Grafted Scion's hall.

name: Wooden Greatshield
description: Greatshield. Found in a guardhouse near the northern section of the castle courtyard.

name: Map: Liurnia, North
description: Can be found over a grave-like big stone, at Academy Gate Town,

name: Academy Gate Town (Sites of Grace)
description: Site of grace in the deluged part of the academy town.

name: Ash of War: Stormcaller
description: Ash of War Upgrade. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the northern section of the castle.

name: Academy Gate Town
description: A sunken town, now crawling with soldiers and all kinds of powerful sea creatures.

name: Secluded Cell
description: Site of Grace in the northern section of the castle. Found next to a fog gate leading to Godrick the Grafted.

name: Golden Rune (6)a
description: You will spot a ballon, that has some enemies attached to it. Defeat all of them and destroy the ballon to obtain the Golden Rune.

name: Strip of White Flesh
description: Can be found in the back of the bridge. Beware of the Infested pods lurking there.

name: Silver-Pickled Fowl Foot
description: One can be found at the northern side of the broken bridge that leads to Raya Lucaria Academy

name: Smithing Stone (2)b
description: Upgrade Material. Found inside a gazebo.

name: Folly on the Lake
description: Site of Grace inside a gazebo, in the southwestern side of the lake.

name: Smithing Stone (2) D
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse being eaten by crabs under a large tree.

name: Smithing Stone (2)
description: Upgrade Material. 3 can be found Inside a gazebo.

name: Temple Quarter
description: Located at the Southwestern of the Raya Lucaria Academy, the Temple Quarter isn't what it used to be in its glory.

name: Academy Crystal Cave
description: Site of grace located inside a cave. Need to use a Stonesword Key in order to access it.

name: Academy Crystal Cave
description: A cave located east of the Academy. Requires a Stonesword Key in order to unlock the seal. Grants passage to the Academy.

name: Cuckoo Glintstone - Academy Crystal Cave
description: Inside the Academy Crystal Cave. On the room full of Sages, turn to the right. It is against the wall.

name: Stonesword Key - Academy Crystal Cave
description: Found inside the Academy Crystal Cave. Head to the left to where the Sages are, and enter the next room. You will find it inside a cage.

name: Rune Arc - Academy Crystal Cave
description: Found inside the Academy Crystal Cave. Enter the room protected by a Great Sage, open the chest to find the Rune Arc.

name: Crystalians
description: Duo Field Bosses. Found at the end of the Academy Crystal Cave. Drops the Crystal Release sorcery spell upon defeat.

name: Terra Magicus
description: Sorcery. Found at the top of a tower in the middle of the Raya Lucaria Academy. This area is accessed by completing the Academy Crystal Cave dungeon and taking the lift behind the boss' door.

name: Church of the Cuckoo
description: Site of Grace at the hall to the right of the altar.

name: Main Academy Gate
description: Site of grace at the main entrance to Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Grave Violet
description: Found at the graves.

name: Shabriri Grape - Stormveil Castle
description: Key Item. Found next to a ghostly NPC in the underground section of Godrick's throne room.

name: Flame, Cleanse Me
description: Held by one of the corpses at the Fire Monk camp.

name: 2x Smoldering Butterfly
description: 2 Smoldering Butterflies scattered among the corpses in the Fire Monk camp.

name: Kenneth Haight (Second Location)
description: Kenneth Haight will move to this location after you clear our Fort Haight. He can be found up on the battlements where you fought the Beast Crest Heater Knight.

name: Nomadic Merchant North Limgrave
description: Nomadic Merchant. General Goods vendor found playing music by a campfire east of the bridge connecting Stormhill and East Limgrave.

name: Golden Seed (A) - Stormveil Castle
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found next to a Phantom Tree in the northeastern section of the castle, behind the courtyard. This tree is outside the cellar where you meet Nepheli Loux.

name: Nepheli Loux (First Location)
description: Nepheli Loux Location 1. A fellow Tarnished warrior NPC found in a small room near the north of the castle. The entrance to this room is behind the courtyard, along the path leading up to the huge steps guarded by a Troll.

name: D, Hunter of the Dead
description: D can be found mourning a person dead at his feet. Here, he will warn you against going any further east towards Summonwater Village.

name: Smithing Stone [1] B - Stormveil Castle
description: Upgrade Material. 4 can be found on a corpse in the same room where Nepheli Loux is.

name: Omen Cleaver
description: Curved Greatsword. Dropped by the Omen enemy in the northwest section of the courtyard. It is advised to take out all of the lesser enemies nearby before taking on the ogre.

name: Summonwater Village
description: The flooded remains of a dilapidated village. Here you will find the Tibia Mariner boss.

name: Prophecy Painting
description: Info Item. Found by inspecting the large painting inside a building in the northwest section of the main courtyard.

name: Limgrave Tower Bridge
description: Site of Grace found near the eastern bridge.

name: Boltdrake Talisman
description: Talisman. Found on a corpse sitting against a tall brazier.

name: Smithing Stone [1] - Summonwater Village
description: Upgrade Material. Found among the flooded gravestones surrounding Summonwater Village.

name: Gateside Chamber
description: Site of Grace found through an archway accessible from within the castle walls. There is a lever in this chamber that opens up the castle's main gate.

name: Commoner's Simple Garb
description: Chest Armor. Found on a corpse on the balcony accessible from the Gateside Chamber Site of Grace.

name: Tibia Mariner (Limgrave)
description: Optional Boss. Found riding its boat in the flooded areas of Summonwater Village. Defeat it to progress D's questline.

name: Smithing Stone [2] B - Stormveil Castle
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse on an upper platform where Castle Guards are mounted on ballistae.

name: Smithing Stone [1] A - Stormveil Castle
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse by a staircase leading to a platform with ballistae emplacements.

name: Green Turtle Talisman
description: Talisman. Found in an underground area filled with Turtles. The entrance is found slightly south-east of Summonwater Village and requires 1 Stonesword Key to unlock.

name: Mimic's Veil
description: Reusable Key Item. Found in a chest inside the assembly room with the large war table. There is a Banished Knight in this room.

name: Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater A
description: Hostile invader with cloth armor and a curved greatsword equipped. Invades when you first approach the Smoldering Church.

name: Grafted Scion
description: Optional Miniboss. Patrols the main hall of his fortress. No special drops.

name: Highland Axe
description: Axe. Found in the same hall as the Grafted Scion miniboss, under a large painting.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy C
description: Multiplayer Item. Dropped by invader Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater when defeated.

name: Sacred Scorpion Charm
description: Talisman. Dropped by invader Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater when defeated.

name: Smoldering Church
description: The remains of an old church glowing with red embers. Houses a Site of Grace for weary travelers.

name: Smoldering Church
description: Site of Grace located at the far side of the Smoldering Church.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [14]
description: Cookbook item. Found on one of the two corpses in the Smoldering Church.

name: Missionary's Cookbook (3)
description: Cookbook item. Found on one of the two corpses in the Smoldering Church.

name: Map (Liurnia, East)
description: It's in the middle of the swampy lake, by a monument that has highlightened texts over it.

name: Golden Rune (1) - South Liurnia of the Lakes
description: At the edge of the lake on the ground.

name: Erdtree Avatar (Liurnia Southwest)
description: Field Boss. Drops Cerulean Crystal Tear and Ruptured Crystal Tear

name: Ash of War: Vow of the Indomitable
description: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab, in the southwestern swampy area.

name: Crystal Sword
description: Can be found at Village of the Albinaurics. Past the well and the wooden bridge, on a body near the edge.

name: Dexterity-knot Crystal Tear
description: Physick Flask Material. Found inside a stone receptacle on top of a craggy hill.

name: Ivory Sickle
description: Can be found at the Village of the Albinaurics.It is up a small hill, behind some small houses.

name: Larval Tear - Village of the Albinaurics
description: Key Item. Can be found at the graveyard in the Village of the Albinaurics, near the town well.

name: Omenkiller
description: Field Boss.Found at the Village of the Albinaurics. Drops Crucible Knot Talisman

name: Rune Arc - Village of the Albinaurics
description: After fighting Omenkiller, turn to the right and you will find it at the end of the path, on a body.

name: Village of the Albinaurics
description: An abandoned Village.

name: Village of the Albinaurics (Site of Grace)
description: Site of Grace for the Village of Albinaurics

name: Cerulean Crystal Tear A
description: Dropped by Erdtree Avatar.

name: Ruptured Crystal Tear
description: Dropped by Erdtree Avatar.

name: Converted Tower (Site of Grace)
description: Site of grace by the Converted Tower.

name: Converted Tower
description: An abandoned tower, with a few secrets to loot.

name: Ash of War: Sword Dance
description: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found along the narrow path west of the Minor Erdtree.

name: Road's End Catacombs
description: A tomb found at the end of a narrow path below the western edge of the plateau that the Minor Erdtree is sitting on.

name: Road's End Catacombs (Site of Grace)
description: Site of grace located just inside the Road's End Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort [3] - 4x Road's End Catacombs
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. A total of 4 are found inside the dungeon. 1) In the room with the boss' door lever, drop down one level to find it on the floor. 2) Just a few steps from the first. 3) In the same room, drop down to the bottom most level and hit the wall under the arch in the back, closest to the stairs to reveal a hidden room. 4) In the next room to the east, near the back.

name: Raya Lucaria Soldier Ashes
description: Found inside a chest at the end of the Road's End Catacombs. Hit the final wall to dispel the illusion, allowing you to move on. Beware of the many Imps in the final room.

name: Bellum Church
description: Located past the ruins and the forested area guarded by Mounted Knights.

name: Bellum Church (Site of Grace)
description: Right outside the entrance to Bellum Church

name: Glintstone Sorcerer Ashes
description: Inside Road's End Catacombs. Defeat the  Spirit-Caller Snail to obtain.

name: Rune Arc - Road's End Catacombs
description: Consumable. In the room with the boss' door lever, drop down one level and hit the wall under the arch in the back, closest to the stairs to reveal a hidden corridor. The Rune Arc is found on a corpse on the right.

name: Drawstring Lightning Grease
description: Consumable Item. Two can be found on a corpse by the side of the road guarded by a Zombie Dog.

name: Rotview Balcony
description: Site of Grace on a cliffside overlooking Caelid.

name: Sorcerer Rogier (First Location)
description: Sorcerer Rogier Location 1. Friendly NPC who sells Ashes of War. Initially met in the Chapel in the western section of the Castle. After you defeat Godrick, he moves to the Roundtable Hold.

name: Smithing Stone [2] E - Stormveil Castle
description: Upgrade Material. Found behind some explosive barrels on the top level of the castle walls accessed from the Rampart Tower.

name: Shack of the Rotting
description: A worn down shack infested with Skeletons.

name: Preserving Boluses
description: Consumable Item. Five can be found inside the Shack of the Rotting.

name: Grace Mimic
description: Consumable. Given as a reward by a non-hostile Commoner NPC sitting on the roof of a building. Use the ladder nearby to reach him.

name: Edgar (First Location)
description: Edgar can be found sitting on a bench up on the ramparts of Castle Morne.

name: Godrick the Grafted
description: The Lord of Stormveil and the first Demigod encountered. Drops Godrick's Great Rune and Remembrance of the Grafted upon defeat.

name: Godrick the Grafted
description: Site of Grace inside Godrick the Grafted's boss arena. Accessible after defeating him.

name: Silver-Pickled Fowl Foot
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse surrounded by Eagles.

name: Divine Bridge Waygate
description: Waygate. Found at the edge of the bridge where it's been broken, past all the Golems. Transports you past the broken bridge sections directly to the Divine Tower of Limgrave.

name: Outer Wall Phantom Tree
description: Site of Grace found next to the Phantom Tree on the outskirts of Leyndell.

name: Map (Leyndell, Royal Capital)
description: Map Fragment. Reveals the Leyndell region. Found on a monolith near the Outer Wall Phantom Tree Site of Grace.

name: Divine Bridge
description: Site of Grace found on the Leyndell Divine Bridge.

name: Tree Sentinel (Leyndell, Royal Capital)
description: Field Bossfight. Two Tree Sentinels guarding the western gate to Leyndell.

name: Blessed Dew Talisman
description: Talisman. Found in a chest west of the Divine Bridge Site of Grace. Guarded by a Golem.

name: Abandoned Coffin
description: Site of Grace found at the foot of a hill littered with broken down stagecoaches.

name: Crystalline Woods
description: Site of Grace found by the Crystalline Woods.

name: Map (Liurnia, West)
description: Map Fragment. Reveals western Liurnia. Found on a monolith along the road by a junction.

name: Northern Liurnia Lake Shore
description: Site of Grace found by the road leading to north Liurnia.

name: Stonesword Key - Corpse-Stench Shack
description: Stonesword Key found on a corpse on a broken bridge near Corpse-Stench Shack.

name: Winged Crystal Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Found on an altar surrounded by Skull enemies.

name: Twiggy Cracked Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Found on an altar at the base of the Minor Erdtree in Capital Outskirts. Guarded by enemies.

name: Crimson Crystal Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Found on an altar at the base of the Minor Erdtree in Capital Outskirts. Guarded by enemies.

name: Ash of War: Lightning Slash
description: Ash of War Upgrade. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the middle of an enclosed area just outside the Capital Outskirts.

name: Outer Wall Battleground
description: Site of Grace found near the northwestern gate of the outer walls.

name: Bestial Sanctum
description: Site of Grace found inside the Bestial Sanctum.

name: Gurranq, Beast Clergyman
description: A non-hostile NPC found within the Bestial Sanctum. Awards various items for handing in Deathroot.

name: Draconic Tree Sentinel
description: Required to enter Leyndell, Royal Capital. Found right outside the capital's entrance.

name: Smoldering Wall
description: Site of Grace directly south of the telescope.

name: Ash of War: Lifesteal Fist
description: Ash of War Upgrade. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab near the Caelid Highway.

name: Astray from Caelid Highway North
description: Site of Grace found by veering off the Caelid Highway towards the east.

name: Caelid Highway South
description: Site of Grace found by the Caelid Highway bend towards the south.

name: Map (Caelid)
description: Map Fragment. Reveals the rest of the Caelid region. Found on a monolith at the Caelid Highway South intersection.

name: Decaying Ekzykes
description: Optional Boss. Found guarding the Caelid Highway South.

name: Nomadic Merchant Caelid South
description: Nomadic Merchant. General Goods vendor found sitting by a campfire in south Caelid. Sells the Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook (15), among other items.

name: Auriza Hero's Grave
description: Found by following the main path within the outskirt walls, all the way to the east.

name: Night's Cavalry (Caelid)
description: Night's Cavalry Miniboss. Roams the Caelid Highway South. Only appears at night. Drops Ash of War: Poison Moth Flight upon defeat.

name: Ash of War: Poison Moth Flight
description: Ash of War Upgrade. Dropped by the Night's Cavalry miniboss roaming the highway upon defeat. Only appears at night.

name: Map (Dragonbarrow)
description: Map Fragment. Reveals the Dragonbarrow region. Found on a monolith along the road east of the Dragonbarrow West Site of Grace.

name: Dragonbarrow West
description: Site of Grace found in western Dragonbarrow.

name: Deep Siofra Well
description: A small structure that houses a lift that takes players underground to the northern section of the Siofra River.

name: Deep Siofra Well
description: Site of Grace found outside of the Deep Siofra Well.

name: Sellia Crystal Tunnel
description: A crystal mining operation in Caelid, overseen by greedy and aggressive insectoids.

name: Sellia Crystal Tunnel
description: Site of Grace found inside Sellia Crystal Tunnel.

name: Golden Seed (C)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. 2 can be found underneath the Phantom Tree at the Capital Outskirts.

name: Lost Ashes of War - Capital Outskirts
description: Key Item used to duplicate Ashes of War. Found by the locked gate in the northwestern Capital Outskirts.

name: Golden Seed (B)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Two can be found under the Phantom Tree in the northwestern outer wall section.

name: Gravity Stone Fan
description: Offensive Consumable Item. Found on a corpse by the cliffs.

name: Auriza Hero's Grave
description: Site of Grace found inside Auriza Hero's Grave. Right by the lift.

name: Gravel Stone
description: Crafting Material. Two obtained by a grave marker overlooking the cliffs. Guarded by a Pumpkin Head.

name: Starlight Shards C
description: Consumable Item. Found in front of a crescent bowl-shaped stone sundial at the edge of the cliffs behind the castle.

name: The Shaded Castle
description: An abandoned and Decrepit castle found in the northern region between the Mt. Gelmir and the Altus Plateau regions. The castle is half sunken into a poisonous bog, with the air tinged yellow by the fumes.

name: Old Altus Tunnel
description: Optional Dungeon. An old mining site rich with crystals. The Stonedigger Troll boss can be found at the end.

name: Old Altus Tunnel
description: Site of Grace found within the Old Altus Tunnel. Found after descending the lift at the entrance.

name: Cemetery Shade
description: Found inside  Tombsward Catacombs. Drops  Lhutel the Headless

name: Erdtree Burial Watchdog (Impaler's Catacombs)
description: Found within Impaler's Catacombs. Drops  Demi-Human Ashes upon defeat.

name: Giant Golem
description: Dormant Golem guarding the divine bridge.

name: Smithing Stone (1) C
description: Found over a hanging body, near one of the structures

name: Armorer's Cookbook (1)
description: Can be found inside a small camp of Soldiers and Wolves.

name: Murkwater Coast
description: Site of grace located at the coasts of Murkwater

name: Murkwater Catacombs
description: Following the Murkwater, you can find the Murkwater Catacombs.

name: Grave Warden Duelist (Limgrave)
description: Found within Murkwater Catacombs.

name: Battle Hammer
description: Found within  Murkwater Catacombs. Dropped by Grave Warden Duelist.

name: Bloody Finger Nerijus
description: Found while traversing the Murkwater River. Blood Finger Hunter Yura joins to aid you during the fight.

name: Warmaster's Shack
description: Small shack in a remote place of Stormhill.

name: Reduvia
description: Dropped by  Bloody Finger Nerijus

name: Murkwater Cave
description: Found halfway over the Murkwater River.

name: Warmaster's Shack
description: Site of grace in Warmaster's Shack.

name: Murkwaver Cave (Site of Grace)
description: Site of grace just inside Murkwater Cave

name: Chapel of Anticipation
description: The starting building players are placed in after the game introduction.

name: Patches (Bossfight)
description: Found within  Murkwater Cave. After defeating him, he sets up a shop in the Cave.

name: Grafted Scion (Tutorial)
description: Boss fought within the tutorial stage at Chapel of Anticipation.

name: Stonedigger Troll (Altus Plateau)
description: Optional Boss encountered in the Old Altus Tunnel dungeon. Drops the Great Club weapon upon defeat.

name: Boltdrake Talisman +1
description: An upgraded version of the Boltdrake Talisman. Found in a storage shed inside the Old Altus Tunnel dungeon.

name: Troll's Hammer
description: Hammer Weapon. Found in a storage shed inside the Old Altus Tunnel dungeon.

name: Great Club
description: Hammer Weapon. Dropped by the Stonedigger Troll boss inside the Old Altus Tunnel upon defeat.

name: Cloth Garb
description: Can be found at the chest at the end of the dungeon in Murkwater Cave

name: Cloth Trousers
description: Can be found at the chest at the end of the dungeon in Murkwater Cave

name: Leyndell, Royal Capital
description: Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: East Capital Rampart
description: Site of Grace at East Capital.

name: Ulcerated Tree Spirit (Mt. Gelmir)
description: Boss roaming Mt. Gelmir. Drops Leaden Hardtear and  Cerulean Hidden Tear

name: Volcano Manor (Site of Grace)
description: Site of grace located just inside the Volcano Manor.

name: Tanith
description: Tanith, head of Volcano Manor.

name: Road of Iniquity
description: Site of Grace.

name: Subterranean Inquisition Chamber
description: Site of grace surrounded by magma

name: Primeval Sorcerer Azur
description: Site of Grace

name: Black Blade Kindred
description: Boss found at the entrance of the Bestial Sanctum. Drops Gargoyle's Blackblade and  Gargoyle's Black Halberd

name: Stillwater Cave
description: Site of Grace inside Stillwater Cave close to the entrance.

name: Golden Seed - Academy Gate Town
description: Flask Upgrade Material. One can be found on the ground next to a glowing sapling.

name: Smithing Stone [1] - Academy Gate Town
description: Upgrade Material that can be looted off a corpse. The corpse is resting against a wall.

name: Crystal Release
description: Sorcery Spell. Dropped by the Crystalians duo bosses inside the Academy Crystal Cave upon their defeat.

name: Bloodflame Blade
description: Incantation. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab along the marshes outside of the nearby island. Note that there is another scarab nearby that does not drop anything.

name: Map (Mt. Gelmir)
description: Map of Mt. Gelmir region

name: Ninth Mt. Gelmir Campsite
description: Site of Grace

name: Rose Church
description: An abandoned church overgrown with bloodroses and rot.

name: White-Faced Varre (Second Location)
description: White-Faced Varre, Location 2. Found standing outside of the Rose Church. Gives you the Festering Bloody Finger after exhausting his dialogue.

name: Seethewater Terminus
description: Site of Grace

name: Festering Bloody Finger
description: Multiplayer Item. Given by White-Faced Varre after exhausting his dialogue.

name: Fort Laiedd
description: Fort Laiedd is found on the western edge of Mt. Gelmir. A fort left broken, still occupied by those who won the battle.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [12]
description: Cookbook item found inside the Rose Church, by the southern walls.

name: First Mt. Gelmir Campsite
description: Site of Grace

name: Nomadic Merchant Mt. Gelmir
description: Nomadic Merchant. General Goods vendor found sitting by a campfire on a ledge halfway up Mt. Gelmir. Sells Stonesword Key and a full set of Confessor armor.

name: Golden Seed - Northwest Mt. Gelmir
description: Flask Upgrade Material. One can be found underneath a Phantom Tree.

name: Cuckoo Glintstone (C)
description: Pillage from the body near the golden tree.

name: Ash of War: Through and Through
description: Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab. You will see glowing footprints appearing in a set pattern around the area. Stand in front of its path and attack as it approaches you to reveal the creature.

name: Smithing Stone [2] - Village of the Albinaurics
description: Upgrade Material. 2 can be found on a corpse being eaten by crabs between a wall and a tree.

name: Full-Grown Fallingstar Beast
description: Optional Field Boss found high up in Mt. Gelmir.

name: Trina's Lily
description: You can found x2 between two ruins

name: Starlight Shards D
description: Can be found at the edge in front of the stone statue.

name: Armorer's Cookbook [7]
description: Can be found on the bottom floor once past the wooden door.

name: Fire Scorpion Charm
description: Raises fire attack, but lowers damage negation. Found next to the talking spirit on the top of the walls.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (2)
description: Upgrade Material. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab near the edge of the cliffs.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (4)
description: Located on a body by the burning fire.

name: Memory Stone - Converted Tower
description: Memory Upgrade Material. Found in a chest on the top floor of the Converted Tower.

name: Minor Erdtree (Liurnia Southwest)
description: Minor Erdtree found in the plateaus in the southwest of Liurnia.

name: Spirit-Caller Snail
description: Optional Boss. Found at the end of the Road's End Catacombs. Drops the Glintstone Sorcerer Ashes upon defeat.

name: Flying Dragon Greyll
description: Found at the bridge, drops Dragon Heart

name: Bernahl (First Location)
description: Bernahl, Location 1. Tarnished Knight NPC found at the Warmaster's Shack. Sells various Ashes of War. Moves to the Volcano Manor in Mt. Gelmir.

name: Strength-Knot Crystal Tear
description: Physick Flask Matrial. Found inside a stone receptacle near the edge of the cliffs.

name: Smithing Stone (1)
description: Upgrade Material. Two can be found on a corpse at the Saintsbridge.

name: Triumphant Delight
description: Gesture. Obtained as you push Alexander out of the ground he's stuck in.

name: Golden Beast Crest Shield
description: Greatshield. Dropped by the Grafted Scion upon defeat.

name: Ornamental Straight Sword
description: Straight Sword. Dropped by the Grafted Scion upon defeat.

name: The Four Belfries
description: Site of Grace by The Four Belfries.

name: Chapel of Anticipation Waygate
description: A Teleporter Waygate at The Four Belfries that transports you to the Chapel of Anticipation. The same location you begin the game in. Requires an Imbued Sword Key.

name: Foot of the Four Belfries
description: Site of Grace found before ascending the mountain with the Four Belfries.

name: Cuckoo's Evergaol
description: Evergaol located on the western landmass of Liurnia. Bols, Carian Knight is imprisoned within.

name: Tibia Mariner (Liurnia of the Lakes)
description: One of the locations where Tibia Mariner Boss appears.

name: Artist's Shack
description: A small cabin in North Liurnia of The Lakes. Its strongly perceived tranquility seems overshadowed by oblivion.

name: Artist's Shack
description: Site of Grace at Artist's Shack.

name: Nomadic Merchant Liurnia of the Lakes
description: Found by a campfire on the west road after passing through the outpost to the northwest of Church of Irith, before entering the forest in Liurnia of the Lakes.

name: The Stormhawk King
description: Key Item. Found on a corpse in the southern wing of the chapel, up on the roof.

name: Stormhawk Deenh
description: Spirit Ash. Found in a chest on the wooden walkway above the southern wing's main room. Accessible from where The Stormhawk King key item is found.

name: Moonlight Altar
description: Site of Grace located outside of the Deep Ainsel Well's exit point, high above the Moonlight Altar plateau in the southwest of Liurnia of The Lakes.

name: Cleanrot Knight - Stillwater Cave
description: Optional Boss found at the end of the Stillwater Cave. Drops the Winged Sword Insignia upon defeat.

name: Winged Sword Insignia
description: Talisman. Dropped by the Cleanrot Knight boss inside the Stillwater Cave.

name: Cathedral of Manus Celes
description: Located at South West Liurnia of The Lakes. Accessible only after making significant progress in Ranni's questline.

name: Glintstone Dragon Adula (Cathedral of Manus Celes)
description: Great Enemy. This dragon is first found roaming the Three Sisters sub-region in the north. After dealing enough damage to it, it will teleport here outside the Cathedral of Manus Celes. Drops 3x Dragon Hearts and the Adula's Moonblade spell upon defeat.

name: Fire Monks' Prayerbook
description: Incantation Tome. Found on a corpse in an enemy outpost in the area.

name: Malefactor's Evergaol
description: Evergaol found on the southern landmass of Liurnia. The boss Adan, Thief of Fire is imprisoned within.

name: Liurnia Lake Shore
description: Site of Grace found on the southern landmass, by the Nomadic Merchant.

name: Forbidden Lands
description: Site of Grace

name: Fell Twins
description: Bulky ogre-like beasts wielding flaming armament.

name: Dark Moon Greatsword
description: Greatsword. Found below the  Cathedral of Manus Celes after progressing Ranni's questline.

name: Black Blade Kindred B
description: Black Blade Kindred is massive gargoyle that wields a huge halberd and appears in multiple locations.

name: Ainsel River Well
description: A small structure housing a lift that takes you down to the Ainsel River.

name: Adan, Thief of Fire
description: Optional Boss. Imprisoned within the Malefactor's Evergaol. Drops the Flame of the Fell God spell upon defeat.

name: Flame of the Fell God
description: Incantation. Dropped by Adan, Thief of Fire inside the Malefactor's Evergaol.

name: Immunizing White Cured Meat
description: Temporarily boosts immunity.

name: Treespear
description: Found on the Caravan left at the edge of the collapsed bridge.

name: Sacrificial Twig
description: Special Consumable Talisman. Found on a corpse on a stone platform jutting out of the cliff to the east. Accessible from above only, by heading east from Malefactor's Evergaol.

name: Hyetta (Second Location)
description: Hyetta, Location 2. She is found at the western side of the Purified Ruins. She asks for another Shabriri Grape but does not give any reward this time.

name: Laskyar Ruins
description: Ruins found in the marshes south of the lake.

name: Ritual Pot - Laskyar Ruins
description: Special Tool Key Item. Found on a corpse in the northern section of the Laskyar Ruins, in front of a set of pillars.

name: Wraith Calling Bell
description: Offensive Consumable Item. Found in a chest in a small room of an underground aea in the northwestern section of the Laskyar Ruins. Find a set of steps leading downwards to locate the area.

name: Laskyar Ruins Waygate
description: A Waygate that transports the user to the Raya Lucaria Academy's main entrance. Found in a gazebo in the center of the Laskyar Ruins.

name: Smithing Stone [3] - Laskyar Ruins
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse to the right of the steps to the gazebo in the center of the Laskyar Ruins.

name: Road to the Manor
description: Site of Grace found along the main road towards Caria Manor.

name: Golden Rune (1) - Liurnia's North Sarcophagi
description: Looted from the many sarcophagi within the area. Watch out for the Giant Rats.

name: Liurnia Highway North
description: Site of Grace found on the side of the road.

name: Ash of War: Hoarfrost Stomp
description: Ash Of War Upgrade. Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab roaming around the shallow water. Look for its glowing footprints and attack as the prints move towards you.

name: Liurnia Highway South
description: Site of Grace on the side of the road.

name: Gate Town Bridge
description: Site of Grace found on the top of the broken bridge.

name: Main Caria Manor Gate
description: Site of Grace found by the southern gate to Caria Manor. Be careful when traversing the fields outside the manor, as a rain of energy projectiles will constantly bombard you until you reach this Site of Grace.

name: Eastern Tableland
description: Site of Grace found in the middle of a rocky section of the road.

name: Stonesword Key - East Liurnia of the Lakes
description: Found on a body sitting on a chair, in the open field.

name: Study Hall Entrance
description: Site of Grace that can be found just inside the entrance.

name: Eastern Liurnia Lake Shore
description: Site of Grace found on the eastern side of Liurnia of the Lakes.

name: Caria Manor
description: A major dungeon comprised of a very large estate, overlooking the lakes from the north. Its eternal warden, Royal Knight Loretta fervently guards the manor.

name: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [6]
description: Cookbook Key Item. Found on a corpse in a small room southeast of the gardens.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [3] - Caria Manor
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse at the end of a narrow path along the eastern walls.

name: Carian Piercer
description: Sorcery. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab behind the gardens near the east.

name: Ice Crest Shield
description: Small Shield. Found on a corpse up on a ledge by a jagged stone pillar. This area is behind the gardens.

name: Golden Rune [4] - Caria Manor
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse near the center of the garden.

name: Manor Lower Level
description: Site of Grace found in a chapel building on the west side of the estate.

name: Smithing Stone [4] - Caria Manor
description: Upgrade Material. Found in the chapel at the altar.

name: Rune Arc - Caria Manor
description: Consumable Item. Found on a corpse on the upper walkways of the garden. This is accessible from the chapel in the west.

name: Starlight Shards E
description: Can be found in front of the half bowl stone statue by the cliff, overlooking the fog covered Academy Gate Town and Gate Town Bridge,

name: Sword of Night and Flame
description: Straight Sword. Found in a chest inside a locked room behind the gardens. This is accessible by using the walkways above. You can get onto the walkways from the Chapel building in the west.

name: Manor Upper Level
description: Site of Grace found in a room in the east. Accessible by using the garden walkways from the chapel building in the west and then taking a lift up a tower.

name: Golden Seed - Caria Manor
description: Flask Upgrade material. Found under a Phantom Tree in the manor's upper level.

name: Magic Grease - 2x Caria Manor
description: Consumable. 2 found on a corpse on a lower ledge reachable by dropping down.

name: Cracked Pot - Caria Manor
description: Crafting material. Found on the cliffs overlooking the gardens below.

name: Cliffbottom Catacombs
description: Catacombs found at the bottom of the cliffs in the eastern side of the Liurnia of the Lakes region, now infested by Imps and Ogres

name: Crystal Dart - Caria Manor
description: Offensive Consumable. Found on a gravestone in the western portion of the upper manor.

name: Cliffbottom Catacombs
description: Site of grace at the entrance of the Cliffbottom Catacombs.

name: Smithing Stone [3] - Caria Manor
description: Upgrade Material. Found in the cliff graveyard behind the Living Jars.

name: Ash of War: Carian Grandeur
description: Ash of War. Found on a corpse on the roof of a tall stone structure. This is accessible by jumping down the cliffside graveyard from the manor's upper level.

name: Royal Knight Loretta
description: Great Enemy. The guardian of Caria Manor. Drops Loretta's Greatbow and Ash of War: Loretta's Slash upon defeat.

name: Ash of War: Loretta's Slash
description: Ash of War. Dropped by Royal Knight Loretta upon defeat.

name: Loretta's Greatbow
description: Sorcery. Dropped by Royal Knight Loretta upon defeat.

name: Royal Moongazing Grounds
description: Site of Grace found after defeating Royal Knight Loretta.

name: Skeletal Militiaman Ashes
description: Spirit Ashes. Obtained when defeating the Tibia Mariner in Summonwater Village.

name: Deathroot - Summonwater Village
description: Key Item. Obtained upon defeating the Tibia Mariner.

name: Nox Swordstress & Nox Priest
description: Duo Boss fight. The entrance to their chamber is initially sealed by a barrier which can be dispelled by lighting a brazier atop a tower in the northwest section of town. Drops  Nox Flowing Sword upon defeat.

name: Highroad Cave
description: A cave that houses a tomb, deep within. It is situated at the northmost part of Limgrave. It has been inhabited by a pack of Wolves, Land Octopuses, and Giant Bats.

name: Commander O'Neil
description: Great Enemy. Drops Commander's Standard and  Unalloyed Gold Needle

name: East Raya Lucaria Gate
description: Site of grace at the eastern gate of Raya Lucaria.

name: Highroad Cave Site
description: Site of grace, located inside the entrance of Highroad Cave.

name: Sacred Tear (Bellum Church)
description: Inside Bellum Church, below the big statue.

name: Nomadic Merchant North Liurnia of the Lakes
description: Merchant NPC located next to the river, just pass the Bellum Church's hole in order to find him.

name: Sorcerer's Isle
description: Site of Grace found on the eastern edge of the isle.

name: Greataxe
description: Found inside the treasure chest within the carriage being pulled by two large Trolls and defended by militia and aristocracy.

name: Raya Lucaria Academy
description: The second Legacy Dungeon of the game, Raya Lucaria hides multiple riches, particularly for those interested in magic.

name: Rune Arc E
description: On a body, past the Nomadic Merchant and some big stones, near the edge of the cliff.

name: Testu's Rise
description: Lookout Tower. Initially sealed by a barrier. Inspecting the statue at the entrance, you are asked to "seek three wise beasts". These can be found as Ghostly Tortoises.
