Skeletal Spirits will also appear all over the isle, attempting to hinder your progress. The first Tortoise can be found by the cliffs north of the tower. The second one can be found in the south, below the cliffs. The last one can be found high up on one of the trees east of the tower. Once all three have been defeated, the tower's seal is broken.

name: Frenzyflame Stone
description: Frenzyflame Stone is a consumable that uses FP to continuously heal chaos followers

name: Memory Stone - Testu's Rise
description: Memory Slot Upgrade Material. Found in a chest at the top floor of Testu's Rise.

name: Ruined Labyrinth
description: Site of Grace found amongst the ruins and broken statues in the area

name: Black Knife Catacombs
description: Site of Grace found at the top of the Black Knife Catacombs

name: Somber Smithing Stone (3) F
description: Dropped by a  Teadrop Scarab found within the woods.

name: Black Knife Catacombs
description: Black Knife Catacombs homes many skeletons and crabs within its depths, find and defeat the Black Knife Assassin within to obtain their dagger

name: Dragonwound Grease
description: Found on a body at the stairs.

name: Old Fang
description: Crafting Material. 2 are found on a corpse hidden within a huge clutch of Poison Pods under a fallen structure.

name: Soporific Grease
description: Consumable Item. 3 are found under a fall structure.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (3) B
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse sitting on a chair by the shore.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (2) - 3x Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel
description: Upgrade Material. A total of 3 can be found in the Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel.

name: Ravine-Veiled Village
description: Ravine-Veiled Village Site of Grace, right below the entrance to the Miners' cave that lead to Ruin-Strewn Precipice.

name: Ruin-Strewn Precipice
description: A large precipice over Ravine-Veiled Village with Miners' caves all the way to the top.

name: Golden Seed (I)
description: Found just south of where Poison Pods are located. Found besides a glowing tree.

name: Smoldering Butterfly - Ravine-Veiled Village
description: Within Ravine-Veiled Village, near Site of Grace.

name: Crystal Bud
description: Within Ravine-Veiled Village, near Site of Grace.

name: Smithing Stone [5] - Ravine-Veiled Village
description: Within Ravine-Veiled Village, near Site of Grace.

name: Smithing Stone [4] - 9x Ruin-Strewn Precipice
description: There are at least 9 Smithing Stones (4) within the cave that goes through Ruin-Strewn Precipice.

name: Smithing Stone [3] - 3x Ruin-Strewn Precipice
description: There are at least 3 Smithing Stones (3) within the caves that go through Ruin-Strewn Precipice

name: Smithing Stone [5] - Ruin-Strewn Precipice
description: Can be found within the caves that run through the Ruin-Strewn Precipice.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (4) - Ruin-Strewn Precipice
description: Can be found in the caves that go through the Ruin-Strewn Precipice.

name: Ruin-Strewn Precipice Overlook
description: Site of Grace located on top of Ruin-Strewn Precipice, right before Magma Wyrm Makar Bossfight.

name: Magma Wyrm Makar
description: This Boss fight is accessed through Ruin-Strewn Precipice, upon reaching the Ruin-Strewn Precipice Overlook Site of Grace.

name: Teleporter Chest (Sellia Crystal Tunnel)
description: This is a trap chest at an underground cellar in Dragon-Burnt Ruins. It will teleport you to the Sellia Crystal Tunnel in Caelid.

name: Bell Bearing Hunter
description: This NPC invades at NIGHT, replacing Knight Bernahl. You have to travel here from another site of grace to trigger it. Drops Bone Peddler's Bell Bearing

name: Crucible Knight
description: Found within Stormhill Evergaol, this is a solo fight without Spirit Ashes or player summons. Drops the Incantation Aspects of the Crucible: Tail

name: Bloodhound Knight Darriwil
description: Boss of Forlorn Hound Evergaol. Drops the Bloodhound's Fang Curved Greatsword

name: Bloodhound's Fang
description: Curved Greatsword. Dropped by the boss of Forlorn Hound Evergaol, Bloodhound Knight Darriwil.

name: Ash of War: Barricade Shield
description: Dropped by Night's Cavalry Miniboss found patrolling the roads around the Castle Morne Ramparts. Only appears at night.

name: Ash of War: Repeating Thrust
description: Dropped by Night's Cavalry that roams the bridge near Agheel Lake North, only appears at night.

name: Crystalian (Ring Blade)
description: Optional Boss. Found at the bottom-most level of Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel. Drops Smithing-Stone Miner's Bell Bearing (1).

name: Smithing-Stone Miner's Bell Bearing (1)
description: Key Item. Dropped by the Crystalian (Ring Blade) Boss at the bottom-most level of Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel.

name: Shatter Earth
description: Sorcery. Found on a corpse in the second-to-last level of Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel. Inside an opening in the north.

name: Crystal Knife
description: Dagger. Found in a chest inside the storage room in the Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel protected by Marionettes.

name: Renna's Rise
description: One of three towers found in the Three Sisters sub-region. Three Sisters is accessible after completing Caria Manor and defeating Royal Knight Loretta.

name: Ash of War: Chilling Mist
description: Ash of War. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the ruins south of Renna's Rise.

name: Seluvis's Rise
description: One of three towers found in the Three Sisters sub-region. Three Sisters is accessible after completing Caria Manor and defeating Royal Knight Loretta.

name: Ranni's Rise
description: One of three towers found in the Three Sisters sub-region. Three Sisters is accessible after completing Caria Manor and defeating Royal Knight Loretta.

name: Assassin's Cerulean Dagger
description: Dropped by the Black Knife Assassin found inside Black Knife Catacombs.

name: Meteorite Staff
description: Glintstone Staff with S scaling but no upgrades. Found on a corpse hanging from a window in Street of Sages Ruins in the swamp of Caelid.

name: Twinsage Sorcerer Ashes
description: Dropped by the Cemetery Shade boss of the Black Knife Catacombs

name: Street of Sages Ruins
description: Ruins with lots of poison flowers and poison casters. You can pick up Rock Sling Sorcery as well as the Meteorite Staff here.

name: Ranni's Rise
description: Site of Grace found in Ranni's Rise. Up on the first floor.

name: Perfumer Traveler's Set
description: Set includes: Traveler's Hat, Perfumer's Traveling Garb, Traveler's Gloves, Traveler's Slops, can be found on a corpse in a corner in the ruins.

name: Demi-Human Queen's Staff
description: Dropped by the Demi-Human Queen elite enemy in Demi-Human Forest Ruins.

name: Frenzied Flame Village
description: Found past the minor tree.

name: Frenzied Flame Village Outskirts
description: Site of Grace at the Frenzied Flame Village Outskirts. You can see the Frenzied Flame from this location.

name: Converted Fringe Tower
description: Tower found on the Fringe, a puzzle seals the rest of the Tower.

name: Smithing Master Iji (Spectral)
description: Quest NPC. Appears in spectral form by the lift on the first floor after speaking to Ranni for the first time.

name: Church of Inhibition
description: The remnants of an old church in the north of Liurnia, just before the Altus Plateau.

name: Blaidd (Spectral)
description: Quest NPC. Appears in spectral form on the first floor after speaking to Ranni for the first time.

name: Seluvis (Spectral)
description: Quest NPC. Appears in spectral form by the entrance after speaking to Ranni for the first time.

name: Frenzied Burst
description: Incantation. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab south of the Church of Inhibition.

name: Seluvis
description: Quest NPC. Found on the ground floor of his tower after first speaking to his spectral form at Ranni's Rise.

name: Seluvis's Potion
description: Key Quest Item. Given by Seluvis after accepting his task.

name: Memory Stone - Seluvis's Rise
description: Memory Slot Upgrade Material. Found on the top floor of Seluvis's Rise.

name: Grand Lift of Dectus
description: Site of Grace found on the Liurnia side of the Grand Lift of Dectus.

name: Shabriri's Woe
description: Found on a body at the edge of the Frenzied Flame Village

name: Frenzied's Cookbook (1)
description: Found on a body inside one of the houses in the Frenzied Flame Village

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy D
description: Dropped by the invader Festering Fingerprint Vyke.

name: Thops's Bell Bearing
description: Looted from Thops' corpse.

name: Festering Fingerprint Vyke
description: Invader using a War Spear of their name.

name: Frozen Armament
description: Sorcery. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in an area behind Caria Manor. This area is accessible after completing the manor and defeating Royal Knight Loretta.

name: Minor Erdtree (Liurnia Northeast)
description: Minor Erdtree in the Northeast part of the Liurnia of the Lakes region.

name: Magic-Shrouding Cracked Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar.

name: Lightning-Shrouding Cracked Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar.

name: Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar.

name: Rosus' Axe
description: An Axe found in the room sealed by the Imp Statue in the Black Knife Catacombs.

name: Glintstone Dragon Adula (Three Sisters)
description: Great Enemy. Found roaming the sub-region of Three Sisters. The dragon cannot be killed here and will teleport to the Cathedral of Manus Celes in the very south of the region after being brought to about 50% HP.

name: Cannon of Haima
description: Found in the chest at the top of the Converted Fringe Tower.

name: Gavel of Haima
description: Found in the chest at the top of the Converted Fringe Tower.

name: Ash of War: Giant Hunt
description: Dropped by the lone wandering Troll Knight.

name: Behind Caria Manor
description: Site of Grace in the plateau behind Caria Manor. Accessible only after defeating Royal Knight Loretta.

name: Juvenile Scholar Cap
description: Light Helmet. Found by touching a ghost at the graveyard. This ghost also gives Juvenile Scholar Robe and 1x Larval Tear.

name: Juvenile Scholar Robe
description: Light Chest Armor. Found by touching a ghost at the graveyard. This ghost also gives Juvenile Scholar Cap and 1x Larval Tear.

name: Larval Tear (B)
description: Key Item. Found by touching a ghost at the graveyard. This ghost also gives Juvenile Scholar Cap and Juvenile Scholar Robe.

name: Royal Grave Evergaol
description: Evergaol found east of Caria Manor. The Alabaster Lord is imprisoned within.

name: Alabaster Lord
description: Optional Boss imprisoned within the Royal Grave Evergaol.

name: Academy Glintstone Key (A)
description: Key used to unlock the gate of Raya Lucaria Academy

name: Meteorite
description: Sorcery. Dropped by the Alabaster Lord upon defeat.

name: Glintstone Dragon Smarag
description: A fearsome magic dragon with crystalized magic formation for scales. Guards the Academy Glintstone Key.

name: Kaiden Sellsword Ashes
description: Found within Cliffbottom Catacombs. Dropped by Erdtree Burial Watchdog.

name: Demi-Human Ashes
description: Found within  Impaler's Catacombs. Dropped by Erdtree Burial Watchdog

name: Margit, the Fell Omen Site
description: Margit the Fell Omen Site of Grace, located at the boss arena of Margit, near Stormvel Castle.

name: Margit, the Fell Omen
description: A large, apparently elder creature, self-proclaimed as "The last of all kings". Drops Talisman Pouch and 12000 Runes upon defeat.

name: Dragon Heart
description: Dropped by  Flying Dragon Agheel. Can be used to acquire draconic Incantations at Church of Dragon Communion and Cathedral of Dragon Communion.

name: Edgar the Revenger
description: Hostile NPC invader. Invades when you interact with the Site of Grace at the Revenger's Shack.

name: Talisman Pouch
description: Small, withered bag, knitted by hand. Bestowed upon the ruling lord, or those atempting to become lord, by the elderly Finger Reader. Dropped by Margit, the Fell Omen upon defeat.

name: Dragon Heart x3
description: Dropped by  Glintstone Dragon Adula. Can be used to acquire draconic Incantations at Church of Dragon Communion and Cathedral of Dragon Communion.

name: Adula's Moonblade
description: Dropped by the  Glintstone Dragon Adula in the  Cathedral of Manus Celes.

name: Bols, Carian Knight
description: Optional Boss. Imprisoned within the Cuckoo's Evergaol. Drops the Greatblade Phalanx spell upon defeat.

name: Greatblade Phalanx
description: Sorcery. Dropped by Bols, Carian Knight inside the Cuckoo's Evergaol.

name: Perfumer's Ruins
description: A set of ruins found in Altus Plateau, far to the west and below Mt. Gelmir.

name: Unsightly Catacombs
description: A burial grounds crawling with Misbegotten creatures found deep beneath the Perfumer's Ruins. Despite its decrepit state, the catacombs give off a trace of fragrant aromas juxtaposed by the scent of the ancient dead.

name: Unsightly Catacombs
description: Site of Grace near the Unsightly Catacombs entrance.

name: Ash of War: Thops's Barrier
description: Ash of War. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found on a small isle on the western side of the lake.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [1] - Stormveil Castle
description: Upgrade Material. Dropped by the  Lion Guardian east of the castle courtyard.

name: Wandering Merchant Caelid Highway North
description: Nomadic Merchant. General Goods vendor found sitting by a campfire east of the Astray from Caelid Highway North Site of Grace.

name: Golden Rune (1) E
description: Inside a glowing skull in the open field. Hit it with any attack to obtain.

name: Smithing Stone [1] - Church of Elleh
description: Found at Church of Elleh on the smithing table.

name: Carian Knight's Shield
description: Dropped by Moongrum Carian Knight.

name: 3x Golden Rune (1) F
description: At least 3x Golden Runes (1) along the road north-east of Church of Elleh. Inside skulls. Perform an attack to loot.

name: Nightrider Glaive
description: Halberd dropped by  Night's Cavalry

name: The Four Belfries
description: A hub for transporter waygates that lead to various locations. Each waygate requires an Imbued Sword Key to activate.

name: Imbued Sword Key - The Four Belfries
description: Key Item used to activate a Waygate at The Four Belfries. Found in a chest at the very top of the hill, at the fourth belfry tower.

name: Crumbling Farum Azula Waygate
description: A Teleporter Waygate that transports you to the Crumbling Farum Azula. Requires an Imbued Sword Key.

name: Nightrider Flail
description: Dropped by  Night's Cavalry.

name: Nokron, Eternal City Waygate
description: A Teleporter Waygate at The Four Belfries that transports you to Nokron, Eternal City. Requires an Imbued Sword Key.

name: Smithing Stone (1) F
description: Looted from a Noble Soldier alongside Lordsworn's Straight Sword.

name: Tibia Mariner (Wyndham Ruins)
description: Found in the waterlogged section of Wyndham Ruins. Drops A  Deathroot and  Tibia's Summons

name: Tibia's Summons
description: Drops from the  Tibia Mariner at Wyndham Ruins.

name: Deathroot - Wyndham Ruins
description: Dropped by the  Tibia Mariner Boss.

name: Skeletal Bandit Ashes
description: Spirit Ash that drops from the  Tibia Mariner

name: Deathroot - East Liurnia of the Lakes
description: Deathroot dropped by  Tibia Mariner located at Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Ash of War: Storm Stomp
description: Found in the southeastern area of Gatefront Ruins. There is a set of stairs that leads to a small room with a treasure chest. This item is found alongside Whetstone Knife.

name: Tree Sentinel (Limgrave)
description: Field Boss roaming the area. Drops  Golden Halberd

name: Golden Halberd
description: Drops from  Tree Sentinel

name: Smithing Stone (4) B
description: Upgrade material. Found in a chest inside an enemy outpost.

name: Borealis the Freezing Fog
description: Optional Boss. Drops Dragon Heart.

name: Rune Arc F
description: Consumable Item. Found on a corpse inside a large enemy outpost.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (3) C
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse sitting on a chair overlooking the cliffs.

name: Carian Knight's Sword
description: Straight Sword. Found in a chest at the back of a large stagecoach being pulled by 2 Trolls.

name: Kingsrealm Ruins
description: A large set of ruins found in northwest Liurnia.

name: Royal Revenant
description: Optional Boss found in an underground area of the Kingsrealm Ruins. The stairs leading down to the location is hidden by an illusory floor in the northeast section of the ruins. You need to step on the floor to dispel the illusion.

name: Frozen Needle
description: Thrusting Sword. Found in a chest inside a small room in an underground area of the ruins. The Royal Revenant needs to be defeated to gain access to this room.

name: Unseen Form
description: Found at the top of Mirage Rise. Can be found alongside Unseen Blade

name: Unseen Blade
description: Found at the top of Mirage Rise. Can be found alongside Unseen Form

name: Magma Wyrm's Scalesword
description: Curved Greatsword dropped by  Magma Wyrm Makar

name: Dragon Heart B
description: Dropped by  Magma Wyrm Makar. Can be used to acquire draconic Incantations at Church of Dragon Communion and Cathedral of Dragon Communion.

name: Ringleader's Evergaol
description: Evergaol located at the west of  Liurnia of the Lakes. You can fight  Alecto, Black Knife Ringleader

name: Black Knife Tiche
description: Spirit Ashes. Dropped by  Alecto, Black Knife Ringleader upon defeat.

name: Golden Rune (1) H
description: Found along the shore before reaching the bridge, under which the Gold-Pickled Fowl Foot is.

name: Dragon Heart C
description: Dropped by  Decaying Ekzykes

name: Dragon Heart D
description: Dropped by Flying Dragon Greyll

name: x2 Golden Rune (1) I
description: x2 Golden Runes (1) located along the shore.

name: Dragon Heart (Glintstone Dragon Smarag)
description: Drops from  Glintstone Dragon Smarag

name: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman
description: Talisman found on one of the edges of  Bestial Sanctum

name: Bestial Sanctum
description: Bestial Sanctum,  Gurranq, Beast Clergyman can be found inside.

name: Erdtree Avatar (Liurnia Northeast)
description: Field Boss. Drops Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear, Lightning-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Magic-Shrouding Cracked Tear

name: Great Dragonfly Head
description: On a corpse underwater at the Dragon-Burnt Ruins.

name: Carian Inverted Statue
description: Quest Item. Given by Ranni after giving her the Fingerslayer Blade.

name: Carian Study Hall
description: A large library-like location full of spectres and magic users that leads to the Divine Tower of Liurnia. Using the Carian Inverted Statue unlocks an alternative version of the map.

name: Mask of Confidence
description: Helm. Found on a corpse laying on the walls of the secret area of the Carian Study Hall unlocked using the Carian Inverted Statue.

name: Divine Tower of Liurnia
description: A tower standing on a lone island. Seems like an event of historical value took place here...

name: Dragonwound Grease (A)
description: Looted off a corpse behind the Glintstone Dragon Smarag.

name: Divine Tower of Liurnia
description: Site of Grace found on an upper floor of the Divine Tower of Liurnia.

name: Kukri
description: Looted off a corpse behind the Glintstone Dragon Smarag.

name: Cursemark of Death
description: Key Item. Found on a body lying at the top of the Divine Tower of Liurnia.

name: Stargazer Heirloom
description: Talisman. Found on a body lying at the top of the Divine Tower of Liurnia.

name: Seluvis's Bell Bearing
description: Key Item. Found on a body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.

name: Preceptor's Set
description: Armor Set. Found on a body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.

name: Finger Maiden Therolina Puppet
description: Spirit Ashes. Can be bought from a body in Seluvis's Rise for Starlight Shards after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.

name: Jarwight Puppet
description: Spirit Ashes. Can be bought from a body in Seluvis's Rise for Starlight Shards after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.

name: Perfumer Tricia
description: Optional Duo Boss Fight. Perfumer Tricia is found at the end of the Unsightly Catacombs and is accompanied by a Misbegotten Warrior.

name: Grave Glovewort [4] - Unsightly Catacombs
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. A total of 3 are found within the Unsightly Catacombs.The first one is found in the room with the L-shaped staircase.The second one is found by dropping into the pit from the L-shaped staircase and heading through the corridor in the north.The last one is found in the dark hall just before the boss' door.

name: Grave Glovewort [5] - 3x Unsightly Catacombs
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. A total of 3 can be found inside the Unsightly Catacombs.The first is found in the first big hall with multiple levels. Go through the side corridors towards the back to find the glovewort.The second one is found by going down one level and heading to the connecting room in the east, behind the Winged Misbegotten and Rotten Stray.The last one is found in a corner of a pit you drop into from an L-shaped staircase.

name: Ghost Glovewort [5] - Unsightly Catacombs
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found by the wall in the pit you drop into from the L-shaped staircase.

name: Winged Misbegotten Ashes
description: Spirit Ash. Found on a corpse in a pit inside the Unsightly Catacombs.

name: Ash of War: Charge Forth
description: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab. You'll find it attached to a ceiling, under some Poison Pods.

name: Ancient Dragon Lansseax
description: A large white 4 winged dragon.

name: Snow Witch Set
description: Armor Set. Found in a chest on the upper floor of Renna's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.

name: Renna's Rise Waygate
description: Waygate. Found at the top of Renna's Rise. Teleports you to Ainsel River Main.

name: Prattling Pate (Apologies)
description: Reusable Item. Found on a corpse in the Unsightly Catacombs, along the corridors in the room with the lever that opens the final door.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [3] A - Raya Lucaria Academy
description: Looted off a corpse behind the altar of the Church of the Cuckoo in the academy.

name: Golden Rune [2] - Raya Lucaria Academy (C)
description: Looted off a corpse at the Church of the Cuckoo in Raya Lucaria Academy

name: Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan
description: Non-Invader Hostile NPC. Found in the fields west of The Shaded Castle. Drops Antspur Rapier, Marais Mask and Marais Robe upon defeat.

name: Grace Mimic - Raya Lucaria Academy
description: Looted off a corpse at the northwest of the graveyard. The body is next to a gravestone, sitting by the ledge.

name: Antspur Rapier
description: Thrusting Sword. Dropped by Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan upon defeat.

name: Marais Mask
description: Light Helm. Dropped by Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan upon defeat.

name: Marais Robe
description: Light Chest Armor. Dropped by Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan upon defeat.

name: Gravity Well
description: Dropped by the Monolith Guardian enemy that appears from a gravity portal. The section is near the graveyard and the large rotating lift of Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [3] B - Raya Lucaria Academy
description: Looted on the monolith. It can be found past the Graveyard section where you'll see a large rotating lift. It is protected by a Monolith Guardian in Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Conspectus Scroll
description: Looted off a body inside a room. From the Schoolhouse Classroom site of Raya Lucaria Academy, go to the hallway, turn left. You'll see the corpse in front a an illusory wall.

name: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [5]
description: Looted from a treasure chest inside a room. From the Schoolhouse Classroom site of Raya Lucaria Academy, go to the hallway, turn left.

name: Schoolhouse Classroom Site
description: Site of Grace found in a room at the top section of the large rotating lift.

name: Ritual Pot - Raya Lucaria Academy
description: Special Tool Key Item. Found inside a treasure chest, at the end of the hallway that is guarded by sorcerers and a giant Living Jar. The nearest site of grace is the Schoolhouse Classroom in Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy E
description: Looted off a corpse hanging on the fence of the second-floor balcony. The nearest site of grace is the Schoolhouse Classroom in Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Wyndham Ruins
description: A large set of ruins south west of the Old Altus Tunnel.

name: Pearldrake Talisman +1
description: Upgraded Talisman. Found in an underground room near the top of the Wyndham Ruins. The entrance requires a Stonesword Key to unlock.

name: Wyndham Catacombs
description: Mini Dungeon. The entrance is found is at the top of Wyndham Ruins.

name: Wyndham Catacombs
description: Site of Grace found right by the catacombs' entrance.

name: Gravity Stone Fan (Caelid)
description: Found inside a chest in a small cabin. The chest is next to where you are teleported to upon using the trap coffer at Dragon-Burnt Ruins.

name: Gravity Stone Chunk
description: Found inside a chest in a small cabin. The chest is next to where you are teleported to upon using the trap coffer at Dragon-Burnt Ruins.

name: Ash of War: Barrage
description: Ash of War. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found in the narrow channel north of Seethewater River.

name: Golden Seed (J)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found under a Phantom Tree as you exit the narrow channel north of Seethewater River.

name: Golden Rune [4] - Limgrave Tunnels
description: Golden Rune [4] held by a corpse within the Limgrave Tunnels.

name: Smithing Stone [4] - Raya Lucaria Academy
description: Looted from a corpse on the balcony behind an illusory wall. From the Schoolhouse Classroom site of Raya Lucaria Academy, go to the hallway, turn left. The illusory wall is in front of the corpse inside the room.

name: Olivinus Glintstone Crown
description: Looted from a corpse on a narrow path that leads back to the Schoolhouse Classroom site  of Raya Lucaria Academy. You need to pass through the illusory wall and jump over the balcony on the left, and circle back to the said site of grace. To find the illusory wall, go to the hallway from the schoolhouse classroom site, turn left. The illusory wall is in front of the corpse inside the room.

name: Debate Hall Site of Grace
description: Site of Grace found on the third floor of the Schoolhouse Classroom building. Available to use after defeating the boss Red Wolf of Radagon.

name: Memory Stone - Raya Lucaria Academy
description: Rewarded as a drop upon defeating Red Wolf of Radagon.

name: Stonesword Key (B) - Raya Lucaria Academy
description: Looted on a fountain, center of the academy's courtyard.

name: Glintstone Firefly - 5x Raya Lucaria Academy
description: You can find x5 Glintstone Firefly Looted off a corpse, north section of the courtyard.

name: Golden Seed - Raya Lucaria Academy
description: 1 can be found on the ground, next to the glowing sapling. West of the academy's courtyard.

name: Karolos Glintstone Crown
description: Drops from the Crystallized Crab that can be found by a corner on the west side of the academy's courtyard.

name: Glintstone Whetblade
description: Looted off a corpse that is hanging on the fence of an office balcony. From the fountain of the academy's courtyard, go west and head up the slope. The office is in front of the group of kneeling Noble Zombies.

name: Golden Rune (3) - Raya Lucaria Academy (A)
description: Looted off a corpse that is hanging on a balcony fence that you can jump over to reach the rooftops. West side of the academy's courtyard.

name: Golden Rune (4) - Raya Lucaria Academy (A)
description: Looted off a corpse that's sitting on a ledge. Past the first two Marionette Soldiers, you encounter on the rooftops of the academy.

name: Smithing Stone [3] - Raya Lucaria Academy
description: Looted off a corpse in the rooftops section of Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Imbued Sword Key - Raya Lucaria Academy
description: Key Item used to activate a Waygate. It can be looted off a corpse found on the east side of the Raya Lucaria Academy rooftops.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [4] - Raya Lucaria Academy
description: Looted off a corpse that can be found in a small room with some small crabs. Located at the rooftops section of Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Golden Rune (3) - Raya Lucaria Academy (B)
description: Pillaged from a corpse located on a wooden beam of the Church of the Cuckoo ceiling. The only way though is going through the broken glass window of the church via the rooftops of Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Stonesword Key - Northwest Mt. Gelmir
description: Key Item. Found under a large burnt tree near the cliffs.

name: Academy Glintstone Key (B)
description: Looted off a corpse that's on the chandelier of Church of the Cuckoo. The only way to reach this is going through the broken glass window of the church via the rooftops of Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Shattering Crystal
description: Looted off a corpse on the second floor, west side, of the Church of the Cuckoo in Raya Lucaria Academy. The only way to reach this is going through the broken glass window of the church via the rooftops

name: Twinsage Glintstone Crown
description: Drops from a Crystallized Crab once killed. You'll find it outside the second-floor balcony, east section of the Church of the Cuckoo in Raya Lucaria Academy. It's hiding by the corner of the scaffolding.

name: Hermit's Shack
description: A small shack found south of the volcano.

name: Smithing Stone [5] B - Raya Lucaria Academy
description: Looted off a corpse at the end of the cut out steps of the Iron ball trap.

name: Roiling Magma
description: Sorcery. Found on a corpse inside the Hermit's Shack.

name: Crystal Dart - Raya Lucaria Academy
description: Looted off a corpse on the broken beam connected to the stars of the Iron ball trap.

name: Grafted Scion
description: A Grafted Scion can be found at the destroyed camp across the stone pillar, at the bottom of the cliffs.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy F
description: Looted off a corpse in the middle part of the Iron Ball trap stairs.

name: Raya Lucaria Academy Waygate
description: A Teleporter Waygate located past the Iron ball trap. Transports users to the Church of Vows.

name: Soporific Grease (B)
description: 2 Soporific Grease can be found on one of the bodies in the destroyed camp at the bottom of the cliff here across the stone pillar.

name: Craftsman's Shack
description: A series of wooden huts found directly south of the volcano.

name: Craftsman's Shack
description: Site of Grace found inside the Craftsman's Shack.

name: Hermit Village
description: A secluded village found southeast of the volcano.

name: Sacramental Bud (A)
description: A Sacramental Bud can be found at the edge of the cliffs, red buds on a small white tree.

name: Great Rune of the Unborn
description: Great Rune of Rennala, Queen of the Moon. Acquired as a reward for defeating the supreme sorceress.

name: Remembrance of the Full Moon Queen
description: Remembrance of Rennala, Queen of the Moon. Acquired as a reward for defeating the supreme sorceress. To be given to Enia to draw out the power within.

name: Seluvis's Introduction
description: A scroll given by Seluvis. It is addressed to Sorceress Sellen

name: Hierodas Glintstone Crown
description: Can be looted from a corpse behind a house on the southern end of the village.

name: Nascent Butterfly
description: An exceedingly rare butterfly to find, can be found west on the edge of the mountain near the Ninth Mt. Gelmir Campsite Site of Grace.

name: Azur's Glintstone Staff
description: Looted on the ground inside a room that is full of crystals. It's on the east side, the second floor of the Church of the Cuckoo within Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Glintstone Scarab
description: Found inside a chest. From the garden section where you encountered the hostile NPC Moongrum Carian Knight, go west, by the gate, hug the wall and jump over the fence. Follow the path and then climb the ladder. The chest is inside the room at the top of the ladder.

name: Radagon Icon
description: Found inside a treasure chest on the second floor of the Debate Hall Site of Grace. From the gate entrance leading to the courtyard, make a hard right and jump over the fence. Climb up the ladder and head through the broken glass window. The treasure chest is on the east section.

name: Primeval Sorcerer Azur
description: Mysterious NPC. Hands you the Comet Azur spell after interacting with them.

name: Thops (Deceased)
description: If you give him the Academy Glintstone Key that you find in Raya Lucaria Academy, you'll find him dead, sitting in a chair, outside the Schoolhouse Classroom Site. You can loot the following from his body: Thops's Bell Bearing, Academy Glintstone Staff, and Thops's Barrier.

name: Cuckoo Glintstone (E)
description: Crafting Material. Found on the body of the soldier shot to death by the surrounding Marionette Soldiers.

name: Comet Azur
description: Sorcery. Acquired from Primeval Sorcerer Azur.

name: Carian Knight Set
description: The Carian Knight Set can be picked up next to a large tombstone, past the graveyard section of Raya Lucaria Academy. When you reach the gate entrance leading to the large rotating lift, make a hard right and look below the ledge, jump down and follow the narrow path where you'll see a group of Glintstone Zombies worshipping a tombstone.

name: Longtail Cat Talisman
description: Looted off a corpse that can be found at the bottom section of the large rotating lift. Past the graveyard section of Raya Lucaria Academy, simply ride the lift down and defeat the single Pendulum Statue enemy.

name: Sacramental Bud (B)
description: 2 small white plants with red Sacramental Buds can be found on a cliff in Mt. Gelmir. On the edge of the cliffside down the ladder from the Nomadic Merchant Mt. Gelmir.

name: Gelmir Hero's Grave
description: Optional Dungeon. The entrance can be reached by walking along the long jagged rock extending from the north of Hermit Village across the chasm.

name: Gelmir Hero's Grave
description: Site of Grace found inside the Gelmir Hero's Grave, near the entrance after descending the lift.

name: Demi-Human Queen Maggie
description: Optional Boss. Found in the northeast section of Hermit Village. Drops a Memory Stone and Golden Rune (1) upon defeat.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (6)
description: Found on a body sat on a chair overlooking the edge, there is a wolf sat next to them.

name: Memory Stone - Hermit Village
description: Memory Slot Upgrade Material. Dropped by Demi-Human Queen Maggie upon defeat.

name: Golden Rune
description: Dropped by Demi-Human Queen Maggie upon defeat.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (8) A
description: Upgrade Material. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found sitting on a fallen tree in central Dragonbarrow. Warning: This scarab explodes upon death, dealing massive damage!

name: Morne Tunnel
description: Morne Tunnel can be found in Weeping Peninsula. To reach it jump down towards the bottom of the canyon next to Ailing Village in Weeping Peninsula.

name: Lenne's Rise. (Site of Grace)
description: Site of Grace at the entrance of Lenne's Rise

name: Lenne's Rise
description: Tower located at the eastern part of Caelid.

name: Farum Greatbridge
description: Site of grace of the Farum Greatbridge

name: Gargoyle's Black Halberd
description: Dropped by  Black Blade Kindred

name: Gargoyle's Blackblade
description: Greatsword dropped by  Black Blade Kindred

name: Scaly Misbegotten
description: Optional Boss, found within Mourne Tunnel. Drops  Rusted Anchor

name: Rusted Anchor
description: Greataxe dropped by Scaly Misbegotten located in Morne Tunnel.

name: Isolated Merchant's Shack (Dragonbarrow)
description: Secluded hut found in western Dragonbarrow.

name: Isolated Merchant's Shack (Dragonbarrow)
description: Site of Grace found inside the Isolated Merchant's Shack.

name: Isolated Merchant Dragonbarrow
description: General Goods vendor found sitting outside his shack in western Dragonbarrow.

name: Elder Dragon Greyoll
description: Massive boss surrounded by dragons. Drops 10,845 Runes and x5  Dragon Heart

name: Dragon Heart (Elder Dragon Greyoll)
description: Key Item. 5x dropped by  Elder Dragon Greyoll upon defeat.

name: Fort Faroth
description: Site of Grace found just outside the fort.

name: Golden Rune (1) J
description: Next to a big arch structure, besides a large rock.

name: String
description: Dropped by killed Demi-Humans during an ambush.

name: Dectus Medallion (Right)
description: Key Quest Item. Found in a chest atop the eastern tower in Fort Faroth, accessible via ladder past all the bats on the bottom level.

name: Fort Faroth
description: Fort found in eastern Dragonbarrow, behind an very massive dragon.

name: Grand Lift of Dectus
description: A massive lift that connects the Altus Plateau to Liurnia. Requires collection of both Dectus Medallion (Left) and Dectus Medallion (Right) to activate.

name: Starscourge Radahn
description: One of the Shardbearers. Drops Remembrance of the Starscourge,  Radahn's Great Rune

name: Fallingstar Beast Jaw
description: Colossal Weapon Dropped by  Full-Grown Fallingstar Beast

name: Golden Rune (1) K
description: 2 Golden Runes (1) on top of a big stone, accessible by Spirit Jumping.

name: Warpick
description: Looted from one of the many Undead Soldiers.

name: Remembrance of the Starscourge
description: Dropped  Starscourge Radahn

name: Radahn's Great Rune
description: Dropped by Starscourge Radahn

name: Dagger
description: Looted from a Foot Soldier upon defeat.

name: Elemer of the Briar
description: Found inside  The Shaded Castle. Drops  Marais Executioner's Sword and Briar Greatshield

name: Briar Greatshield
description: Dropped by  Elemer of the Briar

name: Marais Executioner's Sword
description: Dropped by Elemer of the Briar

name: Radagon's Scarseal
description: Dropped by  Ancient Hero of Zamor

name: Lhutel the Headless
description: Dropped by the  Cemetery Shade inside the Tombsward Catacombs

name: Noble Sorcerer Ashes
description: Dropped by the Erdtree Burial Watchdog inside the Stormfoot Catacombs.

name: Golden Rune (1) - 3x Bridge of Sacrifice
description: There's 1 Golden Rune (1) prior to the Bridge of Sacrifice, on the Limgrave side. There are other two at the bridge, one between the wooden barricades and the other as a drop from the enemies.

name: Dragon Communion Seal
description: Found in the Fringefolk Hero's Grave. Progress down the tunnel with the mechanized chariot until the path splits and you can go either up or down. Go up until you reach the end of the tunnel and inside the small room is an enemy that once killed will give you the weapon.

name: Erdtree's Favor
description: Head down until you see the path narrow on both sides and drop just at the edge where it begins to find a secret area. Defeat the imps and proceed past the fire trap to find the item resting at an altar. Two Grafted Scions wait hanging above, so be sure to avoid them when they land and grab it really quickly

name: Sage Set
description: Armor Set comprised of the Sage Hood, Sage Robe and Sage Trousers. Can be found in Stillwater Cave - Liurnia of the Lakes, just ahead and below the Lake Facing Cliffs. Sitting on a poison submerged corpse near the end, guarded by Giant Bats that will attack you when you take it.

name: Flame Crest Wooden Shield
description: You can loot the Flame Crest Wooden Shield from a Slender Wayfarer's corpse inside one of the cabins.

name: 4x Arteria Leaf (B)
description: 4x Arteria Leaf on the west side of Ailing Village, behind the cabins.

name: Grace Mimic (B)
description: Found on a dead body on the way.

name: Golden Rune (4) C
description: Found right next to a huge stone, on the ground.

name: Dragon Greatclaw
description: Colossal Weapon that drops from the  Draconic Tree Sentinel

name: Dragonclaw Shield
description: Greatshield that drops from the Draconic Tree Sentinel

name: Leaden Hardtear
description: Dropped by the Ulcerated Tree Spirit

name: Map (Weeping Peninsula)
description: Map for all of Weeping Peninsula. Found

name: Ordovis's Greatsword
description: Drops by Crucible Knight Ordovis

name: Crucible Axe Set
description: Dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis Boss. It contains: Crucible Axe Armor, Crucible Axe Helm, Crucible Gauntlets and Crucible Greaves.

name: Crucible Knight & Crucible Knight Ordovis
description: Dual Bossfight against Crucible Knight and Crucible Knight Ordovis.

name: Aspects of the Crucible: Horns
description: Incantation. Dropped by Crucible Knightfound at the bottom floor of the Rampart Tower

name: Omenkiller Rollo
description: Dropped by Fell Twins

name: Dragon Heart (Borealis the Freezing Fog)
description: Dropped by Borealis, The Freezing Fog

name: Gargoyle's Black Axe
description: Dropped by Black Blade Kindred.

name: Gargoyle's Black Blades
description: Dropped by Black Blade Kindred

name: Rivers of Blood
description: Katana dropped by NPC invader  Bloody Finger Okina. Spawns near the Church of Repose in the later areas of the game.

name: Thawfrost Boluses
description: Consumable. Found in a corpse hiding from a cliff behind an enemy.

name: Altus Tunnel (Site of Grace)
description: Site of Grace found just inside the Altus Tunnel

name: Rune Arc G
description: Consumable Item. Found inside a chest in the first room on the right.

name: Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing (3)
description: Key Item. Unlocks Somberstone (5) and (6) upgrade materials sale at the Twinmaiden Husks in the Roundtable Hold. Found in a corpse just outside the First Church of Marika

name: First Church of Marika
description: Destroyed Church with a Sacred Tear and Somber Miner's Bell Bearing (3). Offers a respite before a Dragon encounter.

name: Crystal Dart C
description: Looted off a corpse found the second room on the right, where multiple crystal snails can be found.

name: Smithing Stone (5) D
description: Taken from the many yellow crystal clusters found on the walls of the Altus Tunnel.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (5)
description: Taken from a yellow crystal on the walls of the Altus Tunnel

name: Sacred Tear (First Church of Marika)
description: A flask upgrade found within the First Church of Marika

name: Golden Rune (7)
description: Found on the wooden balcony inside the Altus Tunnel.

name: First Church of Marika
description: Site of Grace of the First Church of Marika

name: Woodfolk Ruins
description: East of the Minor Erdtree in Altus Plateau

name: Minor Erdtree (Altus Plateau)
description: Minor Erdtree found in the Altus Plateau

name: Second Church of Marika
description: The Second Church of Marika

name: Grave Glovewort [5] - Wyndham Catacombs
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found shortly after the room with the cleaver traps, in a pile of rubble in the corner.

name: Grave Glovewort [4] - 2x Wyndham Catacombs
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Two are found within the Wyndham Catacombs.The first is found in the room with the cleaver traps, at the back.The second one is found in the sewer area, right where the Golden Order Knight is fought.

name: Ghost Glovewort [6] - Wyndham Catacombs
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found in the sewer area amongst the Putrid Corpses.

name: Magic Grease - Wyndham Ruins
description: Found in the room behind the rusted bars in the sewers. Can be reached by going underneath the raising floor in the spiked room.

name: Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook (1)
description: Found on a body in the Wyndham Catacombs, in the room behind the rusted bars in the sewers. Can be reached by going under the raising floor in the room with the spike ceiling.

name: Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing (1)
description: Dropped by the Erdtree Burial Watchdog boss of the Wyndham Catacombs

name: Smithing Stone (5) E
description: Found on a body within the ruins of Wyndham Ruins

name: Spiritcaller Cave
description: Cave found on the western bank of the frozen lake. Requires two Stonesword Keys to unlock the barrier. Spirit Snails and a double boss await within.

name: Spiritcaller's Cave
description: Site of Grace found within the Spiritcaller's Cave, near the entrance.

name: Whiteridge Road
description: Site of Grace found near the Guardians Garrison.

name: Heretical Rise
description: Puzzle tower that hides the Founding Rain of Stars spell. Unlock the entrance by finding the invisible bridge from the other side of the ravine, and carefully follow the misty path to find the way to enter.

name: Moongrum, Carian Knight
description: Moongrum, Carian Knight. The last line of denfense before reaching Rennala's arena. Drops the Carian Knight's Shield upon defeating the hostile NPC.

name: Founding Rain of Stars
description: Glinstone Sorcery. Found inside a chest at the top of Heretical Rise. You must access the tower by crossing an invisible bridge from the other side of the ravine.

name: Guardians' Garrison
description: A garrison of Fire Priests guard the path to the Giant Forge.

name: Smoldering Butterfly (C)
description: Crafting Material. 6 are found on a corpse by an active fire inside Guardian's Garrison.

name: Smithing Stone [7] - 1x Guardian's Garrison
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse in the upper ramparts of Guardian's Garrison. A Flame Guardian is protecting it.

name: Chief Guardian Arghanthy
description: NPC Mini-Boss, attacks with quick Fire spells. Drops One-Eyed Shield when defeated.

name: Golden Rune [10] - 1x Guardian's Garrison
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse on the ledge past some barrels near the entrance to Guardian's Garrison.

name: One-Eyed Shield
description: Shield. Dropped by mini-boss NPC Chief Guardian Arghanthy inside Guardian's Garrison.

name: Giant's Prayerbook
description: Key Item. Give to a Cleric to unlock Incantations: Giantsflame Take Thee and Flame, Fall Upon Them for purchase.

name: Warming Stone (Church of Irith Graveyard)
description: Consumable. 3x Warming Stone on a graveyard protected by several undead.

name: Stormhawk Axe
description: 2x Found under the bridge leading from the swamp up to Village of the Albinaurics.

name: Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right)
description: Key Item. Hit Albus, who is disguised as a pot past the Perfumer guarding the path up from the Village of the Albinaurics Site of Grace. This medallion opens the path to a secret location past Lyndell.

name: Grand Lift of Rold
description: Elevator connecting Lyndell and Mountaintop of the Giants. Can also be used to access Consecrated Grounds, by those who have obtained the Haligtree Medallion pieces.

name: Hyetta (Fourth location)
description: Hyetta moves here if you have given her shabiri grapes at her previous locations.

name: Golden Rune (3) C
description: Found on a body lying at the top of a pillar.

name: Golden Rune (3) D
description: Found on a body laid by the wall, surrounded by 4 Poison Slugs

name: Golden Seed (K)
description: Flask upgrade material. Found along the main road, while heading to the Bestial Sanctum

name: Shaded Castle Ramparts
description: Site of Grace found on top of one part of the Castle Ramparts

name: Champion's Song Painting
description: Champion's Song painting found in a small wooden structure on the side of the walls in The Shaded Castle

name: Smithing Stone (4) D
description: Found on a body within a roofed wooden structure, just up the stairs on the ledge.

name: Gravel Stone B
description: Crafting Material, found in the middle of the lake. Before of the lurking Dragons in the area.

name: Drawstring Fire Grease
description: Found on a body on the corner of the rocks within The Shaded Castle

name: Golden Rune (6) C
description: Found on a body inside the walls, on top of a broken wooden platform jutting out from the ground.

name: Golden Rune (5) - North Caelid
description: Found at the edge of the lake where the dragons dwell.

name: Smithing Stone (5) F
description: Found on a body near the large dead tree in the space between the rocks and the walls.

name: Neutralizing Boluses
description: Found on a body on the walls of The Shaded Castle.

name: Ghost Glovewort (4)
description: Found on one of the rocks near the dead tree at the western end of the outer courtyard of The Shaded Castle

name: Somber Smithing Stone (5) B
description: Found on a body by the dead tree on the western end of the outer courtyard of The Shaded Castle

name: Smithing Stone (5) G
description: Found on a body in the corner behind the Large Poisonflower

name: Valkyrie's Prosthesis
description: Found in a chest in the room guarded by a single Cleanrot Knight on the North Western edge of The Shaded Castle

name: Golden Rune (6) D
description: Found on a body sat in front of a series of Tombstones in the Courtyard

name: Perfume Bottle
description: Found on a body at the edge of the top part of the ramparts, a large Poison Skeleton can be found on the wooden bridge underneath.

name: Smoldering Butterfly (B)
description: Found at the base of a Stonegrave.

name: Smithing Stone (5) H
description: Found on a body in the corner atop the walls.

name: Rot Grease
description: Found on a body in the middle of the raised Garden looking area in the middle of The Shaded Castle main keep area where.

name: Gold Firefly x2
description: 2 Gold fireflies can be found on a body at the end of a room full of statues. There are 2 Page enemies within this room as well, 1 hidden behind the statues and one on top of the stairs.

name: Smithing Stone (5) I
description: Found on a body being chewed on by a Zombie Dog in the northwest corner of the upper courtyard.

name: Capital Rampart
description: Site of grace on the eastern side of the Capital.

name: Minor Erdtree Church
description: Found outside the west gate to Leyndell Capital City surrounding a Minor Erdtree..

name: Golden Order Seal
description: Found right at the base of the Minor Erdtree surrounded by the remains of the Church.

name: Minor Erdtree Church
description: The Site of Grace is right in front of the Erdtree.

name: Golden Centipede
description: There are many Golden Centipede right at the base of the Erdtree around it.

name: Icerind Hatchet
description: Axe found inside a chest in the Temple Quarter. The chest is located inside a ruined building.

name: Magic Grease (C)
description: Consumable, found at the corridor past the elevator, on a body to the righ side wall.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy G
description: Found at the end of the corridor past the elevator, on a body to your left side.

name: Ash of War: Prayerful Strike
description: On the lake under the short rocky tunnel, dropped by the invisible mob that leaves paw prints on its path.

name: Sealed Tunnel
description: Found at the south end of the river outside the west gate to Leyndell Royal Capital.

name: Golden Rune (10)
description: In the platform where you fight the improved Trumpeteer, against the wall.

name: Sealed Tunnel
description: A few meters inside the Tunnel,

name: Golden Rune (5) A
description: Found on a dead body hanging from a wooden structure not too far inside the Sealed Tunnel.

name: Smithing-Stone Miner's Bell Bearing (2)
description: Found in a chest inside the first secret area in the Sealed Tunnel.

name: Smithing Stone (5) H
description: Midway of the elevator track at the second hidden area of Sealed Tunnel.

name: Lance Talisman
description: Found at the north of Limgrave past the main road close to the edge.

name: Smithing Stone (4)
description: After defeating the first enhanced Trumpeteer, drop down to the platform below, and enter the room in the back. Beware of the assassin hidden inside.

name: Comet
description: Found behind an Illusory Wall before the Debate Hall Site of Grace.

name: Golden Rune (7)
description: Just in front of the Broken Statue. You can kill it from behind if you take an alternate route, allowing you to grab this item without much of a hassle.

name: Preserving Boluses (B)
description: Inside the next room, after you get down the lift. Beware of the lurking enemies.

name: Stonesword Key (A) - Raya Lucaria Academy
description: Found in Raya Lucaria through an Illusory Wall just before the Site of Grace at Debate Parlor.

name: Perfume Bottle - Leyndell, Royal Capital (A)
description: Found inside a chest, within the second floor on the tower next to the East Rampart.

name: Graven-School Talisman
description: Found up the ladder close to the Debate Hall Site of Grace and then down the hole to another the room with potboys.

name: Upper-Class Robe
description: Found at the end of tha passageway. Beware of the Bedouin on your left side.

name: Seedbed Curse - East Leyndell, Royal Capital
description: At the big room, before you fight the Bedouins take the stairs all the way up. You will find it on a body that's is sitting on a chair, in the middle of the room.

name: Miranda Powder
description: Once you are back inside, roll onto the blocked door, and loot this on your left. You will get x10 Miranda Powder.

name: Dragon Cult Prayerbook
description: Dropped by a knight patrolling immediately south of the Liurnia Artist Shack

name: Red Branch Shortbow
description: Drops from an Assassin on the study, past the  Trumpeteer

name: Lordsworn's Straight Sword (B)
description: Dropped by a head-less, undead Soldier at Fourth Church of Marika.

name: Golden Rune (10) B
description: On the big room, before the big spartan-like enemy. You can find this on the left side.

name: Fan Daggers
description: Found at the end of the alley on your left, beware of the enemy hiding behind the wall.

name: Golden Rune (8)
description: Found on between the bushes to the right of a big staircase.

name: Stonesword Key - Sealed Tunnel
description: Found at the end of the third secret area in Sealed Tunnel.

name: Gael Tunnel
description: Alexander can be found inside for the second time.

name: Iron Fist Alexander (Second Location)
description: Found inside Gael Tunnel, at the rear entrance. After talking to him, he sets off to Redmane Castle

name: Troll Knight's Sword
description: Dropped by a Troll Knight.

name: Moonveil
description: Katana. Dropped by Magma Wyrm inside  Gael Tunnel.

name: Gael Tunnel (Site of Grace)
description: Site of grace located inside  Gael Tunnel. Found once you reach the lower level.

name: Magma Wyrm
description: Found inside Gael Tunnel. Drops x1  Dragon Heart and  Moonveil

name: Gold-Pickled Fowl Foot B
description: Found on a dead body hanging from a big root that can be used as a bridge at the third hidden area in Sealed Tunnel.

name: Dragon Heart F
description: Dropped from Magma Wyrm at Gael Tunnel

name: Sorceress Sellen (Third Location)
description: Found standing behind two illusory walls in a room. But she doesn't respond.

name: Hero's Rune (2)
description: On a body against a wall, beware of the soldier and the lion guarding it.

name: Sorceress Sellen (Second Location)
description: Sorceress Sellen alternative location.

name: Misbegotten Shortbow
description: There are flying enemies at the top of the castle. Thet may drop this weapon when killed.

name: Golem Greatbow
description: Dropped by Golem Archer.

name: Golden Rune (5) B
description: Found at the shore surrounded by Skeleton enemies.

name: Pidia, Carian Servant
description: Pidia is a Merchant. Can be found by falling down from the cliff at Three Sisters.

name: Shamshir
description: Found inside the Highroad Cave, on a platform after the waterfall section, being feasted on by Giant Bats.

name: Godslayer's Seal
description: Found in a room barred by an Imp Statue seal, requiring a  to access. From the Rampart Tower, take the lift that leads to the Grafted Scion's hall. Exit into the courtyard where plenty of Castle Guards are mounted on ballistae. Take a hard left from this exit to find a small stairway leading into a cellar. There are several Rats in this cellar and the Imp Statue barrier behind them. The Seal is found in one of the chests behind the barrier.

name: Brick Hammer
description: Can be found on the 3rd floor. It is  in a corpse dangling from a window.You have to access from the 4th floor, using the wooden platforms outside.

name: Pike
description: Can be looted off a corpse that's lying on the heavily guarded courtyard. The nearest checkpoint is the Liftside Chamber site of grace

name: Carian Glintstone Staff
description: Found at the Carian Study Hall.

name: Minor Erdtree (Caelid)
description: Erdtree of Caelid found in the northwest, near the border to Limgrave.

name: Erdtree Avatar (Caelid)
description: Field Boss. Drops Greenburst Crystal Tear and Flame-Shrouding Cracked Tear upon defeat.

name: Greenburst Crystal Tear
description: Physick Flask material. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar guarding this tree.

name: Flame-Shrouding Cracked Tear
description: Physick Flask material. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar guarding this tree.

name: Minor Erdtree Catacombs
description: Optional Dungeon found behind the Erdtree, in the north.

name: Cathedral of Dragon Communion
description: Special Dragon Communion altar can be used to trade Dragon Hearts for Draconic Incantations.

name: Minor Erdtree Catacombs
description: Site of Grace found within the Minor Erdtree Catacombs, a few steps from the entrance.

name: Fort Gael North Site
description: Site of Grace for Fort Gael North in Caelid

name: Fort Gael
description: A ruined fort in a ruined land, Fort Gael looms above the surrounding landscape, vicious roars can be heard within.

name: Stonesword Key - Shaded Castle
description: Found on a body on a stone ledge, reached by traversing the rocks leading from the wall all the way to the ledge. A set of slugs can be found underneath looking at the body

name: Perfumer's Cookbook [2]
description: Found a body on the chair looking over the edge of the walls in the northern part of The Shaded Castle.

name: Katar
description: Looted from a treasure chest in Fort Gael. You can find the chest inside a dark room on the elevated platform above the Lion Guardian.

name: Erdtree Burial Watchdog (Minor Erdtree Catacombs)
description: Duo boss fight against a Watchdog wielding a Sword and another wielding a Scepter. Drops the Mad Pumpkin Head Ashes upon defeat.

name: Rune Arc H
description: Looted off a corpse next to the locked gate of Fort Gael.

name: Mad Pumpkin Head Ashes
description: Spirit Summon Ash. Dropped by the Erdtree Burial Watchdog duo bosses within the Minor Erdtree Catacombs.

name: Warming Stone (Fort Gael)
description: Looted off a corpse that's hanging on a narrow beam. Bacony/Upper-section of Fort Gael.

name: Ash of War: Lion's Claw
description: Drops from the Lion Guardian in Fort Gael upon defeating it.

name: Starscourge Heirloom
description: Looted from a chest in Fort Gael. It's outside the watchtower on the upper-section of the fort, under a canopy tent.

name: Fort Gael Waygate Teleporter
description: Located at the top of the watchtower of Fort Gael.

name: Erdtree Burial Watchdog (Cliffbottom Catacombs)
description: Optional Boss found at the end of the Cliffbottom Catacombs. Drops the Kaiden Sellsword Ashes upon defeat.

name: Erdtree Burial Watchdog (Wyndham Catacombs)
description: Optional boss found at the end of the Wyndham Catacombs. Drops Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing (1) upon defeat.

name: Rune Arc I
description: Consumable item found inside Sellia Crystal Tunnel on a corpse at the end of the wooden walkway, inside the first large cavern ahead of the Site of Grace.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (5) C
description: Upgrade Material. Multiple found inside the Sellia Crystal Tunnel.

name: Smithing Stone (5) J
description: Upgrade Material. Multiple found within the Sellia Crystal Tunnel.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (4) D
description: Upgrade Material. Multiple found inside the Sellia Crystal Tunnel.

name: Rock Blaster
description: Sorcery spell found inside the Sellia Crystal Tunnel. Found in a chest inside a shed at the top of the main cavern.

name: Deep Ainsel Well
description: A small structure that houses a lift that takes players back underground to Astel, Naturalborn of the Void's boss room.

name: Fallingstar Beast
description: Optional Boss found at the end of the Sellia Crystal Tunnel. Drops the Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing (1) as well as 1 x Somber Smithing Stone (6), 5 x Smithing Stone (7) and 4x Gravity Stone Chunk upon defeat.

name: Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing (1)
description: Key Item. Dropped by the Fallingstar Beast at the end of the Sellia Crystal Tunnel upon defeat.

name: Smithing Stone (7) A
description: Upgrade Material. 5x dropped by the Fallingstar Beast at the end of the Sellia Crystal Tunnel upon defeat.

name: Radagon's Soreseal
description: Talisman. Found on a corpse by dropping down the opening on the roof and looking around the wooden walkways.

name: Impassable Greatbridge
description: A heavily guarded great bridge that leads to the Redmane Castle of Caelid.

name: Dragonbarrow Cave
description: Optional Dungeon found in eastern Dragonbarrow. The entrance is found by following the road along the cliffs north of the Minor Erdtree.

name: Bull-Goat's Talisman
description: Talisman. Found on a corpse inside Dragonbarrow Cave.

name: St Trina's Torch
description: Special Torch. Looted from the treasure chest in the caravan wagon carted in the southern portion of Consecrated Ground in the northern lands.

name: Beastman of Farum Azula (Dragonbarrow Cave)
description: Duo Boss encounter against two beastmen at the end of Dragonbarrow Cave. One wielding a Greatsword and one wielding Throwing Knives. Drops the Flamedrake Talisman +2 upon defeat.

name: Hidden Path to the Haligtree
description: Catacombs leading from the Grand Lift of Rold to Consecrated Grounds. Can only be accessed by those who have found both pieces of the Haligtree Secret Medallion

name: Flamedrake Talisman +2
description: Talisman. Dropped by the Beastman of Farum Azuladuo bosses  in Dragonbarrow Cave.

name: Flamedrake Talisman
description: Talisman. Dropped by the Beastman of Farum Azula boss inside Groveside Cave.

name: Dragonbarrow Cave
description: Site of Grace by the entrance to Dragonbarrow Cave.

name: Dark Moon Ring
description: Quest Item. Found in a locked chest next to the Raya Lucaria Grand Library Site of Grace. Unlocked using the Discarded Palace Key.

name: Waygate (Consecrated Snowfield)
description: Waygate. Teleports you across the ravine to the northern side of the river.

name: Ordina, Liturgical Town
description: It's easy to find once you gain access to Consecrated Snowfield. Loot is only found by interacting with the Evergaol.

name: Black Knife Set
description: Full Set found under an arch. Includes Black Knife Hood, Black Knife Armor, Black Knife Gauntlets and Black Knife Greaves.

name: Partisan - Limgrave
description: A Partisan Spear that can be dropped from a Godrick Knight in Fort Haight.

name: Imp Head (Elder)
description: Found as a treasure inside Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs. Inside a room on the second floor, guarded by a Burial Tree Watchdog.

name: Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak
description: Dropped by the Boss of Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs in Consecrated Snowfield, Putrid Grave Warden Duelist.

name: Rotten Duelist Greaves
description: Leggings dropped by the large rotten duelist enemy guarding the rear of Ordina, Liturgical Town.

name: Rotten Greataxe
description: Colossal Weapon. Dropped by the duelist enemy guarding the rear of Ordina, Liturgical Town

name: Apostate Derelict
description: A ruined church lying in the frozen north-westof the Consecrated Grounds

name: Silver Mirrorshield
description: Shield found in the Apostate Derelict church.

name: Sanguine Noble
description: Invading NPC. Drops Sanguine Set

name: Sanguine Set
description: Full Sanguine Set dropped by Sanguine Noble NPC invasion. Includes Sanguine Noble Hood, Sanguine Noble Robe and Sanguine Noble Waistcloth.

name: Forsaken Ruins
description: Ruins found southeast of the Shack of Rotting in Dragonbarrow.

name: Caelem Ruins
description: Site of Grace found by the main road near some ruins.

name: Caelem Ruins
description: Ruins found on the western portion of Caelid, where the Caelid Highway cuts through.

name: Mad Pumpkin Head (Caelem Ruins)
description: Dual Boss Fight against two Mad Pumpkin Heads. They are found in an underground room, the entrance to which is in the eastern side of the ruins. No drops but allows access to a treasure room upon defeat.

name: Visage Shield
description: Greatshield. Found in a chest in a small room behind the Mad Pumpkin Head duo bosses. Accessible after defeating them.

name: Hand Ballista
description: At the top of the Forest Lookout Tower, west of the Bridge of Sacrifice.

name: Boc the Seamster (Sixth Location)
description: Boc appears in the East Capital Rampart site of grace. You have to rest at this Site of Grace for him to appear. He offers his sewing services as well as makes some conversation regarding the Erdtree.

name: Crystal Burst
description: Drops from the Demi-Human Queen mini-boss in the  Demi-Human Forest Ruins

name: Guardian Golem
description: Found within the  Highroad Cave. Drops  Blue Dancer Charm

name: Blue Dancer Charm
description: Dropped by the Guardian Golem within  Highroad Cave

name: Prince of Death's Pustule
description: Looted off a corpse that can be found at the pit of the castle's crypt after defeating the Ulcerated Tree Spirit. The body can be found next to a giant face.

name: Shield of the Guilty
description: In the cellar area of the  Demi-Human Forest Ruins, before the main building with the Demi-Human Queen mini-boss. You will need to jump over a wall to access the stairs leading into the cellar.

name: Cross-Naginata
description: Spear. Found on a corpse inside the Gael Tunnel, in the cavern filled with Land Octopi and a single Giant Land Octopus.

name: Ash of War: Wild Strikes
description: Dropped from a  Teardrop Scarab located in the middle of the path leading from the Stormhill Shack site of grace to the Castleward Tunnel site of grace.

name: Eclipse Crest Heater Shield
description: Ledge of the pillar near Tombsward Site of Grace. Can be reached from the ledge near Minor Erdtree

name: Rear Gael Tunnel Entrance
description: Site of Grace found by the rear entrance to Gael Tunnel.

name: Rampartside Path
description: Site of grace found at the western side of Leyndell.

name: Land Octopus Ovary B
description: Crafting Material, found against the wall, on a small campsite where two Ghost Jellyfish dwell.

name: Golden Rune (6) B
description: Found as you enter the cemetery, on the left side on a grave.

name: Silver-Pickled Fowl Foot (B)
description: Further in the cemetery, past the Golden Rune (6),

name: Golden Rune (3)
description: Located in the cemetery to the right side.

name: Black Knife Assassin (Altus Plateau)
description: Optional boss found at the entrance of  Sainted Hero's Grave. Drops  Black Knife

name: Black Knife
description: Dagger dropped from the Black Knife Assassin

name: Sainted Hero's Grave (Site of Grace)
description: Site of grace inside the Sainted Hero's Grave

name: Starscourge Radahn
description: Site of Grace unlocked after defeating Starscourge Radahn.

name: Stonesword Key - Divine Tower of Caelid (Caelid)
description: Stonesword Key. Found on a corpse on a ledge on the outside of the tower. Accessible via careful platforming.

name: Divine Tower of Caelid
description: Divine Tower located in central Dragonbarrow. Accessed via careful platforming.

name: Castellan's Hall
description: Site of Grace that shows up after defeating the Boss in The Shaded Castle

name: Divine Tower of Caelid: Center
description: Site of Grace found on a balcony in the middle floor of the Divine Tower. This is where you enter the tower initially by carefully platforming along the outer edge of the tower.

name: Smithing Stone (1)
description: Held by a corpse sitting against a grave, surrounded by Spirit Jellyfishes and Skeleton Enemies.

name: Grave Glovewort [1] - Murkwater Cave
description: Multiple found inside Murkwater Catacombs.

name: Divine Tower of West Altus
description: The entrance to the Divine Tower of West Altus is found at the end of the Sealed Tunnel after going past many illusory walls.

name: Divine Tower of West Altus Gate
description: The Site of Grace can be found before the great entrance door to the Divine Tower.

name: Divine Tower of Caelid: Basement
description: Site of Grace found at the bottom of the tower, after a long platforming section to descend the central area of the tower.

name: Godskin Apostle (Caelid)
description: Great Enemy. Found at the basement of the Divine Tower of Caelid (See page for how to reach). Drops the Godskin Apostle Set upon defeat.

name: Godskin Apostle Set
description: Armor set comprised of the Godskin Apostle Hood, Godskin Apostle Robe, Godskin Apostle Bracers and Godskin Apostle Trousers. Dropped by the Godskin Apostle boss at the bottom of the Divine Tower of Caelid upon his defeat.

name: Godslayer's Greatsword
description: Greatsword found in a chest in a room behind the Godskin Apostle's arena at the Divine Tower of Caelid after defeating him.

name: Rune Arc
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse underground in the  Sealed Tunnel.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (5)
description: Upgrade Material. Found standing in a corner of the tunnels in the Sealed Tunnel.

name: Onyx Lord
description: Enemy. Found in the  Sealed Tunnel blocking the path to the  Divine Tower of West Altus.

name: Poisonbone Dart
description: Found on a body in the middle of the poisoned area in the east side of the wall

name: Onyx Lord's Greatsword
description: Curved Greatsword. Dropped by the Onyx Lord when defeated.

name: Hefty Beast Bone x4
description: Found on a body on the walkway up in the castle area, to the right when exiting the first room after the ladder up.

name: Caelid Waypoint Ruins
description: A set of ruins found in the southwest of Caelid, along the highway.

name: Poisonbloom
description: Crafting Material. 4x found on a corpse sitting at the end of the cliffs.

name: Meteoric Ore Blade
description: Katana. Found inside a chest in a small room at the back of an underground hall filled with sarcophagi and Prawn Miners enemies. The entrance is found in the northwest section of the ruins.

name: Volcano Cave
description: A cave found at the top of a mountain.

name: Volcano Cave
description: Site of Grace located by the entrance to Volcano Cave.

name: Demi-Human Queen Margot
description: Optional Field Boss. Found in the lowest level of the Volcano Cave.

name: Jar Cannon
description: Ballista. Dropped by Demi-Human Queen Margot when defeated.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (5)
description: Upgrade Material. Dropped by Full-Grown Fallingstar Beast.

name: Smithing Stone (6) x5
description: Dropped by Full-Grown Fallingstar Beast.

name: Waygate to Mohgwyn Palace
description: Waygate. Teleports players to the underground area beneath Caelid, called Mohgwyn Palace

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [23]
description: On a corpse lying by the road soon after the first Site of Grace of the area.

name: Map (Consecrated Snowfield)
description: Map for all of Consecrated Snowfield: follow the road north past the snowstorm until you go down and cross a frozen river, then you will spot the map pillar ahead.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [8] Consecrated Snowfield
description: Upgrade Material. Defeat a Teardrop Scarab to obtain it.

name: Lump of Flesh
description: Crafting Material. Found on a corpse on the field.

name: Rejuvenating Boluses
description: Consumable Item. Found on a corpse by jumping on a trap to access a higher area of the Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs.

name: Sword of St. Trina
description: Found inside a chest in the underground cellar of the Forsaken Ruins.

name: Smithing Stone (4) E
description: Looted at the Forsaken Ruins.

name: Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook (3)
description: Cookbook item found at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion. Looted off a corpse tucked under the dragon's chest.

name: Golden Rune (5) - Forsaken Ruins
description: Looted at the Forsaken Ruins.

name: Night's Cavalry (Liurnia)
description: Night's Cavalry Miniboss found patrolling near the Gate Town Bridge. Only appears at night. Drops Ash of War: Ice Spear

name: Ash of War: Ice Spear
description: Ash of War. Dropped by the Night's Cavalry miniboss roaming near the broken bridge upon defeat. Only appears at night.

name: Highway Lookout Tower
description: Tower overlooking the highway of Liurnia's eastern landmass.

name: Golden Seed
description: Found right next to the road in western Altus Plateau.

name: Sellia Gateway
description: Gateway leading to Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

name: Gowry's Shack
description: A lone shack found below the eastern hills near Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

name: Gowry
description: Quest NPC. A once great Sage living in isolation. Found inside his shack near Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

name: Sellia, Town of Sorcery
description: A once-great town renowned for its study of the sorcerous arts. Now lying in ruin, the ghosts of its former scholars still roam the streets.

name: Ash of War: Lightning Ram
description: Dropped from a Teardrop Scarab.

name: x2 Golden Rune (6)
description: Found over the sarcophagi directly to the southof Sainted Hero's Grave There are also 2 Golden Rune (4)  nearby.

name: x2 Golden Rune (4)
description: Found over the sarcophagi directly to the southof Sainted Hero's Grave There are also 2 Golden Rune (6)  nearby.

name: Poison Grease (A)
description: Consumable Item. 2x found on a corpse under a dead tree in the eastern section of town.

name: Stormcaller Church
description: A small church located on a steppe. There is a  Sacred Tear inside.

name: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [3]
description: Cookbook Key Item. Found on a corpse on a wooden walkway in an upper level of the Highway Lookout Tower.

name: Carian Glintblade Staff
description: Staff. Found on the top floor of the Highway Lookout Tower.

name: Sacred Tear (Stormcaller Church)
description: Found inside Stormcaller Church

name: Dragonbolt Blessing
description: Found inside a chest at Stormcaller Church

name: Bower of Bounty
description: Site of grace in the middle of the forest.

name: Tombsward Cave
description: Tombsward Cave is an optional dungeon in Elden Ring. You'll come across a poisonous swamp once you reach deeper within the cave.

name: Redmane Painting
description: Key Info Item. Found as a large painting under some rubble near the center of town.

name: Soft Cotton
description: Found against a wall, surrounded by snails.

name: Ash of War: Double Slash
description: Ash of War. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found high up on a very large root. Accessible by jumping across the rooftops.

name: Invigorating White Cured Meat
description: Found in the middle of the  Woodfolk Ruins

name: Icon Shield
description: Found inside a crumbling building. Beware of the enemies inside.

name: Volcano Manor
description: The manor of a lord looking to rebel against the Erdtree.

name: Stonesword Key - Sellia, Town of Sorcery (Caelid)
description: Stonesword Key. Found on a corpse sitting high above on a ledge connecting two buildings. Accessible by jumping across the rooftops.

name: Heart of Aeonia
description: Site of grace in the heart of the Aeonia Swamp

name: Drawing-Room Key
description: Key Item. Given by Tanith after pledging your allegiance to the Volcano Manor.

name: Wrath of Gold
description: Found at  Woodfolk Ruins. Among the enemies, there is a staircase that goes down and leads to a chest that contains this  Incantation

name: Imbued Sword Key - Sellia, Town of Sorcery
description: Key Item used to activate a Waygate at The Four Belfries. Found in a chest in the northeast section of town. This location is initially sealed by a barrier that can be dispelled by lighting a brazier atop a tower in the southwest of town.

name: Night Comet
description: Sorcery spell. Found in a chest in the central section of town. This location is initially sealed by a barrier that can be dispelled by lighting a brazier atop a tower in the southwest of town.

name: Rya (Second Location)
description: The scout of Volcano Manor.

name: Bernahl (Second Location)
description: Bernahl, Location 2. Merchant and Quest NPC. Sells Ashes of War.

name: Church of the Plague
description: Abandoned church overcome by the decay of rot that pollutes Caelid.

name: Church of the Plague
description: Site of grace found within the Church of the Plague

name: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [2]
description: Found in a corpse just by the Laskyar Ruins Site of Grace. Unlocks crafting of Freezing Grease.

name: Golden Seed (L)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found under a Phantom Tree at the top of the large stairs in the northern section of town.

name: Queen's Bedchamber
description: Site of grace

name: Staff of Loss
description: Glintstone Staff. Found on a corpse leaning over a building's balcony. Accessible by jumping across the rooftops.

name: Letter from Volcano Manor
description: Quest Item. A letter outlining your mission after pledging your services to the Volcano Manor. Found in a room unlocked using the Drawing-Room Key.

name: Nox Flowing Sword
description: Curved Sword. Dropped by the Nox Swordstress & Nox Priest bosses upon defeat.

name: Recusant Finger
description: Multiplayer Item. Found in a locked room with the Letter from Volcano Manor after pledging your services to the Volcano Manor.

name: Lusat's Glintstone Staff
description: Glintstone Staff. Found in a chest in the building north of the Nox Swordstress & Nox Priest bosses' chamber after defeating them.

name: Inquisitor Ghiza
description: NPC Invader. Appears at the far end of the dining room when going up to the upper floor of Volcano Manor.

name: Ghiza's Wheel
description: Colossal Weapon. Dropped by Inquisitor Ghiza in Volcano Manor.

name: Morgott, The Omen King
description: Main Boss. Drops   Remembrance of the Omen King and  Morgott's Great Rune upon defeat.

name: Remembrance of the Omen King
description: Drops from Morgot, The Omen King

name: Morgott's Great Rune
description: Drops from Morgot, The Omen King

name: Aeonian Butterfly
description: 1 Aeonian Butterfly can be found on a body in the middle of the swamp here

name: Smithing Stone [6] A - Volcano Manor
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse in the far side of the dining hall in the upper floor of the Volcano Manor.

name: Sacramental Bud (C)
description: Found on a body sat on a chair here.

name: Sacramental Bud (D)
description: Many sacramental buds can be found within the Church of the Plague

name: Elden Throne
description: Site of grace that appearts on the battlefield where you face  Morgott, the Omen King

name: Cerulean Tear Scarab
description: Helmet. Found on a corpse on the roof of a building. Accessible by jumping across the rooftops.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (4) E
description: Found on a body in the swamp next to a Cleanrot Knight

name: Corpse-Stench Shack
