description: A small shack in northern Mt. Gelmir.

name: Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater B
description: NPC Invader. The second time Anastasia invades is as the player approaches the Corpse-Stench Shack.

name: Ash of War: Sacred Ring of Light
description: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the southeast section of Aeonia Swamp.

name: Viridian Amber Medallion
description: Viridian Amber Medallion Raises maximum stamina. It is dropped by Miranda the Blighted Bloom, found inside the Tombsward Cave.

name: Windmill Heights
description: Site of Grace

name: Windmill Village
description: Site of Grace in the Windmill Village

name: Avenue Balcony
description: Site of Grace on Avenue Balcony.

name: Ash of War: Poisonous Mist
description: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found in the Aeonian Swamp in Caelid

name: Rune Arc J
description: Found on a body on a chair on the outskirts of the Aeonian Swamp in Caelid

name: Smithing Stone (4) F
description: Found on a body sat on a chair on the outskirts of the Aeonian Swamp in Caelid.

name: Crab Eggs (B)
description: Found on a body underneath a broken cart next to a burnt out campfire and a small red tent.

name: Invigorating White Cured Meat (2)
description: Found on a body in the middle of the bridge.

name: Golden Seed (M)
description: Found under a golden tree by the side of the road.

name: Drawstring Fire Grease (B)
description: Turn back from the Forbidden Lands site of grace, head to the body to obtain x2 Drawstring Fire Grease

name: Arrow's Sting Talisman
description: Found in the chest at the top of the tower next to the Impassable Greatbridge.

name: Grand Lift of Rold (Site of Grace)
description: Site of grace, located at the side of the Grand Lift of Rold

name: Death Rite Bird (Central Mountaintops of the Giants)
description: Optional Boss. A large Skeletal Bird found north of Stargazer's Ruins. Drops the Death Ritual Spear upon defeat.

name: Finger Reader (Grand Lift of Rold)
description: Finger Reader found at the base of the Grand Lift of Rold.

name: Map Mountaintops of the Giants, West
description: As you leave the Grand Lift of Rold, take the path forward until tou reach a stone monument on your right, interact with it to obtain the map Fragment.

name: Shabriri
description: Npc that looks exactly like Bloody Finger Hunter Yura. He tells you about "a righteous path to ascension"

name: Freezing Lake
description: Site of grace located by the Freezing Lake

name: Eclipse Crest Greatshield
description: Drops from Mausoleum Knights wielding it in Liurnia of the Lakes (chance to drop, not guaranteed)

name: Millicent (First Location)
description: Millicent can be found in the Church of the Plague slumped against a wall.

name: Map (Mountaintops of The Giants, East)
description: Found at the altar. You can arrive by walking on the chain from the enemy encampment.

name: Digger's Staff
description: Drops from Diggers inside the Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel.

name: Patches (First Location)
description: Location of Patches if forgiven during the Bossfight.

name: Falchion
description: Dropped by Demi-Human enemies under the bridge.

name: Smithing-Stone Miner's Bell Bearing [3]
description: Key Item. Found in an underground area beneath the Zamor Ruins. The entrance is in the southwest section of the ruins.

name: Golden Lineage Evergaol
description: Evergaol located in south-western Altus Plateau. Godfrey the Grafted is imprisoned within.

name: Godefroy the Grafted
description: Optional Boss. Imprisoned within the Golden Lineage Evergaol. Drops the Godfrey Icon upon defeat.

name: Godfrey Icon
description: Talisman. Dropped by Godefroy the Grafted when defeated.

name: Old Lord's Talisman
description: Talisman. Found in a chest in Crumbling Farum Azula. When you get on the large crumbling bridge, instead of going up to the boss, go the opposite way down to a building. Navigate through it and take the ladder down to a bridge connecting to the tower housing the chest.

name: Sellia Backstreets
description: Site of Grace found behind a sealed door in northern Sellia. Requires lighting the brazier in the southeast of town to unlock.

name: Chair-Crypt of Sellia
description: Site of Grace found in the chamber of the Nox Swordstress & Nox Priest boss duo. Accessible after defeating them.

name: Sellia Under-Stair
description: Site of Grace found west of town, at the bottom of a set of stairs.

name: Erdtree's Favor +2
description: Upgraded Talisman. This Talisman may only be accessed near endgame/post-game. Found on top of a branch jutting out of the ground in a large courtyard, guarded by two large rotten beasts.

name: Elphael Inner Wall
description: Site of Grace found within Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

name: Drainage Channel
description: Site of Grace found in the drainage channels of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree. This area is accessed by dropping down a ladder found inside an alcove along the inner walls. This requires you to traverse the first lake of rot found after the Elphael Inner Wall site of grace.

name: Taker's Cameo
description: Talisman. Awarded by Tanith after completing the third letter quest.

name: Sacred Tear (Church of the Plague)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found on the ground in front of the altar at the Church of the Plague.

name: Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman
description: Talisman. Found in a chest on an elevated platform inside the large building in the northeast, guarded by several Pests. This platform can be reached by heading through the eastern exit from the Drainage Channel site of grace and then navigating across the branches and concrete beams to reach the roof of the building. While there are many branches and beams to traverse, the path is fairly linear. Once on the roof, drop through one of the holes onto the wooden beams below and then carefully make your way onto the platform after killing the Pests from range.

name: Marika's Soreseal
description: Talisman. Found on an altar in a room requiring 2 Stonesword Keys to unlock. This room is in the southeast, on the lower levels.

name: Poison Armament
description: Incantation. Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab roaming around the northeast section of Aeonia Swamp. Figure out its pattern via the footprints and wait for the prints to approach and then attack.

name: Unalloyed Gold Needle
description: Key Quest Item. Required to progress Gowry's questline. Dropped by Commander O'Neil upon defeat.

name: Commander's Standard
description: Halberd. Dropped by Commander O'Neil upon defeat.

name: Golden Vow (Spell)
description: Incantation. Found on a corpse inside the Corpse-Stench Shack.

name: Cerulean Hidden Tear
description: Flask of Wondrous Physick Upgrade. Dropped by the Ulcerated Tree Spirit.

name: Stargazer's Ruins
description: A set of ruins found in central Mountaintops of the Giants.

name: Minor Erdtree (Mt. Gelmir)
description: A withered Minor Erdtree found in northern Mt. Gelmir.

name: Freezing Grease A
description: Consumable Item. Found on a corpse in the eastern section of the ruins.

name: Primal Glintstone Blade
description: Talisman. Found in an underground area of the Stargazer's Ruins. The entrance is sealed by a barrier and there is a talking jellyfish atop the steps. Summon the Spirit Jellyfish next to her to unlock the seal.

name: Old Knight Istvan
description: Assassination target for the Volcano Manor. You can invade their world using a summoning sign after accepting the assassination request.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (9) A
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse sitting in a chair on the bridge south of Stargazer's Ruins.

name: Scaled Set
description: Armor Set. Dropped by Old Knight Istvan after successfully invading his world.

name: Minor Erdtree (Mountaintops East)
description: Minor Erdtree found on the eastern half of the Mountaintops of the Giants.

name: Rune Arc
description: Dropped by Old Knight Istvan after successfully invading his world.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy
description: Dropped by Old Knight Istvan after successfully invading his world.

name: Magma Shot
description: Sorcery. Rewarded by Tanith after completing the first letter quest.

name: Erdtree Avatar (Mountaintops East)
description: Field Boss found roaming the fields near the Minor Erdtree. Drops Cerulean Crystal Tear and Crimson Bubbletear upon defeat.

name: Cerulean Crystal Tear B
description: Physick Flask material. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar guarding this tree.

name: Crimson Bubbletear
description: Physick Flask material. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar guarding this tree.

name: Rune Arc
description: Dropped by Rileigh the Idle after successfully invading his world.

name: Root Resin
description: Consumable item. 4x Found on a corpse on the first trap room.

name: Grave Glovewort [8] - Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs
description: Upgrade material. One is found in the first room with a frost trap.

name: Grave Glovewort [9] - 6x Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs
description: Upgrade material. 6 in total. First is found within the Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs, in a room filled with imps. Another one is found in the room before taking the stairs to the second floor of the frost trap. Third is on second floor by the trap. A fourth is guarded by two Cleanrot Knights in a room in the second floor by the trap. A fifth one can be looted on the third floor by the lever to open the boss door. Final one is in a room in the second floor, guarded by a Burial Tree Watchdog.

name: Smithing Stone [1] - 3x Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel
description: Upgrade Material. A total of 3 can be found in the Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel.

name: Golden Rune [12] - Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs
description: Consumable Item. Looted from a corpse on the third floor, by the lever that opens the boss door.

name: Smithing Stone [3] - 8x Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel
description: Upgrade Material. A total of 8 can be found in the Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel.

name: Smithing Stone [2] - 5x Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel
description: Upgrade Material. A total of 5 can be found in the Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel.

name: Nomadic Merchant Mountaintops East
description: Nomadic Merchant. General Goods vendor found south of Stargazer's Ruins, beneath the cliffs.

name: Putrid Grave Warden Duelist
description: Boss of the Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs. Drops Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak and Great Grave Glovewort

name: Great Grave Glovewort - Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs
description: Upgrade Material. Dropped by the boss of Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs, Putrid Grave Warden Duelist.

name: Grave Glovewort [2] - 4x Black Knife Catacombs
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. The first is found to the left of the boss door, just before the steps leading downwards. The second one is found just past the Imp Statue-sealed room, in a dead end to the left. The third and fourth are found in the first section of the sewer area after dropping down the ladder.

name: Grave Glovewort [3] - 4x Black Knife Catacombs
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. The first one is found in the center of a small room past the hall with the cleaver traps. The second one is found in the second section of the sewer area, after dropping down the ladder. The third one is found by returning to the cleaver trap room, waiting for the second-to-last cleaver to fall and then standing on top of it. It will bring you up where you can jump onto a tunnel entrance. Follow this path past the statues and the glovewort will be in a small alcove on the right. The final one is found by dropping down the hole in the alcove where the third glovewort was found to a sewer section where the boss door's lever can also be found.

name: Grave Glovewort [4] - 2x Black Knife Catacombs
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. The first one is found in the room with the cleaver traps. Wait for the second-to-last cleaver to fall and then stand on top of it to use it as a lift. Jump onto the tunnel in the wall and the glovewort can be found just to the right of the entrance. The next one is found by continuing along the same tunnel. All the way to the end of the path is an illusory wall hiding the Black Knife Assassin's mist gate. The glovewort is found just before this gate.

name: Miranda the Blighted Bloom
description: Miranda the Blighted Bloom is a large, poisonous flower within the Tombsward Cave.

name: Ancient Snow Valley Ruins
description: Site of Grace found below the bridge south of Stargazer's Ruins.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (8) B
description: Upgrade Material. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found in the lower valley.

name: Golden Rune (13) A
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse behind a Golem.

name: Grave Glovewort [2] - 4x Cliffbottom Catacombs
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. The first is found by facing east while riding down the lift by the entrance and jumping onto a small balcony as the lift passes it by. The second one is found by turning the corner in the corridor to the right of the boss door. The third one is found by heading up the stairs to the right of the door sealed by an Imp Statue and following the path to an alcove in a small room at the end. The final one is found along a corridor leading up to the room with a ladder to the library.

name: Soft Cotton B
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse sitting on a chair south of the Ancient Snow Valley Ruins.

name: Grave Glovewort [3] - 4x Cliffbottom Catacombs
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. The first one is found in the large room with the Imp Statue seal - Check the area behind the stairs leading up to the Imp Statue. The second one is found in a narrow corridor on the top level of the multi-leveled hall where you can see the boss lever statue. In the same multi-leveled hall, drop down onto the central stair-bridge and then drop further down into the pit below and check the corridors for the third and fourth Grave Glovewort (3).

name: Formic Rock A
description: Crafting Material. Found on a corpse at the edge of the cliffs east of the Ancient Snow Valley Ruins Site of Grace.

name: Ghost Glovewort [3] - Cliffbottom Catacombs
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. In the large multi-level hall, drop down to the very bottom via the gaps on either side of the central stair-bridge. Check around the corridors of this bottom pit for several items, one of which is a Ghost Glovewort (3).

name: Golden Seed (N)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found under a Phantom Tree in the lower valley northeast of the Minor Erdtree.

name: Golden Rune [2] (D)
description: Can be looted off of defeated Rats within the Tombsward Cave.

name: Golden Rune (3) E
description: Can be looted off of defeated Giant Rats within the Tombsward Cave.

name: Poisonbone Dart (A)
description: An offensive consumable that can be found on a corpse inside Tombsward Cave.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy H
description: Can be looted off from a corpse once you head straight inside the Tombsward Cave.

name: Grave Glovewort [2] - 4x Road's End Catacombs
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. A total of 4 are found inside the dungeon. 1) In the room with the boss' door lever, drop down one level to find it on the floor. 2) Found in a corridor to the east of the room with the boss door lever, accessed from the bottom-most floor of the room. 3) From the second glovewort, the third one is found in the right corner by the entrance of the next room. 4) Found just before the illusory wall concealing the boss door.

name: Giants' Gravepost
description: Site of grace at the edge of the hanging chain. Near a map shard.

name: Ghost Glovewort [2] - Road's End Catacombs
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. In the room with the boss' door lever, drop down one level and hit the wall under the arch in the back, closest to the stairs to dispel it and reveal a hidden corridor where the glovewort can be found.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [8]
description: Can be found on a corpse within the Tombsward Cave.

name: Tombsward Cave (Site of Grace)
description: Site of Grace can be found once you enter the Tombsward Cave.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy
description: Dropped by Rileigh the Idle after successfully invading his world.

name: Crepus's Vial
description: Talisman. Dropped by Rileigh the Idle after successfully invading his world.

name: Serpentbone Blade
description: Katana. Rewarded by Tanith after completing the second letter quest.

name: Red Letter
description: Quest Item. A letter outlining your final mission after pledging your services to the Volcano Manor. Found in a room unlocked using the Drawing-Room Key.

name: Bloody Finger Okina
description: NPC Invader. Deals powerful blows with his Katana. Drops  Rivers of Blood upon defeat.

name: Letter to Bernahl
description: Quest Item. A letter outlining Bernahl's mission. Given by Bernahl after completing two quests for the Volcano Manor.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (7) A
description: Upgrade Material. Found inside a statue with a glowing crack on it. Lure one of the nearby Golems to destroy the statue and collect the item.

name: Church of Repose
description: Church found high in the mountains. There is a site of grace and a Sacred Tear inside.

name: Patches (Third Location)
description: Appears by the Volcano Manor's entrance after pledging your service to the manor.

name: Letter to Patches
description: Quest Item. A letter outlining Patches' mission. Given by Patches after completing two quests for the Volcano Manor.

name: Great Horned Tragoth
description: Assassination target for the Volcano Manor. You can invade their world using a summoning sign after accepting the assassination request.

name: Sacred Tear (Church of Ripose)
description: Flask upgrade, found inside the  Church of Ripose, below the main statue.

name: Church of Repose (Site of Grace)
description: Site of grace found inside the  Church of Ripose

name: Rune Arc
description: Dropped by Great Horned Tragoth after successfully invading his world.

name: Okina Mask
description: Dropped by NPC Invader  Bloody Finger Okina alongside his trusted katana, Rivers of Blood

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy
description: Multiplayer Item. Dropped by Great Horned Tragoth after successfully invading his world.

name: Rune Arc K
description: Consumable Item. Found on a corpse inside the Spiritcaller's Cave.

name: Hero's Rune (1) A
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse inside the Spiritcaller's Cave.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (8)
description: Dropped from a  Teardrop Scarab found at the top of a small mountain. Will vanish if it spots you or you get too close.

name: Foot of the Forge
description: Site of grace

name: Bull-Goat Set
description: Armor Set. Dropped by Great Horned Tragoth after successfully invading his world.

name: Fire Giant
description: Main Boss. Found at  Flame Peak. Drops  Remembrance of the Fire Giant

name: Magma Whip Candlestick
description: Whip. Rewarded by Patches after completing his Volcano Manor quest.

name: White Reed Set
description: White Reed Armor Set excluding the Helm. Found on a corpse inside the Spiritcaller's Cave, in a long cavern filled with spirit wolves.

name: Remembrance of the Fire Giant
description: Drops from  Fire Giant upon defeat.

name: Smithing Stone [6] E - Volcano Manor
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse in the lava-filled cavern of the Volcano Manor.

name: Golden Rune (10) C
description: Consumable, found inside a small cave. Beware of enemies guarding it.

name: Smithing Stone [4] B - Volcano Manor
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse lying on a fallen column in the lava.

name: Golden Seed (O)
description: Found before a massive frozen giant.

name: Abductor Virgin
description: Site of Grace found in the underground caverns of Volcano Manor. Accessible after defeating the Abductor Virgins.

name: Grave Glovewort (1) B
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found inside the Spiritcaller's Cave, in the long cavern before the boss arena.

name: Grave Glovewort (3) B
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found inside the Spiritcaller's Cave, in the long cavern before the boss arena.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (7) B
description: Drops from a  Lesser Spider Hand

name: Abductor Virgins
description: Optional Boss. Found in the cave under Volcano Manor by heading south from the Subterranean Inquisition Chamber Site of Grace and falling through the floor.

name: Godskin Apostle & Godskin Noble
description: Double Boss fight at the end of the Spiritcaller's Cave, first against a Godskin Apostle and then a Godskin Noble.

name: Inquisitor's Girandole
description: Spear. Dropped by the Abductor Virgins.

name: Seethewater Cave
description: A cave locked behind an imp statue. Requires a Stonesword Key to unlock.

name: Seethewater Cave
description: Site of Grace right by the entrance to Seethewater Cave.

name: Mushroom Set (No Crown)
description: Entire armor set excluding Mushroom Crown. Found in a room inside the Seethewater Cave filled with Servants of Rot and a Giant Poison Flower. Includes Mushroom Head, Mushroom Body, Mushroom Arms and Mushroom Legs.

name: Golden Rune [1] - Ailing Village
description: Can be found inside the abandoned Ailing Village.

name: Kindred of Rot
description: Optional Boss. Found by falling through holes to reach the lowest floor of Seethewater Cave.

name: Kindred of Rot's Exultation
description: Talisman. Dropped by the Kindred of Rot.

name: Crimsonwhorl Bubbletear
description: On a cliff ledge south of Giants' Gravepost (above the grace point, the ledge is accessed by going north-east from the Foot of the Forge grace point, Just follow the edge of the cliff until you see the path going above Giant's Gravepost).

name: Butchering Knife
description: Greataxe. Dropped by Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy
description: Multiplayer Item. Dropped by Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater.

name: Invigorating White Cured Meat (C)
description: Found at the bottom of a tree.

name: Drawstring Holy Grease
description: Found on a body near a giant rock.

name: Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave
description: A complex dungeon filled with invulnerable enemies and strange golden floor seals.

name: Godskin Swaddling Cloth
description: Talisman. Dropped by the Godskin Apostle & Godskin Noble upon their defeat in the Spiritcaller's Cave.

name: Black Flame Ritual
description: Incantation. Dropped by the Godskin Apostle & Godskin Noble upon their defeat in the Spiritcaller's Cave.

name: Golden Epitaph
description: Looted off a corpse located in  Auriza Hero's Grave. You'll need to use the Stonesword Key on the Imp Statue to dispel the barrier blocking the entrance of the room where the body can be found.

name: Stonesword Key - Auriza Hero's Grave
description: At  Auriza Hero's Grave, one can be found while passing the third part of the giant chariots, on a small platform in the middle.

name: Ghost Glovewort (6)
description: At  Auriza Hero's Grave, can be found while passing the third part of the giant chariots, on a small platform in the middle.

name: Golden Rune (7) B
description: Found inside  Auriza Hero's Grave, at the edge of the path where the lone chariot passes.

name: Zamor Ruins
description: Once you reach Mountaintops of the Giants, past Shabriri.

name: Magma Wyrm Site of Grace
description: Site of Grace for Magma Wyrm

name: Starlight Shards F
description: Found in front of a crescent bowl-shaped stone statue by the cliffs.

name: Golden Rune (10) D
description: Found on a corpse below the frozen body of a giant

name: Warming Stone (Mountaintops of the Giants)
description: 2 Warming Stones found on a body in the Mountaintops of the Giants.

name: Gold Firefly
description: Found 3 on a body laying on the middle of a road.

name: Smithing Stone (4) G
description: Found inside a small chapel, to the left side of the big main road.

name: Golden Rune (8)  B
description: Found at the end of the alleway.

name: Golden Rune (8) C
description: Found at the end of an alleway, there is a Broken Statue at the end. There is also a Golden Rune (11)

name: Golden Rune (11)
description: Found at the end of an alleway, there is a Broken Statue at the end. There is also a Golden Rune (8)

name: Erdtree Avatar (Leyndell)
description: Mini boss that patrols the main road in Leyndell, Royal Capital. Drops Lord's Rune

name: Lord's Rune
description: Drops from the Erdtree Avatar that patrols the road.

name: Holy Grease
description: Over The main road, at the top of the wrecked chariot.

name: Golden Rune (9)
description: Can be found near the wheel of a chariot, at the main road.

name: Golden Rune (9) B
description: Found at the patio, on a body.

name: Hero's Rune (5)
description: Found inside the big room with the statues and the knight that can perform the same moves as Crucible Knight Ordovis, on a body.

name: Coded Sword
description: Found in Leyndell, Royal Capital. Look for an abandoned horse stable, then climb onto its roof and enter the building. Keep going until you find a broken round table. Look for the double door. Inside that room you will find the coded sword.

name: Golden Rune (9) D
description: Found on a big chapel with statues, where there's also a knight that performs the same moveset as Crucible Knight Ordivis, on a body , near the left exit.

name: Forge of the Giants
description: It can be reached using the giant frozen chain as a birdge.

name: Iron Cleaver
description: Dropped by one of the enemies that can be found at behind the big door, on the right side.

name: Forge of the Giants
description: The Site of Grace is found following the left edge of the Forge right at the end before reaching the crack.

name: Golden Rune (9) D
description: Found on a body that two dogs are devouring.

name: Crumbling Farum Azula
description: Reached by talking to Melina by the Site of Grace at the Forge of the Giants in Mountaintops of the Giants.

name: Smithing Stone (8) A - x1 - Crumbling Farum Azula
description: On a dead body in the middle of the way.

name: Golden Rune (9) A
description: By a dead body taking a leap down to the right which is the only way you can take .

name: Old Fang C
description: By the bones where the Gnolls are roaming around.

name: Lightningproof Dried Liver A
description: On a dead body at one side of the main way guarded by Gnolls

name: Smithing Stone (6) - x1 - Crumbling Farum Azula
description: In the middle of the curved bridge/platform.

name: Castle Sol
description: A minor dungeon found in northeast Mountaintops of the Giants. Stronghole of Commander Niall.

name: Smithing Stone (8) B - x2 - Crumbling Farum Azula
description: It can be seen as it is in the middle of the way, but before you reach it a Farum Azula Dragon will stand in front you and attack you. And other one a few metters more in the next roofed zone.

name: Castle Sol Main Gate
description: Site of Grace found by the castle's western entrance.

name: Dragonwound Grease (B)
description: At the right edge of the curved bridge in Crumbling Farum Azula.

name: Nascent Butterfly A
description: Crafting Material. Found on a corpse in a room filled with skeletal slimes in the northwest section of the castle, by a ladder.

name: Fan Daggers - 5x Castle Sol
description: Offensive Consumable Item. 5x can be found on a corpse at the eastern edge of the roof of the northwest building with a ladder.

name: Golden Rune [10] - 3x Castle Sol
description: Rune Consumable. One found on a grave to the south as soon as you enter the main gate. Beware as there is a sleeping Lion Guardian right next to it. A second one is found on a corpse sitting by the northwest corner of the wall, in the upper level. Access via ladder in a building nearby. One more is found on a corpse in the northeast section, on top of a building north of the Church.

name: Kindred of Rot Ashes
description: Spirit Ashes. Found within Caelid Catacombs.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy I
description: Multiplayer Item. Found under a wooden walkway in the eastern section of the castle.

name: Crumbling Beast Grave Depths
description: This Site of Grace is right next to the Farum Azula Dragon that you encounter in the bridge, the dragon can be easily skipped to reach this site of grace.

name: Smithing Stone [5] - 1x Castle Sol
description: Upgrade Material. One found under the wooden platform directly opposite the main gate.

name: Smithing Stone (4) H
description: Upgrade Material. Can be found in the Gael Tunnel.

name: Freezing Grease B
description: Offensive Consumable. Found on a corpse hanging at the edge of a wooden walkway in the courtyard.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (2) D
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse in a small room close to the Site of Grace in Gael Tunnel.

name: Thawfrost Boluses - 4x Castle Sol
description: Consumable. 3x found on a corpse in an area between two buildings accessed via the wooden walkways in the courtyard. One more is found on a corpse hanging by a wall outside the Church.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (4) F
description: Upgrade Material. Can be found within Gael Tunnel.

name: Church of the Eclipse
description: Site of Grace found in the Church in the southeast corner of the castle. The church is accessed by heading up the wooden platform in the courtyard and following the path in the middle levels.

name: Eclipse Shotel
description: Curved Sword. Found at the altar of the Church in the southeast section of the castle.

name: Smithing Stone [7] - 3x Castle Sol
description: Upgrade Material. 3x found on a corpse inside a building full of Rats. This room is accessed by climbing the ladder behind the church and following the path along the outer walls. The building has an opening on the roof that you can jump to.

name: Finger Maiden Set
description: Light Armor Set by the Site of Grace of Church of Inhibition. Includes Finger Maiden Fillet, Finger Maiden Robe and Finger Maiden Shoes

name: Rune Arc - 1x Castle Sol
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse by a campfire atop the building in the south of the courtyard. This area is accessed by climbing a ladder behind the church in the southeast and following the path along the outer walls. Rune Arcs are also frequently dropped by Rat enemies in the castle.

name: Cerulean Amber Medallion +1
description: Upgraded Talisman. Found on a corpse hanging by a wooden ledge above the southern walls of the castle. This area is accessed by climbing a ladder behind the church in the southeast and following the walls west. Beware the very powerful dual sword knight guarding the area. He can teleport behind you and perform very long combos.

name: Smithing Stone [6] - 2x Castle Sol
description: Upgrade Material. One is found on a corpse on top of the central building in the courtyard, accessible by walking along the top of the outer walls from the northwest. Another one can be found on a corpse in the upper level of a building east of the church.

name: Grave Glovewort (3) C
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found in a hallway in the caverns under the elevator in the Minor Erdtree Catacombs.

name: Commander Niall
description: Great Enemy. Found in the northeast of the castle, accessible by using the eastern exit of the church and going through the building there.

name: Grave Glovewort (4) C
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found in a hallway in the caverns under the elevator in the Minor Erdtree Catacombs.

name: Old Fang D
description: Dropped at Castle Morne by one of the Misbegotten enemies, past the caged spirit.

name: Golden Rune [9] - 1x Castle Sol
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse in the middle level of the eastern section of the castle. Accessible via ladder outside the church's main entrance.

name: Grave Glovewort (5) C
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. 2 in total. First is found in a room on the floor that the elevator goes down to. Another is found on an upper ledge in a room beneath the elevator shaft with water that inflicts scarlet rot.

name: Veteran's Prosthesis
description: Fist Weapon. Dropped by Commander Niall upon defeat.

name: Sorcerer Painting
description: Key Info Item. Found inside the central building of the courtyard. This can be accessed through the roof by walking along the top of the northeast walls and finding a walkway connecting to the building.

name: Rune Arc L - 1x Castle Morne
description: Can be looted off a defeated Giant Rat.

name: Perfume Bottle - Leyndell, Royal Capital (B)
description: Found guarded by a lesser Leonine Misbegotten on the east side of the eastern pond.

name: Castle Sol Rooftop
description: Site of Grace found in Commander Niall's arena after defeating him.

name: Sanctuary Stone - X1 CASTLE MORNE
description: Can be found at Castle Morne, dropped when defeating a Lesser Pumpkin Head.

name: Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left)
description: Key Item. Found in the castle's northeast tower after defeating Commander Niall.

name: Nascent Butterfly (D)
description: Found on a body over the stairs.

name: Exalted Flesh
description: Found hanging over an edge, above the staircase. Near a tree and some graves.

name: Soporific Grease C
description: Found lying in the middle of the ground. Beware enemies nearby.

name: Zamor Ruins
description: Site of Grace found near the path towards Zamor Ruins.

name: Sacrificial Twig x1 - Castle Morne
description: Give the letter to Edgar and he'll give you x1 Sacrificial Twig.

name: Flamedrake Talisman +1
description: Found on the ground, against a column. The path is a blocked by a magic barrier if Morgott has not been defeated. You can still reach it by going slightly

name: Throwing Dagger x8 - Castle Morne
description: Held by a corpse across the wooden bridge that's in front of Raumpart Gaol at Castle Morne.

name: Golden Rune (2) - x1 Dragon-Burnt Ruins
description: Consumable. Pillage the remains in the middle of Dragon-Burnt Ruins

name: Greatshield Talisman
description: Found in a chest on a Wagon East of Grace "Erdtree-Gazing Hill" behind Ancient Dragon Lansseax.

name: Smithing Stone (4) I
description: Found on a patio, in what seems to be a cemetery district. A skeleton will drop down on you once you approach this item.

name: Iron Cleaver - CASTLE MORNE
description: Dropped by one of the Misbegotten creatures attacking a soldier before reaching the top of Castle Morne.

name: Stonesword Key - Leyndell, Royal Capital (D)
description: Found in front of a grave, there are three enemies in the vicinity

name: Guilty Hood
description: Held by a corpse on the right side of the sewer-like tunnel.

name: Golden Rune (8) D
description: Found on the left side of the sewers, where the rats are.

name: Ulcerated Tree Spirit (Limgrave)
description: Ulcerated Tree Spirit is found underneath the Stranded Graveyard within Fringefolk Hero's Grave. Defeating it drops Banished Knight Oleg's Ashes.

name: Gargoyle's Great Axe
description: Dropped byGargoyle. From the Outer Wall Phantom Tree.Site of Grace go northeast the Slope/long Stairs up until it spawns.

name: Black Bow
description: Bow that can be found on the roof on the right that overlooks the area. Need to jump from roof to roof in order to reach it.

name: Banished Knight Oleg Ashes
description: This Spirit is obtained after Defeating the Ulcerated Tree Sprit located within Fringefolk Hero's Grave.

name: Zamor Ice Storm (Spell)
description: Glintstone Sorcery. Found on a corpse in the southern section of the ruins, by a stone archway.

name: Golden Seed - x1 Fringefolk Hero's Grave
description: This item is obtained after Defeating the Ulcerated Tree Sprit located within Fringefolk Hero's Grave.

name: Manor Towershield
description: Greatshield. From the Secluded Cell site of grace, backtrack to the west and up the ramp where the Living Jars are and turn around towards the wooden platform. At the end of the platform, jump onto the ledge on the wall and follow it to the right towards some archways. Past the archways, enter the storage room on the right and head up the stairs to a walkway above. Head to the left towards a larger storage room full of Commoners. You can find the shield under the second set of stairs in this room.

name: Invigorating Cured Meat A
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse on the eastern side of the ruins.

name: Fringefolk Hero's Grave
description: Fringefolk Hero's Grave is found in Limgrave behind a fog wall in Stranded Graveyard that requires 2 Stonesword Keys.

name: Cracked Pot - Leyndell, Royal Capital
description: Found inside a room in the northern area, where you fight the Leyndell Royal Guard.

name: Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave
description: Site of Grace found near the beginning of the dungeon.

name: Flame, Protect Me
description: Incantation. Found in a room at the beginning of the Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave, just in front of the Site of Grace. Requires 2 Stonesword Keys to unlock.

name: Grave Glovewort [7] - 1x Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. One found by a set of steps opposite the first Lesser Burial Watchdog encountered.

name: Grave Glovewort [9] - 1x Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. One is found in a room behind the first Lesser Burial Watchdog encountered, taking the short steps down.

name: Hyetta (Third Location)
description: Hyetta spawns near the site of grace. She will ask for another Shabriri Grape and will ask what the grapes really are. Telling her will make her puke and then thank you for telling her. After sitting down at the grace nearby she will have more dialog. After once again sitting at the grace she will move to her next location.

name: Grave Glovewort [8] - 1x Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. One found in the large hall locked behind an Imp Statue barrier. This is directly above the flamethrower pillar and there is a hole in the ground where a section of the pillar can rise through.

name: Cranial Vessel Candlestand
description: Warhammer. Found inside the Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave on a corpse at the end of the large hall locked behind an Imp Statue barrier. This is directly above the room with the flamethrower pillar.

name: Clarifying Boluses
description: Found on the upper platform where there are some enemies.

name: Waygate to Liurnia East (from Liurnia West)
description: Waygate teleports players to the western side of Liurnia of the Lakes, by the Northern Liurnia Lakeshore Site of Grace

name: Ghost Glovewort [9] - 1 x Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. One found left of the locked door that leads to the boss, behind the Troll.

name: Smithing Stone (1) - x1 Highroad Cave
description: Smithing Stone (1) Upgrade Material can be found within Highroad Cave

name: Stonesword Key - Leyndell, Royal Capital (C)
description: Found in the lower platform, open a door and find it inside the chest.

name: Ancient Hero of Zamor (Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave)
description: Optional Boss. Found at the end of the Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave. Drops the Zamor Curved Sword and the entire Zamor Armor Set upon defeat.

name: Lord Contender's Evergaol
description: Evergaol with Boss Fight: Roundtable Knight Vyke, who drops the Fingerprint Set.

name: Zamor Curved Sword
description: Curved Greatsword. Dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor inside the Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave upon defeat.

name: Smithing Stone (2) - x1 Highroad Cave
description: Smithing Stone (2) Upgrade Material can be found within Highroad Cave

name: Fingerprint Set
description: Full Armor Set drops from Lord Contender's Evergaol Boss Fight: Roundtable Knight Vyke

name: Winged Scythe
description: Located In the center of Tombsward Ruins, there is a set of stairs leading underground into a dark hall with a door to a small room at the end. The scythe is inside a chest in the small room.

name: Roundtable Knight Vyke
description: Boss of the Lord Contender's Evergaol, drops the Fingerprint Set.

name: Zamor Set
description: Armor Set comprised of Zamor Mask, Zamor Armor, Zamor Bracelets and Zamor Legwraps. Dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor Boss inside the Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave upon defeat.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy J - Highroad Cave
description: Furlcalling Finger Remedy can be dropped in Highroad Cave

name: Golden Rune (8) E
description: The first body on the staircase in the main road.

name: Morne Tunnel
description: Located at Underground Level 1 of Morne Tunnel.

name: Golden Rune (12) B
description: The second body on the staircase in the main road.

name: Briars of Punishment
description: Incantation. Found at the leftmost dead tree next to three Lesser Fire Monks just before the long stone bridge with the Golem Archer at the end in the Mountaintops of the Giants region

name: Lightningproof Dried Liver B
description: Found on the third body on the staircase in the main road.

name: Smithing Stone (1) - 8x Limgrave Tunnels
description: Approximately x8 found in Limgrave Tunnels (mostly as yellow glowing stones on wall).

name: Somber Smithing Stone (1) - Limgrave Tunnels
description: Players can find one at the Limgrave Tunnels. Before taking the second elevator, fall down the edge on the left, and keep falling on the surfaces against the wall. There is a Golden Rune (1) on a platform with a dead body, the next one has a Somber Smithing Stone [1].

name: Omensmirk Mask
description: Dropped an Omensmirk wielding double swords and wearing this mask outside of the Lower Capital Church Site of Grace.

name: Spiked Spear
description: Chance for it to drop from a Marionette Soldier enemy just outside of Witchbane Ruins.

name: Smithing Stone (1) - X9 MORNE TUNNEL
description: You can find a couple of these stones within Morne Tunnel.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [1] - X3 MORNE TUNNEL
description: You can find a few in Morne Tunnel.

name: Cracked Crystal - X1 MORNE TUNNEL
description: One can be looted off a Miner enemy on the left side of the small shack in Morne Tunnel.

name: Golden Rune (2) - X1 MORNE TUNNEL
description: One can be looted off a corpse sitting in between some crates and barrels in Morne Tunnel.

name: Golden Rune (4) - x1 Morne Tunnel
description: One can be looted off a corpse inside the small shack in Morne Tunnel.

name: Soft Cotton - X1 MORNE TUNNEL
description: One can be looted off a corpse in Morne Tunnel.

name: Spirit Jellyfish Ashes
description: Obtained from Roderika form Stormhill Shack while pursuing her questline.

name: Arteria Leaf - X2 MORNE TUNNEL
description: Two can be looted off a corpse that is being eaten by two Misbegotten enemies in Morne Tunnel.

name: Stanching Boluses - X1 MORNE TUNNEL
description: One can be looted off a corpse in Morne Tunnel.

name: Large Glintstone Scrap - X2 MORNE TUNNEL
description: Two can be looted off a corpse behind the small shack in Morne Tunnel.

name: Deathbed Dress
description: Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace alonside the Lionel's Set

name: Death Ritual Spear
description: Spear. Dropped by the Death Rite Bird boss upon defeat.

name: Lost Ashes of War - Leyndell, Royal Capital
description: Found at the bottom of the sewers.

name: Smithing Stone (7) B - x1 - Crumbling Farum Azula
description: On a sarcophagus in the next room after finding the Crumbling Beast Grave Depths Site of Grace.

name: Golden Rune (12) A - x1 - Crumbling Farum Azula
description: Found going through a stair that leaves to a 'balcony' to the northwest.of the Hall.

name: Faith-knot Crystal Tear
description: North of the Demi-Human Forest Ruins. Directly east of the Church of Pilgrimage, just down the cliff. It's in a bowl under a tree and surrounded by Poison Flowers.

name: Ancient Dragon Prayerbook
description: In the middle of the big hall found after the Crumbling Beast Grave Depths site of grace.

name: Tempest-Facing Balcony
description: The main door of the hall leaves to the balcony that faces the tornados in the center, and the site of grace is right there in the middle of the balcony.

name: Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing (4)
description: Found on a corpsenext to the Tempest-Facing Balcony.

name: Hero's Rune (2) B
description: On the corner next to the stair there's a corpse a little bit hidden by a bunch of debris.

name: Poisonbone Dart - x8 - Leyndell Royal Capital
description: On a small corridor, against the fence (Sewers)

name: String - x4 - Leyndell Royal Capital
description: On the sewers, at the big room with rats, can be found on a body against a wall.

name: Holyproof Dried Liver
description: On the sewers, past the Broken Statue, on the room below there are three items to grab, one of those is this one.

name: Erdsteel Dagger
description: Drop down a pit with a Broken Statue and it will be on a corpse.

name: Dragonwound Grease C
description: At the end of the corridor, in front of a giant door, NW of Avenue Balcony site of grace.

name: Blasphemous Claw
description: Dropped by the invasor Recusant Bernahl when defeated.

name: Rune Arc M
description: Climb the "wing" of the dragon and once you are on top, jump to the room below. you will find one there.

name: Gravel Stone D - x5 - Crumbling Farum Azula
description: Going down the elevator behind the big hall after the Crumbling Beast Grave Depths Site of Grace, there's an area filled with Wormfaces. At the end, far east at the edge of the last corner, there's x5 Gravel Stone.

name: Golden Rune (11) B
description: Once you are up, after you jump from the dragon "wing" you will find it inside a room. Beware of the ambushing enemy.

name: West Capital Rampart
description: Site of grace

name: Cane Sword
description: West Capital Ramparts Site of Grace, Go south out of the room with the site of grace and down the flight of stairs to the floor underneath, make a complete U-turn in the room with the stairs to find a corpse with the sword

name: Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing (3)
description: Found in a Gazebo in front of the lake.

name: Gargoyle's Halberd
description: Dropped by the Lesser Black Blade Kindred.

name: Smithing Stone (8) C - x1 - Crumbling Farum Azula
description: At the edge of the lake before reaching the gazebo, you can sneak and take it undetected.

name: Golden Seed - x2 - Leyndell Royal Capital
description: The first one is found by the by defeating the Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirit NW of the Avenue Balcony Site of grace. The second one is found on a balcony to the SW of West Capital Rampart site of grace.

name: Rejuvenating Boluses (B)
description: At the center of the lake where there are Lesser Wormface sitting around. Reach this area by going down the elevator behind the big hall that is next to the Tempest-Facing Balcony grace.

name: Smithing Stone (8) D - x1 - Crumbling Farum Azula
description: At the end of the west bridge, reached by climbing the ladder next to it.

name: Sanctified Whetblade
description: Found inside the fortified manor, you have to access by jumping through the roof and entering the building.

name: Hammer
description: Found inside the Fortified manor, beside the Sanctified Whetblade

name: Somber Smithing Stone (9) B - x1 - Crumbling Farum Azula
description: Next to the bridge near the cliff.

name: Hero's Rune (1)
description: Found inside Fortified Manor, at the second room.

name: Rune Arc N
description: Found inside the Fortified Manor, in the room with the big table in the middle.

name: Golden Rune (9) C
description: Found behind a column at the upper ground area.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (7) C - x1 - Crumbling Farum Azula
description: At the edge on the tornado side on a small floating platform.

name: Smithing Stone (5) - x2 - Leyndell Royal Capital
description: At the balcony of the fortified Manor, next to the room with the swords on the table.The second can be found inside the fortified Manor, once in the lower level at the back of the armory room.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy - x1 - Leyndell Royal Capital
description: Found on a body in the room with the fire.

name: Gravel Stone E - x3 - Crumbling Farum Azula
description: On the side of the hallway part on a dead body near the corner.

name: Seedbed Curse - West Leyndell, Royal Capital
description: Found on a body on the library area.

name: Smithing Stone [2] D - Stormveil Castle
description: Upgrade Material. Held by a corpse outside the room where Nepheli Loux is located, passing the wooden barricades to the west and up the stairs on your right.

name: Two Fingers' Prayerbook
description: Located in the first floor of Fortified Manor.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (9) C - x1 - Crumbling Farum Azula
description: On the platform below the Ancient Dragon that can be seen sitting from a distance.

name: Dragon Temple
description: Found after passing through the platform that is below the Ancient Dragon that can be seen from a distance.

name: Golden Rune (11) C
description: Take the path to the left after finding the Dragon Temple Site of Grace.

name: Smithing Stone (6)
description: Take the path to the right after finding the Dragon Temple Site of Grace, it is found on the corner not too far.

name: Stonesword Key - Crumbling Farum Azula
description: At the corner near the cliff on a dead body.

name: Dragonwound Grease (D)
description: Rounding the temple and going up the stairs, it can be found near the cliff.

name: Golden Rune (12) B
description: Rounding the Dragon Temple and going upstairs from outside and then inside again, the Dragonwound Grease can be seen, but to the right of it you'll find the rune.

name: Godskin Duo
description: The Godskin Apostle and Godskin Noble are found again inside the main hall of the Dragon Temple, just that this time they will fight simultaneusly against you. Drops Smithing-Stone Miner's Bell Bearing (4) and Ashes of War: Black Flame Tornado upon defeat.

name: Shack of the Lofty
description: A lone shack found at the base of some cliffs in the north of the Mountaintops of the Giants.

name: Traveling Maiden Set
description: Armor set comprised of the Traveling Maiden Hood, Traveling Maiden Robe, Traveling Maiden Gloves and the Traveling Maiden Boots. Found inside the Shack of the Lofty.

name: Juno Hoslow, Knight of Blood
description: A hostile NPC that you can invade as part of the final contract for the Volcano Manor questline. Drops Hoslow's Petal Whip along with Hoslow's Set upon defeat.

name: Hoslow's Set
description: Armor Set comprised of Hoslow's Helm, Hoslow's Armor, Hoslow's Gauntlets and Hoslow's Greaves. Dropped by Juno Hoslow, Knight of Blood upon defeat.

name: Hoslow's Petal Whip
description: Whip. Dropped by Juno Hoslow, Knight of Blood upon defeat.

name: Gelmir's Fury
description: Glintstone Sorcery. Given by Resucant Bernahl after completing three contracts for Tanith at Volcano Manor.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [1] - Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel
description: Upgrade Material. One can be found in the Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel.

name: Serpent-Hunter
description: Great Spear. Held by a corpse on the left as you enter the boss chamber of Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy. This weapon has a special interaction when fighting Rykard in both his first phase as the God-Devouring Serpent and second phase as Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy.

name: Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy
description: Demi God opponent found in Volcano Manor. Initially encountered in his first phase as the God-Devouring Serpent. Drops Rykard's Great Rune and Remembrance of the Blasphemous upon defeat.

name: Rykard's Great Rune
description: Great Rune Key Item. Dropped by Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy upon defeat.

name: Remembrance of the Blasphemous
description: Remembrance Key Item. Dropped by Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy upon defeat.

name: Raging Wolf Set
description: After obtaining the second to last letter from Volcano Manor, You will be sent to assist Bernahl with an invade in a familiar location. Upon invasion completion, you will receive the full Raging Wolf set, including:  Raging Wolf Greaves, Raging Wolf Gauntlets, Raging Wolf Armor and Raging Wolf Helm.

name: Smithing Stone (6) - x7 - Leyndell, Royal Capital
description: There are 7 Smithing Stone (6) to be found:- Can be found on the stairs leading to the lower floor inside Fortified Manor.- Found on a body, at the little patio.- Found on the upper platform. After climbing the ladder, open the door in front of you. Climb the next set of stairs, head to one of the corners of the stairs you just climbed up to find it.- Found near the Omensmirk, on the ground.- Found on the big area, past the Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirit- Found on a small building past the Fortified Manor, you have to jump around to get there.- Found to the south of the West Capital Rampart site of grace, on an edge, near some poison flowers.

name: Fortified Manor, First Floor
description: Site of grace inside the Fortified Manor.

name: Old Fang - x8 - Leyndell, Royal Capital
description: x5 Found in what it looks like a small stable, outside of Fortified Manor, protected by two guards.x3 Found on a body that's being devoured by two dogs. Near the main road.

name: Gravel Stone - x6 - Leyndell Royal Capital
description: You can find Gravel Stone at three different parts:1) Found at the end of a dark alley, near the main road.2) Found over the "wing" of the dragon once you manage to get over it.3) Found at the ruined area, past the Fortified Manor.

name: Moonfolk Ruins
description: Ruins found in the southwest of the Liurnia of the Lakes region

name: Stonesword Key - Leyndell, Royal Capital (A)
description: Found on a small shack past the Fortified Manor, west of the Lower Capital Chuch Site of Grace. You have to jump around in order to reach it. There is a Smithing Stone (6) on that same shack.

name: Holy Grease B
description: Take the giant tree branches located south of West Rampart Capital south of grace. There is one that gets neer a yellowish roof. Jump there and walk along until you find an enemy. Behind it you will find the item

name: Thawfrost Boluses B
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse at the edge of the cliffs behind and below Heretical Rise.

name: Erdtree Sanctuary
description: Site of grace inside the Erdtree Sanctuary.

name: Talisman Pouch (Godfrey)
description: Dropped by Godfrey, First Elden Lord (Golden Shade)

name: Holy Grease C
description: Down the stairs after facing Godfrey, First Elden Lord, you will find it

name: Somber Smithing Stone (5) - x3 - Leyndell, Royal Capital
description: On a side room, you can find this on a body.

name: Cathedral of Manus Celes
description: Site of Grace found in the center of the Cathedral of Manus Celes

name: Godskin Noble(Volcano Manor)
description: Can be found at Volcano Manor.From the Volcano Manor Site of Grace, go into the hallway next to it and open the first door on the right. You must first agree to join the Main Woman sitting next to the Knight in order to open this door. Once inside you will find a wall and in front of it a corpse, then jump on it to make it disappear and a new passage appears to enter the Godskin Noble area.

name: Blessing of the Erdtree
description: Found lying on a giant furniture, located in the middle of the room.

name: Starlight Shards - x10 Cathedral of Manus Celes
description: Consumable Item. 9 can be found all around the Cathedral of Manus Celes. One more can be found outside the cathedral, in the north by the cliffs.

name: Lunar Estate Ruins
description: The ruins of a large estate found in the southern plateau of Liurnia, accessible only after making significant progress in Ranni's questline.

name: Godskin Stitcher
description: Dropped by Godskin Noble

name: Noble Presence
description: Incantation. Dropped by Godskin Noble

name: Golden Rune (10) - Lunar Estate Ruins
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse near the central section of the Lunar Estate Ruins.

name: Cerulean Amber Medallion +2
description: Upgraded Talisman. Found in an underground room in the northwest section of the Lunar Estate Ruins. The entrance is sealed by both an Imp Statue that requires 1 Stonesword Key, as well as an illusory floor that can be dispelled with an attack.

name: Walking Mausoleum (Weeping Peninsula)
description: Attack the white spots on the legs to get it to come down and access the mausoleum.

name: Walking Mausoleum (Liurnia of the Lakes)
description: Attack the legs to bring down the mausoleum and go inside it.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [8] - 1x Moonfolk Ruins
description: Upgrade Material. One found in a chest inside an underground treasure room in the northest section of the ruins. The entrance is concealed by an illusory floor. Hit the floor to reveal the stairs.

name: Abandoned Cave
description: East of Smoldering Wall Grace on the eastern wall of the canyon, and slightly northwest of the Sellia Evergaol. The location is only reachable by approaching from the west and crossing the canyon using a tree.

name: Golden Scarab
description: Dropped by Cleanrot Knight (Sickle) & Cleanrot Knight (Spear) boss found in Abandoned Cave. It can be accessed by going east from Smoldering Wall site of grace and walking across canyon by using tree branches.

name: Serpent Bow
description: Found by a pool of rot within Abandoned Cave

name: Venomous Fang
description: Claw Weapons. Climb on the Iron Maidens near the end of the Abandoned Cave to acquire them.

name: Dragonwound Grease (Abandoned Cave)
description: Consumable item found within Abandoned Cave

name: Fire Grease (Abandoned Cave)
description: Consumable item found within Abandoned Cave

name: Smithing Stone [8] - 3x Moonlight Altar
description: Upgrade Material. 3 are found in the central gazebo by the cliffs in this area.

name: Gaol Cave
description: A cave locked behind two Stone Sword Key seals. The cave has a second exit on the coast North-West of  Fort Gael, where the Regalia of Eochaid can be found.

name: Regalia of Eochaid
description: Straight Sword. Accessed by dropping down to this area after progressing through Gaol Cave

name: Smithing Stone [7] - 3x Moonlight Altar
description: Upgrade Material. 3 more are found in the right-most gazebo by the cliffs in this area.

name: Pillory Shield
description: Small Shield. Found inside Gaol Cave.

name: Smithing Stone [7] - 3x Moonlight Altar
description: Upgrade Material. 3 are found in the left-most gazebo by the cliffs in this area.

name: Wakizashi
description: Dagger. Found within Gaol Cave

name: Putrid Corpse Ashes
description: Spirit Ash. Dropped by the boss of Gaol Cave: Frenzied Duelist

name: Frenzied Duelist
description: Boss of Gaol Cave in Caelid. Drops Putrid Corpse Ashes

name: Somber Smithing Stone (5) - 1x Gaol Cave
description: Upgrade Material. 1x Found as a treasure inside a chest in a cell within Gaol Cave.

name: Smithing Stone [8] - Lunar Estate Ruins
description: Upgrade Material. Found in a chest in an underground area concealed by an illusory floor on the eastern side of the ruins. Attack the floor to reveal the path.

name: Gaol Cave
description: Site of Grace within Gaol Cave

name: Fort Haight West
description: Site of Grace just west from Fort Haight

name: Blaidd (1st location)
description: Blaidd's First Location: When visiting Mistwood, the player can occasionally hear a wolf howl. At this point, they can ask Merchant Kale about the howling. The merchant will teach the player the Finger Snap gesture.Blaidd can be seen resting on the tallest point in the Mistwood Ruins, and will jump down after the player uses the gesture while standing below him. Blaidd will tell the player he is searching for a man who goes by the name Darriwil.

name: Chelona's Rise
description: A tower found in the very corner of the upper plateau in Liurnia's southwest. This tower is initially sealed, with an imp statue at the entrance holding a glowing book, instructing you to "seek three great wise beasts". See the tower's page for details.

name: Blaidd (2nd Location)
description: Blaidd's Second Encounter. Darriwil can be fought at the Forlorn Hound Evergaol, where Blaidd will become available as a summon. Speak to Blaidd again after the fight.Talking to Blaidd once will yield a Somber Smithing stone [2]. Talk to him a second time and he will mention a blacksmith along the Road to the Manor in Liurnia, and instruct the player to say that "Blaidd sent them". Doing this will unlock the Carian Filigreed Crest in the blacksmith's shop.If the Evergaol fight was completed before meeting Blaidd, he will still be available to speak to here after the player talks to him in the Mistwood Ruins.

name: Chelona's Rise Turtle Marker 1
description: Giant Ghostly Turtle #1. One of three required to break the seal to Chelona's Rise. Found hanging off the side of the cliffs west of the tower.

name: Chelona's Rise Turtle Marker 2
description: Giant Ghostly Turtle #2. One of three required to break the seal to Chelona's Rise. Found sitting on a lower cliff south of Lunar Estate Ruins. Head to the edge of the plateau and look down. You can hit the turtle with a ranged attack from here.

name: Chelona's Rise Turtle Marker 3
description: Giant Ghostly Turtle #3. One of three required to break the seal to Chelona's Rise. Found flying high above in the air southeast of Ringleader's Evergaol. You can use a bow to hit it or use the Spiritspring nearby to jump with Torrent and hit it while in the air.

name: Ranni's Dark Moon
description: Sorcery Spell. Found in a chest at the top of Chelona's Rise after unlocking the tower's seal.

name: Jarburg
description: Jarburg Village of Living Jars. Abundant herb materials and some Smithing Stone (3) can be found here.

name: Jarburg
description: Site of Grace found in the village of Jarburg.

name: Smithing Stone [3] - 3x Jarburg
description: Upgrade Material. 3 are found on a corpse on top of the hut that you land on as you descend into the village.

name: Lakeside Crystal Cave
description: Small cave south from the Scenic Isle Site of Grace in Liurnia of the Lakes.

name: Spear Talisman
description: Talisman found in a chest within Lakeside Crystal Cave

name: Bloodhound Knight
description: Found within Lakeside Crystal Cave. Drops Cerulean Amber Medallion

name: Cerulean Amber Medallion
description: Talisman dropped by Bloodhound Knight, the miniboss of Lakeside Crystal Cave

name: Slumbering Wolf's Shack
description: Special location to meet NPC Latenna, who is part of a questline for Village of the Albinaurics. Only accessible through Lakeside Crystal Cave

name: Latenna
description: NPC found in Slumbering Wolf's Shack. Promising Latenna to take her to the Haligtree, she will join the player and willingly become a Spirit Ash summon, Latenna the Albinauric. She will also hint at the location of the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left).

name: Memory Stone - Lenne's Rise
description: Memory Slot Upgrade Item. Found in a chest at the top of Lenne's Rise. The entrance to the tower is sealed but you can use a Spiritspring in the back of the tower to land on a balcony and gain entry.

name: Smithing-Stone Miner's Bell Bearing (4)
description: Key Item. Dropped by the Godskin Duo upon defeat.

name: Ash of War: Black Flame Tornado
description: Ash of War. Dropped by the Godskin Duo upon defeat.

name: Golden Rune (10) E
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse hanging off a ledge north of the dragon temple.

name: Old Fang E
description: Crafting Material. Five found on a corpse hanging off a ledge north of the Dragon Temple.

name: Hero's Rune (5) B
description: Rune Consumable. One found on a corpse by an outer ledge behind a wall. You can get to the ledge by carefully walking on the broken section while hugging the wall.

name: Smithing Stone (7) D
description: Upgrade Material. One found on a corpse behind a fallen pillar in the northern section of Farum Azula.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (9) B
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse sitting behind a fallen pillar in the northern section.

name: Dragon Temple Lift
description: Site of Grace found by ascending the lift. The entrance to the lift is locked behind an Imp Statue seal that requires 2x Stonesword Keysto unlock.

name: Nascent Butterfly (E)
description: Crafting Materia. 2 are found by a tree east of the fountain plaza.

name: Smithing Stone (8) C
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse at the edge of the cliffs. This is on the upper level after ascending the Dragon Temple Lift.

name: Rune Arc O
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse by some pillars south of the fountain plaza. This area is on the upper level after ascending the Dragon Temple Lift.

name: Golden Seed (P)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found under a Phantom Tree by some pillars south of the fountain plaza. This area is on the upper level after ascending the Dragon Temple Lift.

name: Golden Lightning Fortification
description: Incantation. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab by the cliffs south of the fountain plaza. This area is on the upper level after ascending the Dragon Temple Lift.

name: Smithing Stone (8) D
description: Upgrade Material. One found on a corpse in front of a sleeping dragon, far south of the fountain plaza. This area is on the upper level after ascending the Dragon Temple Lift.

name: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman +2
description: Upgraded Talisman. Found on a corpse on a chunk of floating debris in the north of the region.

name: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone (A)
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse on a floating platform, guarded by a beastman. This platform can be reached by jumping on a floating pillar connecting to it.

name: Golden Rune (12) C
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse at the edge of some floating debris in the northern section of the region.

name: Dragon Temple Rooftop
description: Site of Grace found atop the large structure in the north section of the region.

name: Smithing Stone (6) B
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse in front of the Dragon Temple rooftop gardens.

name: Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone (A)
description: Upgrade Material. Found in a gazebo behind a large dragon.

name: Golden Rune (12) D
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse in a plaza in front of a large dragon the northeast section of the region.

name: Golem's Halberd
description: Dropped by one of the Golems at the bridge.

name: War-Dead Catacombs
description: Catacombs found within Starscourge Radahn's boss arena

name: Radahn Soldier Ashes
description: Spirit Ashes found within War-Dead Catacombs Go up the stairs to the back right of the first room and go left. Past the archer at the end of the hall turn right, turning right again at the end of that hall past the greatsword knight. Jump through the window to the right near the end of this hall. Go left up the stairs and the ashes will be in a room in front of you behind a knight.

name: Enemy Caravan 1 (Consecrated Snowfield)
description: Enemy Caravan. Loot the chest to obtain St. Trina's Torch

name: Enemy Caravan 2 (Consecrated Snowfield)
description: Enemy Caravan. Loot the chest to obtain Flowing Curved Sword

name: Flowing Curved Sword
description: Curved Sword. Found within the chest of the Enemy Caravan traveling the Consecrated Snowfield south-western area.

name: Enemy Caravan (Limgrave)
description: Enemy Caravan traveling the road South in Limgrave. Chest within contains Greataxe.

name: Night's Cavalry - 2x (Consecrated Snowfield)
description: Two Night's Cavalry mini-bosses guard the wagon in the Consecrated Snowfield. Spawn at night only. Drops Night Cavalry's Set and Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone

name: Night's Cavalry Set
description: Full Set dropped by one of the two mini-boss Night's Cavalry guarding a Consecrated Fields caravan at night.

name: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone (Consecrated Snowfield Boss Drop)
description: Dropped by one of the two mini-boss Night's Cavalry guarding a Consecrated Fields caravan at night, alongside the Night's Cavalry Set

name: Deathbird (Stormhill)
description: Appears only at night. East of Warmaster's Shack just over the cliff. It drops the Blue-Feathered Branchsword

name: Miquella's Haligtree
description: Legacy Dungeon. North from the Consecrated Snowfield. Miquella's Haligtree is accessed by doing the Evergaol puzzle located at Ordina, Liturgical Town

name: Waygate to Miquella's Haligtree
description: Waygate accessible only after completing the Evergaol Puzzle at Ordina, Liturgical Town

name: Prayer Room
description: Can be easily found at the entrance of the church a few metters away after go just enter Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

name: Haligtree Roots
description: Found underground after taking the lift from the large building in the northeast.

name: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Legacy Dungeon. Accessed through Miquella's Haligtree.

name: Crystal Bud - 2x - Liurnia Lake Shore
description: Found within the proximities of the Liurnia Lake Shore Site of Grace.

name: Artist's Shack (Limgrave)
description: A broken shack with a collectible picture. Many such shacks can be found in The Lands Between.

name: Caelid Catacombs
description: Found due East from the Cathedral of Dragon Communion.

name: Miranda Sprout Ashes
description: Spirit Ashes. Found behind a hidden wall in Caelid Catacombs. You must attack a wall to the right of the staircase to reveal a path to the ashes.

name: Deathbird (Weeping Peninsula)
description: Spawns only at night, drops the Sacrificial Axe

name: Deathbird (Liurnia of the Lakes South)
description: Only spawns at night. North east of the Scenic Isle site of grace in Liurnia under the ruin wall. It drops the Red-Feathered Branchsword

name: Blue-Feathered Branchsword
description: Talisman. Dropped from miniboss that only spawns at night: Deathbird (Stormhill)

name: Sacrificial Axe
description: Axe. Dropped from miniboss that only spawns at night: Deathbird (Weeping Peninsula)

name: Temple Quarter
description: Site of grace at Temple Quarter

name: Sellia Hideaway
description: Cave in Caelid, part of Selen's Quesline

name: Stars of Ruin
description: Given by Master Lusat when interacted with inside the Sellia Hideaway behind an arcane ward in the second pit. Requires the Sellian Sealbreaker to get through arcane ward (Acquired during Sorceress Sellen Questline).

name: Crystalians (Trio - Sellia Hideaway)
description: Miniboss Trio fight against Putrid Crystalian's. Crystalian (Spear), Crystalian (Ringblade) & Crystalian (Staff). Damage received from all attacks builds Scarlet Rot. Drop Crystal Torrent

name: Crystal Torrent
description: Dropped by Crystalians Trio boss in Sellia Hideaway

name: Night's Cavalry (Liurnia of the Lakes North)
description: Spawns only at night. Drops Ash of War: Giant Hunt and Nightrider Glaive

name: Ash of War: Giant Hunt
description: Ash of War dropped by miniboss Night's Cavalry. Only appears at night.

name: Nightrider Glaive
description: Halberd dropped by miniboss Night's Cavalry. Only appears at night.

name: Sage's Cave
description: Cave in Western Altus Plateau, has Black Knife Assassin loot.

name: Necromancer Garris
description: One of the bosses of Sage's Cave. Drops flail: Family Heads

name: Family Heads
description: Flail. Dropped from boss of Sage's Cave, Necromancer Garris.

name: Black Knife Assassin (Sage's Cave)
description: Secret boss within Sage's Cave. Drops Concealing Veil talisman.

name: Concealing Veil
description: Talisman dropped by the Black Knife Assassin boss within Sage's Cave

name: Black Knife Assassin (Liurnia of the Lakes East)
description: Miniboss of the Black Knife Catacombs. Drops Assassin's Cerulean Dagger

name: Yelough Anix Tunnel
description: Tunnels in Western Consecrated Snowfield, rich in very rare smithing materials.

name: Astel, Stars of Darkness
description: Boss of Yelough Anix Tunnel in Consecrated Snowfield. Drops Meteorite of Astel

name: Meteorite of Astel
description: Gravity Sorcery. Dropped by Astel, Stars of Darkness, the boss of Yelough Anix Tunnel.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [8] - Yelough Anix Tunnel
description: Somber Smithing Stones [8] are found throughout the tunnel as little shinny white stones on the wall or at the end of some cavities.

name: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone - 1x (Yelough Anix Tunnel)
description: Upgrade Material. In the room with the wooden walkways, there is a lower area you can drop down to in the center. Defeat the Alabaster Lord found here and you can loot the stone off of the body in the back.

name: Dragon Temple Altar
description: This Site of Grace becomes available after defeating the Godskin Duo.

name: Draconic Tree Sentinel
description: The Draconic Tree Sentinel may not be presented as a boss this time, but it must be defeated in order to be able to go through the gate he's guarding.

name: Beside the Great Bridge
description: A Site of Grace located in Crumbling Farum Azula.

name: Recusant Bernahl
description: Invaded by Recusant Bernahl, previously known as Knight Bernahl.

name: Devourer's Scepter
description: Dropped by Recusant Bernahl when defeated.

name: Beast Champion Set
description: Complete Beast Champion Armor Set, dropped by Recusant Bernahl when defeated. Altered Chest Piece.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [8] - Dragon Temple Rooftop
description: Held by a corpse at the east terrace of the Dragon Temple.

name: Death Rite Bird (Caelid Swamp)
description: Only spawns at night. East from the Southern Aeonia Swamp Bank site of grace, before Sellia Gateway. It drops the Death's Poker Greatsword

name: Death's Poker
description: Greatsword. Dropped by miniboss Deathbird that appears only at night.

name: Depraved Perfumer Carmaan Ashes
description: Spirit Ash. Found behind a hidden room in the secret passageway of Volcano Manor. After heading in the secret passage, before going downstairs, turn left and go through the hallway full of snails. At the dead end where you get the cookbook, smack the left wall to reveal the hidden room.

name: Bloodhound Claws
description: Claw. Dropped by the Bloodhound Knight in the secret passage of Volcano Manor.

name: Fireproof Dried Liver (A) - Volcano Manor
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse guarded by the Bloodhound Knight in Volcano Manor's secret passageway.

name: Prison Town Church
description: Site of Grace located in a church in the Volcano Manor dungeon.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (5) - x1 Swamp of Aeonia
description: Found on a body lying against the cluster of crystals found deep within the rocks, an Arcane Sphere of Faces is found in front of it.

name: Crimson Amber Medallion +1
description: Talisman. Found at the top of a room locked behind an imp statue in the Volcano Manor dungeon.

name: Glintstone Firefly x3
description: Found on the Crystal Cluster here between the rocky cliff faces

name: Fireproof Dried Liver (B) - Volcano Manor
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse in the outskirts of a building in the Volcano Manor dungeon.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [6] B - Volcano Manor
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse slouched over a fountain in the Volcano Manor dungeon surrounded by Burning Slugs.

name: Rock Sling
description: Found inside a chest underground, there are a set of stairs leading downwards in one of the broken stone buildings in the area.

name: Aeonia Swamp Shore
description: Site of Grace found within the Swamp of Aeonia

name: Somber Smithing Stone (5)
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse hanging off of a ledge in Volcano Manor's dungeon. After going up the cage lift, turn right to find it.

name: Inner Aeonia
description: Site of grace within the Swamp of Aeonia

name: Erdtree Seal
description: Sacred Seal. Found on a corpse in a building close to the Omenkiller in the Volcano Manor dungeon.

name: Rotten Stray Ashes
description: Found on a body within a broken building, there is a Rotten Stray nearby.

name: Smoldering Shield
description: Small Shield. Found on a corpse on the sitting by some tombstones on the same level as the lava in the Volcano Manor dungeon.

name: Auriza Side Tomb
description: A Catacomb east from Lyndell, for fallen Auriza warriors

name: Smithing Stone [6] C - Volcano Manor
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse sitting amongst some tombstone in a tiny island in the lava in the Volcano Manor dungeon.

name: Magma Wyrm (Volcano Manor)
description: Optional Field Boss. Pops out of the lava in the Volcano Manor dungeon after taking the cage lift down.

name: Dragon Heart (Magma Wyrm Volcano Manor)
description: Consumable. Dropped by the Magma Wyrm in Volcano Manor.

name: Smithing Stone [7] - Volcano Manor
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse in the back of the cave in Volcano Manor where you fight the Magma Wyrm

name: Temple of Eiglay
description: Site of Grace that spawns after beating the Godskin Noble in Volcano Manor.

name: Boilprawn Shack
description: A shack in Liurnia of the Lakes where players can meet Blackguard Big Boggart

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy
description: Multiplayer Item. Found on a corpse sitting at the edge of a cliff in the Volcano Manor dungeon.

name: Blackguard Big Boggart
description: Merchant who sells an item for Rya's quest and can also be summoned for the Magma Wyrm boss fight.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [5] B - Volcano Manor
description: Upgrade Material. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab rolling on cooled lava in the Volcano Manor dungeon.

name: Man-Serpent Ashes
description: Spirit Ash. Found on an altar protected by some enemies in Volcano Manor's dungeon.

name: Seedbed Curse - Volcano Manor
description: Key Item. Found on a corpse at the bottom of a room locked behind an imp statue in Volcano Manor's dungeon.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [2] - Volcano Manor
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse hanging off of a broken banister in Volcano Manor's dungeon.

name: Ash of War: Royal Knight's Resolve
description: Ash of War. Found on a corpse in the hallways of Volcano Manor. Accessible from the imp statue locked room in the dungeon of the manor.

name: Ash of War: Golden Slam
description: Sacred affinity Ash of War. Obtained by defeating a Teardrop Scarab in Woodfolk Ruins.

name: Volcano Manor Waygate
description: Waygate. Found on a balcony at the top of the stairs of a temple in Volcano Manor's dungeon. Teleports you to the Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy boss fight.

name: Audience Pathway
description: Site of Grace found right outside Rykard's boss room. Accessed by completing all 3 assassination quests for the Volcano Manor and talking to Tanith, or completing the manor's hidden dungeon and taking the waygate.

name: Eye Surcoat
description: Chest Armor. Found on the ground after defeating Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy.

name: Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy
description: Site of Grace that spawns after Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy's defeat.

name: Lux Ruins
description: Ruins located north of the Grand Lift of Dectus.

name: Ash of War: Shield Crash
description: Ash of war with no affinity, dropped by a teardrop scarab in Lux Ruins, Altus Plateau.

name: Yelough Anix Tunnel Site of Grace
description: Located inside Yelough Anix Tunnel

name: Underground Roadside
description: Site of Grace found underground in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds.

name: Ghost Glovewort (9) - x1 Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs
description: Ghost Gravewort found in a room with 2 Cleanrot Knights.

name: Haligdrake Talisman +1
description: Upgraded Talisman. Found on a corpse next to a Lesser Spirit-Caller Snail inside the Leyndell Catacombs.
