From the Lyndell Catacombs site of grace, head up the elevator in the southeast to find a room with 3 spirit crossbowmen. Look next to the stairs for an illusory wall. Hit it to dispel the illusion, and then hit the wall on the left to dispel another illusion. The corpse and snail are found in here.

name: Perfumer's Grotto
description: Cave overrun by Perfumers and their poison flowers.

name: Miranda the Blighted Bloom / Omenkiller
description: Dual Bossfight against Omenkiller and Miranda the Blighted Bloom at Perfumer's Grotto. Drops Great Omenkiller Cleaver

name: Great Omenkiller Cleaver
description: Greataxe. Dropped by the boss duo of Perfumer's Grotto: Omenkiller and Miranda the Blighted Bloom.

name: Perfume Bottle - Perfumer's Grotto
description: Crafting Material. One bottle can be looted from a chest inside Perfumer's Grotto

name: Walking Mausoleum (Liurnia of the Lakes East)
description: Attack the legs to bring down the mausoleum and go inside it.

name: Walking Mausoleum (Liurnia of the Lakes Central)
description: Attack the legs to bring down the mausoleum and go inside it.

name: Aspect of the Crucible: Breath
description: Incantation. Dropped by Tanith's Knight. After defeating Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy, speak with Tanith then go back to Rykard's body. If you attack her here in his boss area, her knight will invade.

name: Stonesword Key - Subterranean Shunning-Grounds
description: Stonesword Key. One found in the Aqueducts section of the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds. From the Underground Roadside site of grace, head northeast and drop down into an opening in the ground to enter the aqueducts. From here, head northwest past the rats and look for a tunnel on the right. Follow this tunnel until you see slimes and drop into the hole in front of them. Follow the path all the way to the end to grab the key on a corpse.

name: Consort's Set
description: Armor Set. Dropped by Tanith's Knight. After defeating Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy, speak with Tanith then go back to Rykard's body. If you attack her here in his boss area, her knight will invade.

name: Smithing Stone [7] - Subterranean Shunning-Grounds
description: Upgrade Material. One found in the Aqueducts section of the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds.

name: Nomad Ashes
description: Spirit Ashes. Found on a corpse in the Subterranean Shunning-Groundsbeneath the capital. This is in a large, multi-level section in the east.

name: Smithing Stone [8] - Subterranean Shunning-Grounds
description: Upgrade Material. One found at a dead end tunnel that slopes downwards, inside the central Aqueduct section of the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds beneath the Royal Capital.

name: Dung Eater (Subterranean Shunning-Grounds)
description: Quest NPC. Found in a cell in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds beneath the Royal Capital. To reach his cell, head northeast from the Underground Roadside site of grace and enter a grate in the floor to access the aqueducts. Continue north past the Rats and Giant Poison Flower and climb up the ladder. You can find the cell door in the next room past the ladder. It is unlocked using the Sewer-Gaol Key given by the same NPC but in his non-corporeal form at the Roundtable Hold.

name: Lost Ashes of War - Subterranean Shunning-Grounds
description: Lost Ashes of War. Found in the room before Dung Eater's cell in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds beneath the Royal Capital. Beware the Giant Spider Hand that emerges as you loot the item.

name: Dung Eater (Royal Capital Moat)
description: NPC Invader. Found after releasing Dung Eater's corporeal body from his cell in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds and then reading his message at the Roundtable Hold.

name: Sword of Milos
description: Greatsword. Dropped by Dung Eater as an NPC invader upon defeat.

name: Stonesword Key - Miquella's Haligtree (A)
description: Key Item. Found on a corpse lying at the tip of a branch in Miquella's Haligtree canopy right behind you when you enter the area.

name: Stonesword Key - Miquella's Haligtree (B)
description: Key Item. Found on a corpse lying at the tip of a branch in Miquella's Haligtree canopy.

name: Lost Ashes of War - Miquella's Haligtree
description: Ash of War Upgrade. Found on a corpse slumped over in front of a statue in Miquella's Haligtree canopy.

name: Smithing Stone (8)
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse inside a building in Miquella's Haligtree. Be careful of the Misbegotten just around the corner.

name: Subterranean Shunning-Grounds
description: A massive underground sewer network found beneath the Royal Capital. The entrance can be found in a well northeast of the Avenue Balcony.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (8)
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse draped over the balcony of a building in Miquella's Haligtree.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (9)
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse inside a small building in Miquella's Haligtree.

name: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse in front of a statue in in Miquella's Haligtree. Guarded by an axe-wielding Misbegotten.

name: Smithing Stone (6)
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse on the roof of a small building in Miquella's Haligtree.

name: Smithing Stone (6)
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse on a platform in Miquella's Haligtree filled with scarlet rot zombies.

name: Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree
description: Great Enemy. Found in the large courtyard of a temple in Miquella's Haligtree.

name: Smithing Stone (7)
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse in front of a gazebo connecting 3 bridges in Miquella's Haligtree. This area is guarded by two sorcerers.

name: Smithing Stone (8) - x4 - Consecrated Snowfield
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse laying inside a gazebo connecting 3 bridges in Miquella's Haligtree. This area is guarded by two sorcerers.-Another one can be found on the river, south to the Minor Erdtree. On a statue. Need to be broken by an enemy.

name: Loretta's Mastery
description: Sorcery. Dropped by Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree

name: Loretta's War Sickle
description: Halberd. Dropped by Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree.

name: Crimson Amber Medallion +2
description: By falling down the sewers gate, on the beam below, just before fully entering the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds

name: Somber Smithing Stone (9)
description: On the right, in a cavity where you find the Onyx Lord.

name: Putrid Avatar
description: A Putrid Avatar is found at the bottom of the Minor Erdtree here in the Consecrated Snowfield.

name: Minor Erdtree (Consecrated Snowfield)
description: Minor Erdtree found in the Consecrated Snowfield

name: Ruptured Crystal Tear
description: Dropped by the Putrid Avatar under the Minor Erdtree in Consecrated Snowfield

name: Nascent Butterfly - x1 Ordina, Liturgical Town
description: Nascent Butterfly found under the stairs in Ordina, Liturgical Town

name: Golden Rune (10) - x1 Ordina, Liturgical Town
description: Found on a body on the floor of Ordina, Liturgical Town

name: Invigorating Cured Meat - x1 Ordina, Liturgical Town
description: Found on a body on top of the stairs in Ordina, Liturgical Town

name: Freezing Grease - x2 Ordina, Liturgical Town
description: Found on a body lying in the middle of the snow on the west side of Ordina, Liturgical Town

name: Golden Rune (13)
description: Found on a body at the edge of the cliffs in the Consecrated Snowfield. There is a jumping path up from here to the Apostate Derelict in the West.

name: Stalwart Horn Charm +1
description: Found to the east of Yelough Anix Tunnel

name: Smithing Stone (8)
description: Found on a corpse resting against a pillar.

name: Hero's Rune (2)
description: Found on a body by the edge of the large pillar hanging off the edge.

name: Cave of the Forlorn
description: Located south of the Minor Erdtree in Consecrated Snowfield

name: Thawfrost Boluses x2
description: Found on a body atop one of the pillars in the Consecrated Snowfield.

name: Crystal Dart x4
description: Found on a body being devoured by Rotten Strays in the Consecrated Snowfield

name: Golden Rune (7) - x1 - Cave of Forlorn
description: Inside  Cave of the Forlorn. Just jump down from the site of grace.

name: Great Wyrm Theodorix
description: Optional Boss found outside of the Cave of the Forlorn at night.

name: Warming Stone x4
description: Found on a body laying over a dead tree.

name: Freezing Grease - x4 - Cave of the Forlorn
description: Can be found inside Cave of the Forlorn. just pass the Golden Rune (7)- Another one inside the cave, on a body against a wall on a small room.

name: Ghost Glovewort (9)
description: It is dropped by an invisible warrior found by entering first the evergaol, you can defeat him by paying attention to the footprints on the ground.

name: Beast Clergyman / Maliketh, The Black Blade
description: This Bossfight constitutes the final stage of the Crumbling Farum Azula zone. The fight starts against Beast Clergyman but it is revealed mid-fight whis was Maliketh, The Black Blade.

name: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
description: Found in a chest, at the top of a tower, no traps or tricks.

name: Enemy Caravan (Dragonbarrow)
description: Enemy Caravan. The Greatword can be looted from its chest.

name: Greatsword
description: Colossal Sword. Looted from the chest in the enemy caravan traveling the Dragonbarrow road.

name: Rune Arc
description: Consumable. Looted from a chest near the enemy caravan traveling Dragonbarrow's Road.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [3] - 1x Caelid Scarab Drop
description: Upgrade Material. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab.

name: Ash of War: Flame of the Redmanes
description: Ash of War. Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab near the North Fort Gael Site of Grace

name: Smithing Stone [5] - 1x Caelid Treasure
description: Upgrade Material. Looted as a treasure in the open field in Caelid.

name: Golden Rune [9] - 1x Caelid Treasure
description: Consumable Item. Found as a treasure in Caelid

name: Isolated Merchant (Raya Lucaria)
description: Merchant. Sells Spirit Ashes, Cookbook, Stonesword Key, Warrior Set, and several useful items.

name: Rotten Duelist Helm
description: Guaranteed Drop from the Rotten Duelist enemy in the area

name: Rotten Battle Hammer
description: Warhammer. Guaranteed drop from the Rotten Duelist enemy in the area

name: Bell Bearing Hunter (Church of Vows)
description: Field Boss. Found at the Church of Vows during night time. Alternatively, you can spawn him by advancing to night, resting at the grace once more and then advancing to morning. Drops the Meat Peddler's Bell Bearing</a. upon defeat.

name: Meat Peddler's Bell Bearing
description: Key Item. Dropped by the Bell Bearing Hunter at the Church of Vows upon defeat.

name: Graven-Mass Talisman
description: Talisman found in a chest atop the Albinauric Rise tower.

name: Yelough Anix Ruins
description: A set of ruins found west of the Consecrated Snowfield.

name: Stonesword Key - Yelough Anix Ruins
description: Stonesword Key. Found inside a small open structure in the northern section of the ruins.

name: Unendurable Frenzy
description: Incantation. Found in a chest in an underground treasure room in the central section of the Yelough Anix Ruins.

name: Holy Grease - 3x Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Consumable. 3 are found on a corpse on the bridge towards the Prayer Room at the base of Elphael.

name: Golden Order Greatsword
description: Found inside Cave of the Forlorn. Dropped by  Misbegotten Crusader

name: Golden Rune [13] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Rune Consumable. Found in a small room along with Haligtree Knights sitting on chairs. This room is found along the walkway after the Prayer Room.

name: Smithing Stone [7] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse inside a wine cellar/storage room.

name: Triple Rings of Light
description: Incantation. Found in a chest locked behind an Imp Statue barrier. Requires 2 Stonesword Keys to unlock.

name: Immunizing White Cured Meat - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse at the end of the eastern walkway, on the bottom level.

name: Smithing Stone [7] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse in a large room with many braziers and two Cleanrot Knights.

name: Golden Rune [10] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse leaning over the balcony of the room with many braziers.

name: Misbegotten Crusader
description: Boss found at the end of the  Cave of the Forlorn. Drops  Golden Order Greatsword

name: Smithing Stone [8] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse on a balcony. You can reach this corpse by going into the building on the left and heading up the stairs.

name: Miquellan Knight's Sword
description: Straight Sword. Found atop a belltower. You can reach this belltower by entering the second alcove on the left of the eastern walkway, heading up the stairs and then jumping onto the tree branch on the balcony. Follow the tree branch up and across to reach the tower.

name: Warming Stone - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Consumable. 2 are found on a corpse sitting by a desk inside a building in the northeast. This building can be reached by following the eastern walkway all the way to the northeast and walking along a concrete beam connecting to the building.

name: Grave Glovewort (7) - x1 - Cave of The Forlorn
description: Found inside the  Cave of the Forlorn, in the big room where you fight a few Jellyfish.

name: Spiritflame Arrow - 15x Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Ammunition. 15x found on a corpse sitting on a chair inside a building in the northeast. This building can be reached by following the eastern walkway all the way to the northeast and walking along a concrete beam connecting to the building.

name: Rotten Staff
description: Colossal Weapon. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar patrolling the ring walkway in the east.

name: Numen's Rune - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse at the edge of a broken section of the ring walkway in the east.

name: Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse in the southern end of the ring walkway in the east.

name: Missionary's Cookbook [4]
description: Can be found on Minor Erdtree Church, Capital area.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [9] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse inside a room at the northern end of the ring walkway in the east. Guarded by a Crystalian.

name: Golden Rune [12] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse next to an Imp Statue seal in the lower levels.

name: Grave Glovewort [9] - Hidden Path to the Haligtree
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. 3 can be found in the Hidden Path to the Haligtree. The first is guarded by two Land Octopuses and a Vulgar Militiaman near the exit to the Consecrated Snowfield. The next two are found in the secret catacombs below. One is in the first alcove that you can access after jumping down onto the invisible walkways under the staircase. The last one can be found in a third alcove across to the west from the second alcove guarded by two Vulgar Militants.

name: Ash of War: Cragblade
description: Can be found at West of Impassable Greatbridge site, on a scarab in the sword monument

name: Stranded Graveyard
description: Players are transported here after dying for the first time at the beginning of the game.

name: Golden Rune [5] - x1 - Perfumer's Ruins
description: Located on one of the south facing walls, where the main table with the candles is.

name: Perfumer's Cookbook [1] - Perfumer's Ruins
description: Located at a chest west of the table with the candles on it.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [9] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse in a dark building in the northeast guarded by 3 Crystalians. This building is in the bottom level of the area.

name: Golden Rune [5] - x1 - Highway Lookout Tower
description: Held by the corpse in the middle of the area. Beware of the spawning Spirit Wandering Nobles.

name: Pickled Turtle Neck - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse in a dark building in the northeast, guarded by 3 Crystalians. This room is in the bottom level of the area.

name: Smithing Stone [8] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse under a tree at the bottom level in the north of the city.

name: Smithing Stone [8] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse in between two ballistae in the north of the city.

name: Haligtree Soldier Ashes
description: Spirit Ashes. Found under a large decorative chalice in the northern edge of the main city proper.

name: Haligtree Knight Helm
description: Helmet. Found on a corpse in an upper level room next to the Elphael Inner Wall site of grace. There is a ladder adjacent to the grace which leads to the room.

name: Smithing Stone [6] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse by the wall directly north of the Elphael Inner Wall site of grace.

name: Rotten Crystal Sword
description: Straight Sword. Found in a chest guarded by 3 Crystalians. From the Elphael Inner Wall site of grace, head down the steps and jump over the rubble on the left. You can engage the Crystalians one by one by luring them to the hallway.

name: Hero's Rune [5] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse behind a large decorative chalice at the end of the hallway after the Elphael Inner Wall site of grace.

name: Golden Rune [10] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse in a small alcove along the inner wall. Note that this is found after traversing the lake of rot, after passing the Elphael Inner Wall site of grace.

name: Great Grave Glovewort - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found in the center of the second lake of rot, past a second set of branches inside the inner walls. Beware the Ulcerated Tree Spirit lurking beneath.

name: Golden Seed - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Dropped by the Ulcerated Tree Spirit lurking beneath the second lake of rot, past a second set of branches within the inner walls.

name: Traveler's Set
description: Armor Set comprised of Traveler's Clothes, Traveler's Manchettes and Traveler's Boots. All three pieces are found deep underground in a side room with a large orange flower, adjacent to the Haligtree Roots site of grace. This area can be reached by taking the lift from the large building in the northeast.

name: Ghost Glovewort [7] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found in a cluster of graves far to the northeast.

name: Numen's Rune - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse in the southwest end of the graveyard in the northwest of the city.

name: Ghost Glovewort [8] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found on a grave in the southwest end of the graveyard in the northeast of the city.

name: Ghost Glovewort [7] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found on a grave in the western section of the graveyard northeast of the city.

name: Ghost-Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing (3)
description: Key Item. Found on a corpse in the western section of the graveyard in the northeast of the city.

name: Ghost Glovewort [9] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found on a grave in the western section of the graveyard in the northwest of the building.

name: Hero's Rune [5] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse under a large tree in the eastern graveyard.

name: Golden Rune (3) - x4 - Liurnia's North Sarcophagi
description: Multiple Golden Runes can be found within the sarcophagi under the cliffs.

name: Rimed Crystal Bud - Caria Manor
description: Rimed Crystal Buds can be found within the garden of the Caria Manor

name: Swamp Lookout Tower
description: A long-abandoned lookout tower, that now only oversees the poisonous swamp that plagues Caelid.

name: Eternal Darkness
description: Sorcery. Found within Swamp Lookout Tower in Caelid.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [3] - 1x Southern Caelid
description: Upgrade Material. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the southern edges of Caelid.

name: Magic Grease - 1x Converted Tower
description: Consumable. Looted near the tower.

name: Iron Fist Alexander (Fourth Location)
description: NPC. Third location on this questline. He can then be summoned for the boss fight against Starscourge Radahn. If he has not been interacted with prior to this, he will show up at the festival anyway and introduce himself.Before moving to his next location, he can be found scavenging at Starscourge Radahn's Site of Grace.

name: Iron Fist Alexander (Fifth Location)
description: NPC. Alexander's fifth location on this questline. Found in Liurnia of the Lakes, just south of Carian Study Hall. Follow the path south from the Artist's Shack Site of Grace. Alexander will call out for help as the player gets closer to his location. He will ask you to make him "slippery". Use an Oil Pot to free him.

name: Iron Fist Alexander (Sixth Location)
description: NPC. Alexander's Fifth location on this questline. Found near the Seethewater Terminus Site of Grace at a lava lake south of Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir. Alexander is sitting in the lake behind a Magma Wyrm. It is recommended to consider healing before engaging in conversation.

name: Page Ashes
description: Spirit Ashes. Found in Cliffbottom Catacombs right before you pull the lever to open the Boss Door.

name: Ash of War: Shield Bash
description: Ash of War. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab under a bridge very close to East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace.

name: Celebrant's Skull
description: Warhammer. Found on a corpse at the cliff directly north from Windmill village site of grace

name: Hermit Merchant's Shack
description: Merchant dwells here. Sells Sentry's Torch and Prophet Set among other items.

name: Hermit Merchant
description: Merchant within the Hermit Merchant's Shack. Replaced by Bell Bearing Hunter at night.

name: Bell Bearing Hunter
description: Invading NPC miniboss that spawns only at night.

name: Bell Bearing Hunter (Isolated Merchant Dragonbarrow)
description: Field Boss. Found outside the shack at night time, where the merchant usually sits. Drops the Gravity Stone Peddler's Bell Bearing upon defeat.

name: Gravity Stone Peddler's Bell Bearing
description: Key Item. Dropped by the Bell Bearing Hunter that spawns at this location at night time.

name: Divine Tower of East Altus
description: Divine Tower of East Altus.

name: Isolated Divine Tower
description: Tower to activate Malenia's Great Rune

name: Ash of War: Sky Shot
description: Ash of War. Drops from Teardrop Scarab behind Isolated Merchant's Shack

name: Ash of War: Golden Parry
description: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found within the Capital Outskirts.

name: Spelldrake Talisman +1
description: Upgraded Talisman. Found in a chest in a small room the northwest section of town. Right below where the Staff of Loss is obtained. This room is initially sealed by a barrier that can be dispelled by lighting a brazier atop a tower in the southwest of town.

name: Cleanrot Knight Duo (Abandoned Cave)
description: Duo Boss Fight at the end of the Abandoned Cave. Drops the Gold Scarab talisman upon defeat.

name: Cracked Pot - Minor Erdtree (Caelid)
description: Crafting Pot. One found at the end of a tree branch extending from the northwest cliffs behind the tree.

name: Longhaft Axe
description: Rare drop from enemies wielding it at Castle Mourne in Weeping Peninsula. There is an easy to kill one from Beside the Rampant Gaol site of grace, cross the bridge and will be on the left sleeping.

name: Incantation Scarab
description: Need to examine the Homecoming Painting at Artist's Shack first. The Incantation Scarab can be found Southwest of the Dragon Burnt Ruins, there will be a gravestone with a ghost sitting in front of it. Interact with the ghost, and it will drop the Incantation Scarab.

name: Imp Head (Wolf) - x1 - MINOR ERDTREE CATACOMBS
description: Found inside Minor Erdtree Catacombs, held by a corpse laying over a sarcophagus.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [9] - Farum Greatbridge
description: Upgrade Material. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found to the west of Farum Greatbridge.

name: Cinquedea
description: Dagger. Found outside the bestial sanctum, after a long series of platforms starting on the west side to drop down onto the external structure's base.

name: Spiked Palisade Shield
description: On dead body under a Golem, west of Deep Siofra Well, Caelid

name: Jellyfish Shield
description: On a dead body surrounded by four Jellyfish directly north of the Foot of the Four Belfries Site of Grace.

name: Candletree Wooden Shield
description: In the Sage's Cave, in a chest behind an illusory wall.

name: Crimson Hood
description: Roderika's questline must be completed and spirit tuning must be unlocked for this item to appear on top of the pile of corpses surrounded by the Rotten Strays where the Chrysalids' Memento was acquired.

name: Nox Mirrorhelm
description: Cliffbottom Catacombs: In the sealed room, accessible by using a Stonesword Key at the Imp Statue.

name: Golden Rune (3) - Caelid's North East Sarcophagi
description: Rune Consumable. Found among a cluster of sarcophagi high up on a cliff. You can reach this area by using the Spiritspring at Lenne's Rise.

name: Sainted Hero's Grave
description: The Sainted Hero's Grave is found in Altus Plateau, west of Rampartside Path.

name: Golden Rune (6)
description: Rune Consumable. Found among a cluster of sarcophagi high up on a cliff. You can reach this area by using the Spiritspring at Lenne's Rise.

name: Golden Rune (8)
description: Rune Consumable. Found among a cluster of sarcophagi high up on a cliff. You can reach this area by using the Spiritspring at Lenne's Rise.

name: Godskin Noble Set
description: Armor Set comprised of the Godskin Noble Hood, Godskin Noble Robe, Godskin Noble Bracelets and the Godskin Noble Trousers. Dropped by Godskin Noble Boss.

name: Lazuli Glintstone Crown
description: Looted from a Crystal Crab. Click Here for a detailed guide on how to get it.

name: Black Wolf Mask
description: This mask can be found on the wall behind Seluvis's Rise.

name: Ruler's Mask
description: Found on a corpse laying face-down on a carriage northeast of the Abandoned Coffin Site of Grace. You'll find it alongside the Ruler's Robe.

name: Ruler's Robe
description: Found on a corpse laying face-down on a carriage northeast of the Abandoned Coffin Site of Grace. You'll find it alongside the Ruler's Mask.

name: Frenzy-Flaming Tower
description: A giant flame causing madness in the surrounding area.

name: Perfume Botttle - Street of Sages Ruins
description: Key Item. Found on a corpse in the corner of the ruins along with the Traveler's Set.

name: Dragonlord Placidusax
description: Can be found by taking the elevator down from "Beside the Great Bridge" Grace site, and exiting before the fight against Maliketh, the Black Blade, Walk down the stairs & outside near the ledge, jump down on the platforms below until you reach a floating platform with Skeletons in their frames. One of the empty graves will give a "Lie Down" prompt, do it and you will be teleported into the boss arena.

name: Dragon Towershield
description: Can be found at Crumbling Farum Azula, to the stationary dragon's right over a ledge, near the Pillar drop down a series of ledges to a lower building, it's in a chest to the left up a ladder, there is a knight that drops down as you get close to the ladder(The "stationary dragon" referring to the one that strikes red lightning at you while you approach it, in the area with a lot of birds past the Dragon Temple Rooftop Grace.)

name: Fingerprint Stone Shield
description: Subterranean shunning grounds. Past the Altar you Fight mini boss vsersion of Mohg then down some platformer style gameplay.This shield was one of the most difficult things to get to in this game. Starting in the Royal capital you will need to find the water well to climb into and find the subterranean shunning grounds. There will be a grace known as "Underground Roadside".From there you will want to transverse the sewer pipe to get to the other side of the area. Once done there will be an elevator to take you down to a grace which is right before the mini boss version of Mohg. After defeating him you can roll/attack the altar behind the chest and it will move down out of the way revealing a path. Following this path will lead you to the hardest part which is jumping from coffin to coffin to make your way down the area. NOTE it is slightly above the bottom floor so do not jump off even if you will survive. If you miss that coffin, you will have to start from the beggining of the coffin descend all over to obtain the shield.

name: Fallen Ruins of the Lakes
description: Site of Grace found in the marshes east of Rose Church.

name: Spiralhorn Shield
description: Found a corpse near Mausoleum Compound. NW of Ruined Labyrinth Site of grace.

name: Ash of War: Thops's Barrier - Church of Irith
description: Ash of War. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab that spawns inside the church after Thops leaves for the academy.

name: Coil Shield
description: Located on a body in Volcano Cave, northeast of the Ninth Mt. Gelmir Campsite in Mt. Gelmir. You will need to drop down a hole and then double back.

name: Erdtree Greatshield
description: Dropped by the Tree Sentinel duo

name: Purified Ruins
description: A set of ruins along the lake shore of the eastern landmass.

name: Armorer's Cookbook [4]
description: Can be found in Redmane Castle. in the northwestern gate house.

name: Viridian Amber Medallion +1
description: can be found in Altus Plauteau, south of the Outer Wall Battleground Site of Grace. You should hear Margit whisper, "I see you, Tarnished..."  to you before appearing on the road. Defeat him again and it will drop.

name: Armorer's Cookbook [5]
description: Can be found in  Redmane Castle.

name: Viridian Amber Medallion +2
description: The closest site of grace is the Haligtree Town Plaza. Run to the roof with the Summoning Snail, jump to the building on the right (it's lower), immediately turn around and jump inside the building. There will be a chest with the medallion and some mushroom people

name: Bloodstained Dagger
description: Dropped by Demihuman chief/Demihuman assassin sleeping before the wooden bridge leading to the minor eldtree in the weeping peninsula.

name: Cathedral of the Forsaken
description: Subterranean site of grace. In the room where you fight Mohg, The Omen

name: Erdtree's Favor +1
description: Found inside a chest, in the room where you fight Mohg, The Omen

name: Sacrificial Twig - Mistwood Ruins
description: Can be found on a ledge of the cemetery that's overlooking the ruins.

name: Errant Sorcerer Set (No Helm)
description: The Errant Sorcerer Robe, Errant Sorcerer Manchettes, and Errant Sorcerer Boots can be looted together from a corpse in a house on the northeast corner of the village.Hierodas Glintstone Crown can be looted from a corpse behind a house on the southern end of the village.

name: Map (Altus Plateau)
description: Can be found near the round, just north of the Altus Highway Junction site of grace

name: Highway Lookout Tower
description: Tower overlooking the east road of Altus Plateau

name: East Windmill Pasture
description: The East Windmill Pasture is found in the Altus Plateau, in the North-most limits of the area

name: Official's Attire
description: From the Forbidden Lands Site of Grace, turn back and head towards the elevator. Face southwest before activating the elevator, and then watch for an opening to jump off into. The Official's Attire is on the corpse in this hidden hallway alongside Blade of Calling.

name: Faithful's Canvas Talisman
description: Located on a corpse guarded by two Prawn Miner inside Sellia Crystal Tunnel

name: Great-Jar's Arsenal
description: Reward for completing the 3 duelist NPC invasions in Dragonbarrow (Caelid North) for The Great-Jar. You will only be able to access this area by coming up from Siofra Deep River Well in the underground.

name: Prosthesis-Wearer Heirloom
description: Finish the sidequest given by Gowry in Caelid, then return to Millicent to receive the talisman.

name: Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs
description: Hidden by the snowstorm, Catacombs with valuable Grave Glovewort materials 8, 9 and Great Grave Glovewort.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [10]
description: Can be found on a dead body in Stormveil Castle. From Rampart Tower (Site of Grace), head out the north door. Jump to the roof immediately visible to the east.Follow the left ledge, then jump down to the level with the 2 enemies (optional combat).Cross the bridge, the recipe is on the corpse directly ahead guarded by 2 weak enemies.

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook (19)
description: Can be found on the ground inside of the smaller ruined building at Woodfolk Ruins in Altus Plateau.

name: Albinauric Rise
description: Puzzle tower found east of the Consecrated Snowfield. Unlocking the seal requires you to summon your Fanged Imp Ashes and defeating one of the imps that spawn around the tower.

name: Guest Hall
description: Site of Grace.

name: Sage's Cave
description: Site of grace, located inside  Sage's Cave

name: Altus Plateau (Site of Grace)
description: Site of grace

name: Altus Highway Junction
description: Site of Grace

name: Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [21]
description: Can be found Inside the Volcano Manor, going upstairs when you enter the hallway from the lobby, enter the first door to the right, the same one with the corpse with a Perfume Bottle. Follow the path through a room full of Snails and you'll end up with a room with two ways forward - one down a flight of steps, another through an open doorway to your left. Head left first, being wary of Snails that may ambush you and continue until you reach a dead end. The corpse at the end of this passageway has the Nomadic Warrior's Cookbook [21] on it, and to the left of it, reveal another hidden door that opens up into a room with the Depraved Perfumer Carmaan Ashes.

name: Deathroot - Gelmir's Hero Grave
description: Found inside a chest, located in the same room where you fight the Red Wolf of the Champion

name: Amber Starlight
description: Key item requested by Seluvis to progress his quest further.

name: Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing (2)
description: Can be acquierd from the boss duo of  Crystalian (Spear) & Crystalian (Ringblade) in the Altus Tunnel

name: Stonesword Key - Sage's Cave
description: Can be found behind an illusory wall, in the same room where you fight an Axe Skeleton, within Sage's Cave

name: Stonesword Key - Altus Plateau (A)
description: Found on a corpse located on a camp northeast from the Grand Lift of Dectus.

name: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [4]
description: Can be found at Academy Gate Town, go north-west, there is a building with alot of enemies on it, this building has a tower portion that you can jump inside ad there is a cheast.

name: Golden Seed - Lux Ruins
description: Found just north of Lux Ruins

name: Golden Seed - Minor Erdtree Altus Plateau
description: One can be found near the Minor Erdtree (northwest of it) in Altus Plateau.

name: Golden Seed - Windmill Village
description: One can be found at a phantom tree South East of Windmill Village site of grace (following the road).

name: Glintstone Craftsman's Cookbook [8]
description: Can be found at Concecrated Grounds Southwest of Albinauric's Rise. There will be 3 Arcane Sphere of Faces encircling a corpse with the Cookbook.

name: Perfumer's Cookbook [3]
description: Auriza Side Tomb, open the transporter chest in the room with many benches. The room you'll be teleported to will have a corpse with Perfumer's Cookbook [3] on it.

name: Purifying Crystal Tear
description: It can be found at the Second Church of Marika after defeating the invader Eleonora, Violet Bloody Finger

name: Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [2]
description: Can be purchased from a Mechant that you can found between Writheblood Ruins and The Minor Erdtree (Altus Plateau).

name: Speckled Hardtear
description: Flask Upgrade. Dropped by Wormface

name: Crimsonspill Crystal Tear
description: Flask Upgrade. Dropped by Wormface

name: Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [4]
description: Can be acquired at the top roof of Crumbling Farum Azula. You will find the Cookbook after defeating the dragon, passing the building behind it.

name: Perfumer Tricia Ashes
description: Dropped from Perfumer Tricia at the Unsightly Catacombs

name: Bloodhound Knight Floh
description: Dropped by the Red Wolf of the Champion

name: Ancient Dragon Knight Kristoff Ashes
description: Can be found in Sainted Hero's Grave west of Leyndell, the Royal Capital.

name: Giant Rat Ashes
description: Can be found in a wooden shack located left of the windwill.

name: Protection of the Erdtree
description: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab. It can be found on top of the stone ruin.

name: Ash of War: Barbaric Roar
description: On a Teardrop Scarab in Ravine-Veiled Village, found by going as far northeast as possible in Lake of Liurnia (near but not accessible from Grand Lift of Dectus)

name: Ash of War: Sacred Order
description: Dropped by a  Teardrop Scarab in Altus Plateau, just north of the Site Of Grace.

name: Ash of War: Blood Blade
description: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in Altus Plateau, northeast of Erdtree-Gazing Hill, flying above a pond with trees.

name: Ash of War: Shared Order
description: Dropped by the Night's Cavalry

name: Millicent (Third Location)
description: Found at the hill.

name: Night's Cavalry (Altus Plateau)
description: Found patrolling the road. Only appears at night.

name: Iji's Mirrorhelm
description: Need to confront Blaidd during Ranni's questline. War Counselor Iji will have new dialogue available. After that, his corpse can be found near his usual spot at the Road to the Manor Site of Grace. Upon his anvil, the player will find Iji's Mirrorhelm as well as Iji's Bell Bearing.

name: Demi-Human Queen Gilika
description: Field boss found inside the  Lux Ruins

name: Bloody Finger Hunter Yura (Fourth Location)
description: Found at the Second Church of Marika.

name: Fallingstar Beast
description: Optional boss. Found directly south of the large bridge. The map will display a large crater there, which is where it will spawn.

name: Ancient Dragon Lansseax (Altus Plateau)
description: Southwest of Rampartside path. It will only appear if you defeat it first at its first location. Drops Lansseax's Glaive

name: Brother Corhyn (First Location)
description: Found at the side of the road after he leaves Roundtable Hold.

name: Crystalians (Altus Plateau)
description: Duo Field Bosses. Drop  Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing (2)

name: Boc the Seamster (Fifth Location)
description: Found at the Altus Highway Junction site of grace

name: Wormface
description: Boss located at the base of the Minor Erdtree. Drops Speckled Hardtear and Crimsonspill Crystal Tear

name: Omenkiller Set (No Helm)
description: The Omenkiller Robe, Long Gloves and Boots drops from Omenkiller after defeating in Perfumer's Ruins.

name: Finger Reader (Altus Plateau)
description: Found at the Forest-Spanning Greatbridge.

name: Godskin Apostle
description: Can be found at Windmill Heights. Drops Godskin Peeler and Scouring Black Flame

name: Nomadic Merchant West Altus Plateau
description: Found at the Forest-Spanning Greatbridge.

name: Sanguine Noble
description: Boss found inside Writheblood Ruins

name: Goldmask
description: Found around the Forest-Spanning Greatbridge.

name: Millicent (Fourth Location)
description: Moves here after Godskin Apostle is defeated.

name: Eleonora, Violet Bloody Finger
description: After talking to Bloody Finger Hunter Yura at the Second Church of Marika

name: Sacred Tear (Second Church of Marika)
description: Found inside the Second Church of Marika

name: Raptor's Black Feathers
description: Inside Sage's Cave, in a chest behind an illusory wall. Alongside Skeletal Mask.

name: Larval Tear - Mt. Gelmir
description: Dropped by Colossal Wormface disguised as charred corpse when defeated. Due East from the Road of Inequities grace, upon entering the ruined camp, and next to the first corpse fire will be the charred remains enemy

name: Skeletal Mask
description: Inside Sage's Cave, in a chest behind an illusory wall. Alongside Raptor's Black Feathers.

name: Perfumer's Talisman
description: In a chest underground below stairs in the room with the yellow Giant Poison Flower.

name: Larval Tear (Ruins)
description: Dropped from a Miniboss disguises as a noble inside the ruins.

name: Scouring Black Flame
description: Incantation, dropped by Godskin Apostle

name: Lightning Scorpion Charm
description: Found in Wyndham Catacombs in a room sealed by an Imp Statue, requires a Stonesword Key.

name: Godskin Peeler
description: Dropped from Godskin Apostle

name: Greatbow
description: Found in a chest at the top of the Highway Lookout Tower.

name: Bloody Helice
description: Can be found inside a chest, in the same room of the boss in Writheblood Ruins

name: Eleonora's Poleblade
description: Dropped by Eleonora, Violet Bloody Finger

name: Ritual Sword Talisman
description: Located in Lux Ruins, in a chest after defeating Demi-Human Queen Gilika

name: Nagakiba
description: Can be obtained by completing Bloody Finger Hunter Yura's questline at the Second Church of Marika

name: Troll's Golden Sword
description: In a Chest on a Black Carriage, which can be found east of Erdtree-Gazing Hill site of grace.

name: Raptor Talons
description: Located at Sage's Cavez, in one of the chests, behind several secret walls

name: Pulley Crossbow
description: Can be found on a body at the Craftsman's Shack

name: Crimson Seed Talisman
description: In locked imp's room in Sainted Hero's Grave.

name: Prelate's Inferno Crozier
description: Drops from the Prelate wielding it inside  Fort Laiedd

name: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman +1
description: Can be found in a locked imp's room in Sainted Hero's Grave.

name: Black Hood
description: In the Sage's Cave, in a treasure chest behind an illusory wall.

name: Mantis Blade
description: Can be found inside the Gelmir Hero's Grave

name: Pulley Bow
description: ulley Bow can be found on a sitting corpse (at the top of a siege tower near Mt. Gelmir campsite. The tower is located to the north of Gelmir Hero's Grave site of Grace)

name: Great Stars
description: On a guarded wagon in Altus Plateau, traveling on the road SouthWest of the Road of Iniquity Side Path site of grace.

name: Arsenal Charm +1
description: In Altus Tunnel, drop down onto a platform below and then climb up the tree root to a higher platform where the charm will be waiting on a body.

name: Serpent-God's Curved Sword
description: Can be found at Ruin-Strewn Precipice, after the first singing bat go up two ladders then another one on the left and walk across to where the Land Octopus are

name: Altus Tunnel
description: Can be found directly south from the Minor Erdtree in Altus Plateau.

name: Gelmir Knight Set
description: You can loot the entire Gelmir Knight Set in the Gelmir Hero's Grave dungeon from a Gelmir Knight corpse.

name: Bloodhound Knight Set
description: Dropped by the Bloodhound Knight guarding the Gelmir Knight Set pickup. The set must then be picked up from the corpse of the Knight.

name: Noble's Set
description: The entire set can be found within East Windmill Pasture, Altus Plateau, in the fire in the middle of a circle of dancing women.

name: Battlemage Set
description: The entire set drops from a particular Battlemage enemy, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge.

name: Radiant Gold Mask
description: Part of the Goldmask's Set. Found on a corpse on the collapsed bridge North-East of Writheblood Ruins. Drop down two times heading South to find the body.

name: Liftside Chamber
description: Site of Grace within Stormveil Castle, towards the west.

name: Altar South
description: Site of Grace next to Chelona's Rise.

name: Dominula, Windmill Village
description: Inhabitated by the Godskin Apostle.

name: Raya Lucaria Grand Library
description: Site of Grace at the Main Library of the Raya Lucaria Academy

name: Liurnia Tower Bridge
description: Site of Grace at the bridge leading to the Divine Tower of Liurnia.

name: Windmill Village Pasture
description: Found close to Dominula.

name: Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel
description: Site of Grace found inside the Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel, after taking the first lift down.

name: Cracked Pot - x3 - Jarburg
description: Crafting Pot. Three can be found in the village of Jarburg. The first is on a corpse in front of the blocked door of a hut north of where you drop down into the village. The second is in a hut northeast of the first. The last Cracked Pot is found on a large headstone in the south along the main road in the village.

name: Divine Tower of East Altus: Gate
Ritual Pot - 2x Jarburg
description: Crafting Pot. Two can be found in the village of Jarburg. The first is found on the roof of a hut in the north, use the cliffs to get on top of the hut and loot the corpse. The second can be found on top of a large decorative jar in the south. Use the boulders nearby or your horse to get on top of the jar.

name: Godskin Noble (Divine Tower of Liurnia)
description: Field boss guarding the bridge to the Divine Tower of Liurnia. Only accessible after progressing Ranni's questline and acquiring the Carian Inverted Statue, allowing access to a secret area in Carian Study Hall leading to the bridge.

name: Enemy Caravan (Aluts Plateau)
description: Enemy Caravan traveling the Road of Iniquity. Loot Great Stars from its chest.

name: Large Club
description: On the lowest cliff south of the Forlorn Hound Evergaol, near a spiritspring

name: Scavenger's Curved Sword
description: Found in Mt. Gelmir, on a corpse near a Grafted Scion across a stone pillar-bridge northwest of the First Mt. Gelmir Campsite site of grace. The corpse closest to the ladder has the blade.

name: Scythe
description: Cliffbottom Catacombs: found at one end of the catacombs, in the room found when following the stairs heading upwards

name: Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel
description: One of the vast networks of tunnels used prominently for the academy's crystal mining operation.

name: Crucible Knot Talisman
description: Dropped by Omenkiller, located in the Village of the Albinaurics

name: Red-Feathered Branchsword
description: Dropped by the Deathbird at  Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Star Fist
description: In the left side of a castle situated atop the mountain near the West Capital Rampart grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital .

name: Cerulean Seed Talisman
description: Found at Carian Study Hall. look for it at the rafters, next to a body.

name: Stalwart Horn Charm
description: Can be found in Eastern Liurnia. Fast travel to Mausoleum Compound, head up the light incline to the left towards the cliff to the West. When you are at the cliff, look South for a hole in the wall. The talisman can be found on a corpse on a cliff through the hole.

name: Sacrificial Twig (Altus Plateau)
description: Can be found inside a chest at an enemy camp.

name: Ritual Shield Talisman
description: From the West Capital Rampart site of grace in Leyndell, follow the marble stairway heading South-Southwest, past a Valiant Gargoyle near a Golden Seed and up the stair toward a giant Colloseum, the talisman is at the top of the hill, in front of the door of the Colloseum.

name: Silver Scarab
description: Found in a chest in Hidden Path to the Haligtree. The chest is found past an illusory wall, behind a Grave Glovewort (9) inside the first alcove that you can access by jumping down onto the invisible walkways under the staircase in the main hall.

name: Shard of Alexander
description: Drops from Iron Fist Alexander after completing his questline.

name: Millicent's Prosthesis
description: When you are given the choice between assisting Millicent and challenging her, choose to challenge her. When you killher, you will automatically receive this talisman.

name: Bloody Finger Hunter Yura (Second Location)
description: NPC Questline: Found on the ground level under a broken structure. Talk to Bloody Finger Hunter Yura by resting at a grace after defeating NPC invader Bloody Finger Nerijus.

name: Revenger's Shack
description: An isolated shack north of the Minor Erdtree.

name: Intelligence-knot Crystal Tear
description: From Road to the Manor Site of Grace, head southeast down the slope and turn back towards north. Loot from a small, half-bowl structure guarded by a few Lesser Spider Hand and one Spider Hand.

name: Banished Knight's Halberd +8
description: An upgraded Banished Knight's Halberd dropped by Edgar the Revenger.

name: Shabriri Grape - Revenger's Shack
description: Key Item. Dropped by Edgar the Revenger upon defeat.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy - Revenger's Shack
description: Multiplayer Item. Dropped by Edgar the Revenger upon defeat.

name: Ash of War: Storm Assault
description: Starting from the Rampart Tower grace, exit onto the ramparts where the war hawks and explosive barrels are. At the tower on the west side where the second war hawk holding an explosive barrel is, jump up onto the battlements on the north side. There is a corpse visible with an item (Marred Wooden Shield). Jumping down to the walls beneath will allow the player to get to the shield. Jumping down further will land the player on a ledge that will collapse, causing them to fall far below into some bushes. A Silver Teardrop Scarab holds the Ash of War

name: Fire Arrow - 1x Stormhill Warmaster Shack
description: Consumable Item. One arrow can be looted from a corpse in the road, guarded by two Mercenaries.

name: Ash of War: Flaming Strike
description: dropped by a  Teardrop Scarab in a small graveyard along the south cliffside behind the castle. From the front gate, hug right along the cliff towards the ballista, going up and past the vampire bats. There will be a small gap in the cliff that must be jumped across to get to the graveyard.

name: Stonebarb Cracked Tear
description: Obtained by defeating the Putrid Avatar near the second Minor Erdtree (Caelid).

name: Ash of War: Rain of Arrows
description: Appears at edge of a cliff after you've looted the "Redmane" Painting in  Sellia, Town of Sorcery. You'll find it down the cliff on a plateau south east of the Eastern Minor Erdtree in Caelid. The Erdtree is located in the Caelid subregion called Dragonbarrow. Once you've made your way down, walk to the edge and you'll briefly see the spirit of a painter, he'll vanish and the Ash of War will appear in his place

name: Opaline Hardtear
description: Dropped by Putrid Avatar in Northeastern Caelid.

name: Ash of War: Bloodhound's Step
description: Dropped by a Night's Cavalry at the bridge in front of the  Lenne's Rise tower,

name: Ash of War: Beast's Roar
description: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the fourth Deathroot

name: Ash of War: Spectral Lance
description: When you reach the end of the courtyard where it is heavily guarded by multiple Zombie Dog and Glintstone Zombies. Turn left and you'll see a path that is lit with a torch, down the slope, you'll find a  Teardrop Scarab, kill it to obtain this item

name: Windy Crystal Tear
description: The item can be found in Caelid in a pit southeast of the Nomadic Merchant Caelid South. One of the birds watches over it, facing south.

name: Alecto, Black Knife Ringleader
description: Field boss imprisoned within the Ringleader's Evergaol. Drops the  Spirit Ashes upon defeat.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (5) - Altus Tunnel
description: Found in the Altus Tunnel.

name: Ash of War: Raptor of the Mists
description: Found after aiding Bloody Finger Hunter Yura in defeating his target in Raya Lucaria

name: Ash of War: Holy Ground
description: Found together with Tree Sentinel Armor set inside Auriza Hero's Grave.

name: Ash of War: Troll's Roar
description: Can be found on the top of the big rock just south east the Church of Repose (in Mountaintops of the Giants)

name: Ash of War: Seppuku
description: On the frozen lake next to the "Freezing Lake" site of grace, dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab. The Scarab can be heard on the edge of the lake. Stand on his trail and wait for it to come back around and greet it with attacks.

name: Vyke's Dragonbolt
description: Received after defeating Vyke, Knight of the roundtable at Lord Contender's Evergaol.

name: Barrier of Gold
description: Can be found after heading down the stairs and taking the elevator, right after the fight with Godfrey, First Elden Lord (Hoarah Loux).

name: Battlemage Hugues Ashes
description: Dropped by Battlemage Hugues (boss) located in the Sellia Evergaol. The best way to reach the evergaol is to travel south east along the cliff from the Dragonbarrow West site of grace. It will be on top of a plateau overlooking Aeonia Swamp.

name: Howl of Shabriri
description: Incantation. Found in a chest on the second level of the Frenzy-Flaming Tower.

name: Redmane Knight Ogha Ashes
description: Dropped by the Putrid Tree Spirit in the War-Dead Catacombs located in eastern Caelid. To find the entrance of the catacombs, travel to the site of grace that appears after defeating Starcourge Radahn and proceed to head north until you have reached the upper most corner of the area, you'll be able to see the small door along the cliffside.

name: Warhawk Ashes
description: Rewarded upon finding the location Prophecy Painting depicts. The location is north of the Church of Pilgrimage.

name: Smithing Stone (2)
description: On a high rock near the cliff.

name: Lone Wolf Ashes
description: Given to players by Renna at the Church of Elleh in Limgrave. Return to the Church after getting the ability to summon your Spectral Steed from Melina. You will find Renna sitting by the ruins of the church.

name: Wandering Nobles Ashes
description: Located on a corpse that is resting against a stone coffin in the  Stormfoot Catacombs in Limgrave. Proceed through the catacombs as normal until reaching a ladder that is going up, once you've reached the top continue forward past some Jade Goblins until reaching a dead end room that is being guarded by two Jade Goblins, the corpse resting against the stone coffin will hold the ashes

name: Godrick Soldier Ashes
description: Found at the Cemetery at the west of Stormhill that is filled with Spirit Jellyfish, next to a grave. Check both sides of each grave to find it.

name: Latenna the Albinauric
description: In order for Latenna to be friendly and become a spirit, one has to have the  Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right), give to the player by Albus  at the  Village of the Albinaurics.

name: Land Squirt Ashes
description: Found at a grave with several groups of land squirts nearby on the east shore of Liurnia Lake. To reach it, start at the Gate Town Bridge site of grace, and simply travel north along the shore.

name: Flame, Grant me Strength
description: Found behind a Fort Gael, on a body between two Maneuverable Flamethrowers

name: Marionette Soldier Ashes
description: When you reach the graveyard section, as you cross the other side of the bridge, make a hard left and drop down to find a path that curves to where the Marionette Soldiers are, kill the two soldiers and then loot the corpse that is hanging by the ledge to find this item.

name: Avionette Soldier Ashes
description: Located on a corpse after taking the rotating lift down in Raya Lucaria Academy

name: Soldjars of Fortune Ashes
description: Dropped by the Grave Warden Duelist (boss) in the Auriza Side Tomb located in the eastern part of the Capital Outskirts

name: Fire Monk Ashes
description: Take the first elevator in the dungeon down and then reactive it to send it back up but do not ride it. There will be a secret elevator you can now take to go down farther. Fight past the Imps, Erdtree Burial Watchdogs, and frost pillar traps, and the Fire Monk Ashes will be on a corpse at the end of this path.

name: Whirl, O Flame!
description: Dropped from a Teardrop Scarab on the road between Rotview Balcony and Caelem Ruins next to the wagon.

name: Cleanrot Knight Finlay Ashes
description: Located in a chest protected by a knight in Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree. From the Prayer Room site of grace, head straight down a few sets of stairs until you reach a small landing where two crossbow guards are stationed above. Jump over the railing on the landing onto the angled brace, then jump onto the platform with the gazebo. The ashes are in a chest in a room next to the gazebo.

name: Bestial Constitution
description: Found by killing a golden scarab along the cliffside North East of the Minor Erdtree in Caelid

name: Golden Seed (B) - Stormveil Castle
description: Obtained by defeating a  Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirit in the underground area of Stormveil Castle. This area can be accessed via a hidden path above the door of the room with some Living Jar enemies, or by making a damaging drop outside the Liftside Chamber Site of Grace.

name: Golden Seed - Weeping Peninsula
description: Golden Seed that can be found between two sites of grace, Castle Morne Lift and Castle Morne Rampart. Follow the main road and it will be hard to miss.

name: Golden Seed - War-Dead Catacombs
description: Obtained by defeating the Putrid Tree Spirit inside the  War-Dead Catacombs

name: Golden Seed - Liurnia of the Lakes
description: Can be found north of the Main Academy Gate site of grace, on the bridge.

name: Frenzied Flame Proscription
description: Reached upon defeating Mohg, the Omen, at Subterranean Shunning-Grounds.

name: Golden Seed - Forbidden Lands
description: From the Forbidden Lands Site of grace, move towards the Grand Lift of Rold. You'll eventually come across the Golden Seed.

name: Briars of Sin
description: Liurnia of the Lakes: Dropped by a mob directly north-west from the Artists Shack. Jump across the rocks and they'll be by a group of fire slugs.

name: Magic Downpour
description: Magic Downpour is a Sorcery dropped by Preceptor Miriam in the Carian Study Hall.

name: Sacred Tear (Church of Irith)
description: Found inside the Church of Irith

name: Ambush Shard
description: Weeping Peninsula: Found on a corpse in the underground jail of the Witchbane Ruins.

name: Sacred Tear (Church of Inhibition)
description: Found within the Church of Inhibition

name: Malenia, Blade of Miquella
description: Demigod. Found past a fog door southwest of the Haligtree Roots Site of Grace.

name: Malenia's Great Rune
description: Great Rune. Dropped by Malenia, Blade of Miquella upon defeat.

name: Remembrance of the Rot Goddess
description: Key Item. Dropped by Malenia, Blade of Miquella upon defeat.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (1)
description: Found at the edge of the sea.

name: Smithing Stone (1)
description: In a corpse at the water on the corner.

name: Smithing Stone (1)
description: Found on a dead body.

name: Golden Seed (Consecrated Snowfield)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found by a pillar within the snowstorm, near a cookbook north from Consecrated Snowfield site of grace.

name: Smithing Stone (1)
description: On a dead body.

name: Smithing Stone [2] C - Stormveil Castle
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse on the rooftops accessible from the top of the very top of the Rampart Tower.

name: Smithing Stone [2] F - Stormveil Castle
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse sitting on an upper ledge in the corridor leading up to the Secluded Chamber site of grace.

name: Stonesword Key - Frenzied Flame Village
description: Key Item. Found atop the Frenzied Flame Village outer walls.

name: Great Grave Glovewort (Crumbling Farum Azula)
description: Upgrade Material. From the dragon temple grace turn around and drop to a floating staircase. take the second door and follow a series of floating platforms to a ladder. The Great Grave Glovewort is located in a hidden tomb at the top of the ladder

name: Envoy Crown
description: Helmet. Looted from the very edge of the branches.

name: Night's Cavalry (Dragonbarrow East)
description: Boss that spawns only at night. Drops Ash of War: Bloodhound's Step.

name: Smithing Stone (5) - 1x Mt. Gelmir
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse on the ground.

name: Finger Reader (Leyndell Capital City)
description: Finger Reader NPC.

name: Boc the Seamster (Fourth Location)
description: NPC. He can be found kneeling by the East Raya Lucaria Gate Site of Grace (southwest most point of the Bellum Road). You have to rest at this Site of Grace for him to appear.

name: Patches (Second Location)
description: NPC. Seen hiding behind some bushes. Following the glowing stones to the ledge will trigger a cutscene with an ambush.

name: Magma Wyrm (Mt Gelmir Lava Pool)
description: Boss in the lava pool south of Fort Laiedd. Drops a Dragon Heart and enables the purchase of Magma Breath from the Cathedral of Dragon Communion.

name: Prattling Pate (You're Beautiful)
description: Tool Item. Found by a door just near the Hierodas Glintstone Crown in Hermit Village.

name: Collapsing Stars
description: Looted from a chest located at the War-Dead Catacombs. In the room with the enemies fighting each other, drop down to the lower level filled with scarlet rot and look for the chest. This catacomb is located in the northmost edge of Starscourge Radahn arena after beating him, just south of Lenne's Rise.

name: Ancient Death Rancor
description: Dropped by the Death Rite Bird in Liurnia of the Lake, to the east of Raya Lucaria Academy at night, south of the Gate Town North site of grace.

name: Golden Rune (5) - Perfumer's Grotto
description: Found within Perfumer's Grotto in the area just outside the fog gates at the end of the tunnel.

name: D, Hunter of the Dead (Second Location)
description: Players should go to  Summonwater Village and defeat the Tibia Mariner boss there, then return to D at the Rountable Hold to continue his quest. He will give you directions to go to the Bestial Sanctum in  Caelid. You can teleport there without having to explore by going to the "Sending Gate" in East Limgrave

name: Grave Glovewort [4]
description: You can found x3 Grave Glovewort [4] in the Caelid Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort [3]
description: You can found x2 Grave Glovewort [3] in the Caelid Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort [5]
description: You can found x2 Grave Glovewort [5] in the Caelid Catacombs.

name: Ghost Glovewort [3]
description: You can found a Ghost Glovewort [3] in the Caelid Catacombs.

name: Ghost Glovewort [4]
description: You can found a Ghost Glovewort [4] in the Caelid Catacombs.

name: The Great-Jar
description: Interact with the Great-Jar to fight three invading Npcs. If you beat all three of them, you will receive the  Great-Jar's Arsenal

name: Finger Reader (Caelid)
description: She can be found near the telescope.

name: Millicent (Second Location)
description: She will appear here, after you give her the  Unalloyed Gold Needle

name: Iron Fist Alexander (Third Location)
description: He can be found here waiting for the festival to start.

name: Albus
description: NPC who is hiding from the calamity that befell the Village of the Albinaurics

name: Millicent (NPC Invader)
description: Found in the South-East of the Swamp of Aeonia near the geysers

name: Nepheli Loux (Second Location)
description: NPC. She can be found at the Village of the Albinaurics after meeting her at the Roundtable Hold.

name: Rya (First Location)
description: Npc. She can be found next to the telescope. She is runnng an errand for the Volcano Manor but was robbed. She asks you to retrieve Rya's Necklace

name: Diallos
description: NPC. He leaves the  Roundtable Hold and then be found over the corpse of Lanya.

name: Bloody Finger Hunter Yura (Third Location)
description: He can be found requesting aid from the player in the form of a Red Summon Sign on the bridge north of the Main Gate Grace. Walk past the magic seal to find. Enter his world and defeat Bloody Finger Ravenmount Assassin. Afterward, talk to Yura who will be standing against the railing near to where his summon sign was

name: Death Rite Bird (Raya Lucaria Academy East)
description: Death Rite Bird Miniboss that spawns only at night, south from the Gate Town North site of grace. Drops Ancient Death Rancor.

name: Blackguard  (Second Location)
description: Merchant. He appears here if you bought Rya's Necklace and Boiled Prawn

name: Goldmask (Second Location)
description: NPC found alongside Brother Corhyn

name: Brother Corhyn (Third Location)
description: NPC, found contemplating a riddle alongside Goldmask

name: Brother Corhyn (Fourth Location)
description: NPC, found at the south of  Stargazer's Ruins

name: Blaidd (Ranni's Quest - Second Location)
description: NPC, appears awaiting for the festival after you meet him at Siofra River

name: Erdtree Greatbow
description: Dropped from the Chariot inside Fringefolk Hero's Grave

name: Flail
description: It can be found in a charriot, defended by a group of soldiers. near the Gatefront Ruins

name: Lance
description: On top of the big square structure to the west of  Deathtouched Catacombs. Jump off the nearby cliff to reach the top.

name: Arbalest
description: Using a Stonesword Key to access, additionally obtaining the Godskin prayerbook and Godslayer Seal:From the Rampart Tower bonfire, take the shortcut lift down to where the Grafted miniboss is fought inside the storeroom (or reach this point manually). Exit into the courtyard with the flamethrowers and barricades. Take an immediate left and hug the wall until you enter a cellar containing rats. You will hit a fog wall that requires one Stonesword Key to open. Continue past this fog wall until you reach an outdoors area again. Pull an immediate right and hug the wall until you reach a ladder. Continue past this point and almost all the way across the bridge, then jump to the rocky outcropping to your right (it's a tight jump). Continue and jump back into a walled-in area with a ballista. The Arbalest is on a corpse in that area.

name: Crystal Spear
description: Can be found inside  Sellia Hideaway. It can be found in a chest behind a hidden wall, to the left of the boss room.

name: Flamberge
description: Can be found at the top of the tower, on a corpse. Beware of the Pumpkin Head protecting it.

name: Ruins Greatsword
description: Dropped by the can be acquired by defeating Misbegotten Warrior and Crucible Knight at Redmane Castle

name: Watchdog's Staff
description: Located in Road's End Catacombs, behind an illusory wall near the stairs at the beginning of the dungeon.

name: Crystal Staff
description: Crystal Staff can be found in Academy Crystal Cave. It's in a room guarded by a sorcerer behind a fog wall, located right before the boss gate. The path to the chest containing the staff is through an illusory rock wall on the left side of the tunnel, just before the stone archway.

name: Full Moon Crossbow
description: From the Debate Parlor Site of Grace, head out into the courtyard and to the left to reach the rooftops. Continue along the rooftops until the tower past the Glintstone Sorcerer and three Avionette Soldiers. Across from the tower on another rooftop, an item will be visible. Drop down to the rooftop below and jump on top of the spike near the right edge. From the spike, turn left and jump onto the gargoyle (architectural, not an enemy) protruding from a corner of the building. Another jump will bring you to the rooftop with the item, a Smithing Stone [4]. Alternatively, you can reach this item by jumping from the tower onto a roof opposite the Full Moon Crossbow's chest in the tower.From that roof, a long jump will be required to reach the rooftops with the patrolling Marionette Soldier with spears. Sprinting before the jump is required, as a normal jump will not cover the distance. Note that there is a delay before sprinting starts (likely to determine whether the player is trying to roll or sprint).Continue along the rooftops to the left, past the four Marionette Soldiers and jump onto a platform connected to a tower. Inside, two Marionette Soldiers will ambush you from either side. Climb up the ladder to find a chest with the Full Moon Crossbow.

name: Academy Glintstone Staff
description: Can be found on Sorcerer Thops' body.

name: Deathbird (Leyndell Capital Outskirts)
description: East of the Hermit Merchant's Shack. It drops the Twinbird Kite Shield.

name: Smithing Stone (7) -  x3 First Church of Marika
description: Smithing Stone (7) can be obtained atop overlooking cliff just by the First Church of Marika, Mountaintops of the Giants.

name: Death Rite Bird (West Mountaintops of the Giants)
description: Found at the head of the frozen river, just southeast of the Apostate Derelict at night

name: Bloody Finger Ravenmount Assassin
description: Technically you are the invader of an NPC called "Bloody Finger Ravenmount Assassin".

name: Preceptor Miriam
description: Found at the hall middle way up the stairs.

name: Misbegotten Warrior
description: Duo boss of Unsightly Catacombs - paired with Perfumer Tricia. Defeating them grants the Perfumer Tricia Ashes spirit ashes.

name: Putrid Tree Spirit
description: Boss of the War-Dead Catacombs in eastern Caelid. Drops Redmane Knight Ogha Spirit Ashes and a Golden Seed

name: Night's Cavalry (Forbidden Lands)
description: Roams the Forbidden Lands, by the path to the Lift.

name: Enemy Caravan (West Liurnia of the Lakes)
description: An enemy caravan travels this road. Loot the Carian Night's Sword from the chest they protect.

name: Ulcerated Tree Spirit (Giants' Mountaintop Catacombs)
description: Found within the Giant's Mountaintop Catacombs located in the Mountaintops of the Giants region. Droprs Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing [2],

name: Grave Warden Duelist (Auriza Side Tomb)
description: Field Enemy located inside Auriza Side Tomb.

name: Medicine Peddler's Bell Bearing
description: Key Item. Dropped by nighttime invader: Bell Bearing Hunter in Leyndell's Hermit Merchant's Shack

name: Twinbird Kite Shield
description: Medium Shield dropped by nighttime spawn Deathbird near Leyndell's Hermit Merchant's Shack.

name: Mohg, the Omen
description: Located at the end of the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds.

name: Rya (Second Location A)
description: Rya spawns here if the player completed the interaction with her in Liurnia of the Lakes but has not obtained both portions of the Dectus Medallion. She will teleport you to the Volcano Manor if you talk to her.

name: Rya (Second Location B)
description: Rya spawns at the top of the Grand Lift of Dectus if it is taken from the bottom, if the player completed the interaction with her in Liurnia of the Lakes. She will teleport you to the Volcano Manor if you talk to her.

name: Ash of War: Phantom Slash
description: Ash of War. Dropped by the Night's Cavalry boss that spawns at night in the Forbidden Lands stretch.

name: Urumi
description: Whip. Found on a body on the south-east ramparts, reached by jumping from the higher ramparts leading to the elevator and the Manor Upper Level site of grace.

name: Alberich's Set
description: Alberich's Set can be found within Leyndell, Royal Capital near the Fortified Manor, first floor Site of Grace.

name: Stormhawk Axe
description: Looted from a dead body in the courtyard with Iron Maidens near Fortified Manor, First Floor at Leyndell, Royal Capital

name: Golden Order Principia
description: Incantation Tome. From the Erdtree Sanctuary site in Leyndell, Royal Capital, exit the east side of the room. Once outside, climb up the root to the left that circles back into the building's 2nd floor. Once inside, exit the only door and immediately turn left to jump down to a nearby roof. Once on the roof, a broken window can be used to get back inside. After entering the broken window, climb the root crossing the room to reach the Golden Order Principia, which is located in the chair hanging from the ceiling.

name: Celestial Dew - 1x (Leyndell Throne Room)
description: Key Item. Used to find absolution at the Church of Vows in Liurnia of the Lakes.

name: Celestial Dew - 1x Raya Lucaria South Gate
description: Used to seek absolution at the Church of Vows. Found on a corpse leaning against the inner side of the locked gate.

name: Drake Knight Set
description: Full Armor Set. Travel to the Beside The Great Bridge site of grace and go in the opposite direction of the boss room. Go through the building and outside onto the balcony. From here drop down to the Beastman with the big cleaver. Go along the bridge and call up the elevator. Ride the Elevator down and go Outside. The Drake Knight Set is on the left in a big chest.

name: Stray Mimic Tear
description: Optional Boss. Found in the secret underground catacombs underneath the Hidden Path to the Haligtree found by navigating a series of invisible walkways underneath the large staircase in the main hall. See the location page for details on how to reach the boss. Drops the Black Flame Monk Ashes upon defeat.

name: Blackflame Monk Amon Ashes
description: Spirit Ash. Dropped by the Stray Mimic Tear boss found in the secret catacombs underneath the Hidden Path to the Haligtree.

name: Deathroot - Hidden Path to the Haligtree
description: Key Item. Found in a chest at the back of the boss room after defeating the Stray Mimic Tear.

name: Hero's Rune [1] - Hidden Path to the Haligtree
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse on a balcony before the room with the boss door's lever. This is in the secret catacombs underneath the large staircase, accessed by navigating a series of invisible walkways.

name: Spelldrake Talisman +2
description: Upgraded Talisman. Found in the secret catacombs underneath the Hidden Path to the Haligtree by turning right just before the Stray Mimic Tear's boss door, following the corridor and taking the lift up. The talisman is found on a corpse in an alcove at the top.

name: Hero's Rune [5] - Yelough Anix Tunnel
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a body in the center of the room where the Onyx Lord is fought.

name: Walking Mausoleum (Consecrated Snowfield)
description: A Walking Mausoleum found near the Apostate Derelict. This one fires magical artillery into the air, raining havoc down in the surrounding areas. Subdue it to stop the bombardment.

name: Godskin Prayerbook
description: Can be found at Stormveil Castle, Nearest Site of Grace: Rampart Tower. From the Rampart Tower site of grace, go out the door to the outside (where the birds are). Take a running jump onto the roof across from the door.On the left side of the roof, there will be two separate areas you can drop down to. Drop down to the one without stairs on it, and drop down again. You'll land by a set of steps going down.Go down the steps to find some rats and a white fog wall.You'll need a Stonesword Key to pass through the fog wall, and inside will be two chests. One contains the Godskin Prayerbook, the other contains the Godslayer's Seal.Alternatively, from the Liftside Chamber Site of Grace, exit from the door to the courtyard and turn right. Hug the right side wall past all the enemies. You'll find the set of stairs going down on the wall on the other side.

name: Fire's Deadly
description: Can be found at Windmill Heights southeast overlook, south of Windmill Village.

name: Lucerne
description: East of Highland Lookout Tower in East Liurnia of the Lakes, found in the battlefield between phantoms and knights near where the armored giant spawns. Break some carts to reveal the treasure.

name: Royal Greatsword
description: Obtainable at the end of Ranni's questline; Blaidd will spawn in front of Ranni's Rise tower.Best him in combat for a final time to obtain this weapon along with his armor set.

name: Lucidity
description: Dropped by Preceptor Miriam in the secret area of the Carian Study Hall unlocked using the Carian Inverted Statue.

name: Vyke's War Spear
description: Can be dropped from Festering Fingerprint Vyke

name: Rancorcall
description: Dropped from a Teardrop Scarab that can be found at the underground crypt of the castle

name: Explosive Ghostflame
description: Drops from a Death Rite Bird southeast Apostate Derelict (late game area). It's a clearing in the frozen river, and you must go there at night.

name: Great Mace
description: Can be found inside a chest, in the bandit camp.

name: Albinauric Staff
description: Found in Volcano Manor near the Guest Hall grace. Head left from the bonfire, then left again, taking the stairs to the next floor. Head outside and take the ladder to your left onto the roof. Go to the back of the roof and jump off the right side to be taken to a room with an Omenkiller, the Albinauric Staff, and Albinauric Mask.

name: Bloodflame Talons
description: Dropped by Mohg, the Omen in Subterranean Shunning-Grounds, Subterranean Shunning-Grounds, under Leyndell.

name: Ringed Finger
description: Can be found in a room with a chest, inside  Gelmir Hero's Grave

name: Erdtree Heal
description: Can be found in Queen's Bedchamber in Leyndell  Capital Ash.After igniting the Forge of the Giants and defeating Maliketh, Black Blade of Death in Crumbling Farum Azula, return to Leyndell and it will be in ruins of ash. Travel to the Queen's Bedchamber and it's in the same spot as Blessing of the Erdtree was.

name: Shadow Bait
description: Can be found on a corpse at Subterranean Shunning-Grounds, after going through the pipe room to a room with the corpse sitting at the center, next to a not very well hidden Ogre ready to strike.

name: Harp Bow
description: Acquired by solving the Champion's Song Painting, found in  The Shaded Castle

name: Twinned Knight Swords
description: In a burning corpse pile in front of East Windmill Pasture in  Altus Plateau.

name: Giant-Crusher
description: Can be found in a chest directly to the south of Outer Wall Phantom Tree site of grace.

name: Gravel Stone Seal
description: From the West Capital Rampart site of grace in Leyndell, walk north to the next room with the single guard inside. Jump over the balcony railing to get to the area next to the Fortified Manor with the dragon foot. The knight with the spear supported by an archer drops this seal.

name: Bolt of Gransax
description: Can be found in Leyndell, Royal Capital after beating Godfrey, First Elden Lord; walk outside of the west door, take the elevator down, and walk up the spear.

name: Blade of Calling
