description: From the  Forbidden Lands site of grace, turn back and head towards the elevator. Face southwest before activating the elevator, and then watch for an opening to jump off into. The Blade of Calling is on the table in the room at the end of this hall

name: Beast Claw
description: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the fifth  Deathroot.

name: Gurranq's Beast Claw
description: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the fifth  Deathroot.

name: Bestial Vitality
description: Bestial Sanctum: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the fifth  Deathroot.

name: Lannseax's Glaive
description: Dropped by Ancient Dragon Lansseaxt.

name: Giant's Seal
description: Inside Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave, on a corpse located at the bottom of a pit.

name: Theodorix's Magma
description: Dropped by Great Wyrm Theodorix.

name: Vargram the Raging Wolf
description: Found close to the Fortified Manor, First Floor Site of Grace.

name: Inescapable Frenzy
description: After making your way past Subterranean Shunning-Grounds and defeating Mohg, the Omen, attack the altar at the front of the boss room. It should lower revealing a new area. Continue through here until you are forced to parkour downwards using stone coffins as platforms. Near the bottom you will see a corpse that has Inescapable Frenzy on it.

name: Watchdog's Greatsword
description: This dungeon is located East past the Zamor Ruins grace. When the fire enemies first come into sight, peer over the right edge and there will be a place to drop down to enter the dungeon. Once you enter the dungeon, you will eventually come across a lift. Take the lift down, and then trigger the lift but quickly get off. Another lift will rise up from underneath and by taking that new lift down, you will enter the area with Two Watchdogs as well as other various enemies. The second Watchdog can drop it.Dropped by the sword wielding Watchdog in the Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs.

name: Helphen's Steeple
description: Dropped by a Tibia Mariner on a ledge South of Castle Sol and North West of Snow Valley Ruins Overlook

name: Gatekeeper Gostoc
description: Gatekeeper Gostoc can be found by the entrance of Stormveil Castle, in the room next to the main gate into the castle

name: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
description: On the waterfall.

name: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
description: Found in a skull of a dead giant.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (4)
description: Found on a dead body sitting on a chair.

name: Fulgurbloom
description: One can be found on the outskirts of the Castle Sol.

name: Smithing Stone [5] A - Raya Lucaria Academy
description: At the lower level accessed descending from the elevator. On a dead body.

name: Smithing Stone [2] - Raya Lucaria Academy
description: Found rounding the Academy, on the south of it.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (1)
description: Found on a dead body.

name: Smithing Stone (3)
description: In a gazebo close to the southeast coast of the lake inside Liurnia.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (2)
description: Found at the southeast of Liurnia of the Lakes near the edge to the sea.

name: Smithing Stone (4)
description: Found on a dead body sitting on a chair by following the main path.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (4)
description: Found on a dead body sitting on a chair.

name: Smithing Stone (6)
description: Found at the tower on a level that can only be accessed by falling down from the roof.

name: Smithing Stone (3)
description: Found behind the tower on a dead body.

name: Smithing Stone (5)
description: Found on a dead body at the south tower of the Redmane Castle.

name: Smithing Stone (3)
description: Found on a dead body in the barracks.

name: Smithing Stone (5)
description: Found on a dead body at the top of southeast tower of Redmane Castle

name: Smithing Stone (4)
description: Found at the building at the center of the castle.

name: Smithing Stone (4)
description: Found at the side of the main way through the main entrance.

name: Smithing Stone (6)
description: In a room that can only be accessed after defeating the Starscourge Radahn Boss.

name: Smithing Stone (6)
description: At the end of the Castle on a chapel to the left before entering the arena to fight Starscourge Radahn, on a dead body.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (5)
description: Found by the sundial found at the north of the castle.

name: Smithing Stone (8)
description: Found on a dead body over a rock near the cliff.

name: Smithing Stone (7)
description: Found on a dead body over a rock near the cliff.

name: Somber Smithing Stone (4)
description: Found by the sea past the Minor Erdtree.

name: Golden Rune (2)
description: Looted off a corpse by the ledge of the wooden fence.

name: Golden Rune (4)
description: Climb over to the top.

name: Golden Rune (1)
description: Found by the statue.

name: Golden Rune (1)
description: Found at the top of the ruined structure.

name: Golden Rune (1)
description: Found on a dead body.

name: Golden Rune (2)
description: Found on a dead body by the sea.

description: Found by the side of the road on a dead body.

description: Loot the dead bodies.

description: Found by the statue.

description: Found by looting the sarcophagi.

description: x3 Found by looting the sarcophagi.

name: Putrid Avatar (Caelid)
description: It guards the second Minor Erdtree in Caelid, just before the bridge leading to the Bestial Sanctum.

name: Cemetery Shade (Caelid)
description: Amorphous and shadowy being that belongs to the catacombs.

name: Golden Rune (2)
description: Found by the Church of Elleh.

name: Golden Rune (1)
description: Found by a ruin next to the lake.

description: Found by looting the sarcophagi.

description: Dual Bossfight against Crucible Knight and Misbegotten Warrior.

description: Found by looting the sarcophagi.

name: Golden Rune (1)
description: x4 Found by looting the sarcophagi.

name: Witch-Hunter Jerren (First Location)
description: Witch-Hunter Jerren is first spoken to in Castle Redmane just north of the Chamber Outside the Plaza Site of Grace. He is found here after the defeat of Starscourge Radahn. If he is not found in this location, he is likey already at his second location in Witchbane Ruins.

name: Golden Rune [2] - Mistwood Ruins
description: Found in Mistwood Ruins.

name: Golden Rune (1)
description: Found by a statue.

name: Demi-human queen
description: Demi-Human Queen guarding the site. Drops Crystal Burst and Demi-Human Queen's Staff.

description: x5 Found by looting the sarcophagi.

name: Golden Rune (2)
description: Found by looting the sarcophagi.

name: Golden Rune (5)
description: Found by looting the sarcophagi.

name: Golden Rune [4] - Summonwater Village
description: Found by the ruins on a dead body.

name: Golden Rune (2)
description: Found on a dead body around the ruins.

name: Golden Rune [4] - Groveside Cave

name: Grave Glovewort [1] - 3x Impaler's Catacombs
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. The first is found on top of a sarcophagus in the room to the left of the boss door. A second one can be found in the second section of the sewers with Zombies, after dropping down underneath the Impaler Lift and one more can be found in the third section before climbing up the ladder.

A second one can be found in the first section of the sewers with Zombies after dropping down underneath the impaler lift. A final one can be found in the corridor after pulling the boss door's lever.

name: Grave Glovewort [2] - 3x Tombsward Catacombs
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. One found in the room to the right of the boss door, behind the central column. A second one is found in the room to the left of the flamethrower pillar. A third one is found in a room on the upper level after riding the flamethrower pillar and before the room with the boss door's lever.

name: Ghost Glovewort [1] - Tombsward Catacombs

After collecting them, teleporting back to the nearby grace site is faster than riding back on Torrent, since the fort is a no-riding zone.

name: Smithing Stone [2] C - Castle Morne
description: Upgrade Material. Inside a building known as the Rampart Gaol at the back of the castle. This is the same building where the Whip can be found and is first accessed by walking atop the western walls at the back of the castle from the "Behind the Castle" Site of Grace. There is a building to the left with a blue roof. Jump onto this roof and then down to the cliffs below. Follow the cliffs southeast until you return onto a section of the castle with a square opening. Descend into the opening by using the wooden beams below. The stone can be found on a corpse on one of these wooden beams.

name: Larval Tear - 1x Limgrave Bear Drop
description: Key item used for Rebirth. Obtained by defeating a regular Noble enemy, that transforms into a Lesser Rune Bear. If you kill the Bear form a larval tear will drop.

name: Smithing Stone [5] - 6x Old Altus Tunnel
description: Upgrade Material. A total of 6 can be found in the Old Altus Tunnel:The first is found by the wall to the right of the first storage shed you encounter.In the main chamber with the wooden walkways, head to the right and climb the ladder into a smaller cavern with a storage shed. Check the cavity in the wall concealed by explosive barrels to find the second one.Back on the wooden walkways, take the path to the left of the ladder to find the third stone by the wall.The fourth one is in the bottom of the main chamber, by a wall in the east side.In the same area, check the space between the southern shed and the wall for the fifth stone.In the same area, go behind the northern shed and follow the tunnel to a small cavern to find the sixth stone.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [6] - 2x Old Altus Tunnel
description: Upgrade Material. Two are found inside the Old Altus Tunnel:When entering the main chamber with the wooden walkways, head to the right and climb up the ladder to a small cavern. Check to the left of the storage shed to find the stone. You may need to crouch/roll to get into the opening.The second stone is found in the bottom level of the main chamber, behind the southern shed.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [5] - Old Altus Tunnel
description: Upgrade Material. Found at the bottom of the main chamber. Head behind the northern storage shed and follow the tunnel to a small cavern where you can find the stone.

name: Somber Smithing Stone [4] - Old Altus Tunnel
description: Upgrade Material. Found at the bottom of the main chamber, on a corpse inside the northern storage shed.

name: Rileigh the Idle
description: One of the assassination targets for the Volcano Manor questline. Drops Crepus's Vial, a Rune Arc and a Furlcalling Finger Remedy upon defeat.

name: Ash of War Scarab
description: Head Armor. Found on a corpse in the broken bridge leading from Stormveil Castle to the Divine Tower of Limgrave. After the three golems, continue on without taking the waygate and drop down to find the item.

name: Nomadic Merchant's Set
description: Full Armor Set. In the hidden tunnels behind the altar in Mohg, the Omen's boss room at the Cathedral of the Forsaken Site of Grace in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds below Leyndell, Royal Capital. After opening the secret passage behind the altar and taking the stairs down, after crossing the narrow fallen rafter, directly to the left is a tent and in the far corner you can find the full Nomadic Merchant's set.To get access to the set, you need to destroy tent by either aggroing the enemy close by, leading it next to the tent and baiting its frenzy attack onto it or quit-outing while standing very close to tent itself.

Once you get raised on the platform, take on the long and narrow path, after a few meters you will be greeted by this enemy. kill him to obtain the Alabastrer Lord's Sword.

description: Site of Grace that spawns after defeating Mohg, Lord of Blood.

name: Inverted Hawk Heater Shield
description: Southwest of Siofra River Bank site, up a hill and past 3 enemies on a body.

name: Frenzied's Cookbook [2]
description: Frenzied's Cookbook [2] Is found nearest to the Cathedral of the+Forsaken Site of Grace in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds below Leyndell, Royal Capital. Behind the altar in Mohg, the Omen boss room is a hidden path which can be opened by walking up to the altar behind the chest after the boss fight. Following the the hidden path, there are stairs down and will lead to collapsed rafters that you can cross; you can cross the path and follow the stairs down for a safer route, or drop directly below on second set of collapsed rafters. On the second set of rafters, you will need to drop down to the lowest set of them, and you will find Frenzied's Cookbook [2] on a sitting corpse.

name: Immunizing Horn Charm +1
description: Found in the Lake of Rot by killing the Ancestral follower SE of the Lake of Rot Shore Grace

name: Prince of Death Cyst
description: Dropped by a Runebear, fiound in a cave behind a waterfall

name: Clayman Ashes
description: Located on a corpse in Ainsel River, Lake of Liurnia which is south from the Uhl Palace Ruins. Easiest way to reach these is ashes is while doing Ranni's questline (the portal you enter from Renna's Rise will take you near the ashes). After entering Ainsel River proceed south along the tunnel entering into the next main room with enemies, proceed southwest while hugging the edge until you can find some Clayman walking about, after disposing them look for the corpse near the corner of the area by the top of a waterfall.

name: Elden Stars
description: Head west from the Great Waterfall Crest grace until you reach some roots. From there look to the north-west to see a root going up to a cave and follow it. Enter the cave and fight through the packs of Giant Ant until the end and  you'll find Elden Stars on a body facing the cave exit.

name: Golden Seed - Mohgwyn Palace
description: Found in the middle of the lakes, near the massive birds.

name: Golden Seed - Ainsel River
description: Take the elevator west from the north part of Nokstella to access this location.

name: Larval Tear
description: Dropped by a Silver Tear disguised as a large inanimate ball on the bridge.

name: Fia's Mist
description: Obtained by defeating Fia's Champions in Deeproot Depths. After unlocking the Across the Roots Grace, head north and defeat the boss.

name: Oracle Bubbles
description: Can be found by killing one of the Teardrop Scarab on top of a broken statue in the first structure on the right from the Siofra River Deep Wells site of grace. You have to go through some ruins and jump on top of them and follow them over to another side where there is a Teardrop Scarab down below. Kill he Scarab to get this spell

name: Ghost Glovewort [2]
description: You can found one near tothe ledge in southern Uhl Palace Ruins.

name: Golden Rune [3]
description: You can found one near tothe ledge in southern Uhl Palace Ruins.

name: D's Twin Brother
description: NPC, D's twin brother can be found at Nekron, Eternal City, east of the Great Waterfall Basin grace.

name: Nox Flowing Hammer
description: From the Night Sacred Ground Site of Grace in Nokron, go up the stairs to your right. You should find yourself in a room with a Nox Monk and a Silver Tear Ball. Slay these enemies, then ascend a ladder to the back right of the room. Go down the path to the right of the Altar to where you see a Gargoyle Fog Wall. Turn right about halfway down the hallway and you should see a Roof Path out a window with a single Tear Slime. Head to the shingled section of the roof to find a single, unbarred window. Jump through that window to find the Nox Flowing Hammer.

name: Baleful Shadow
description: Through the cave south of the Nokstella Waterfall Basin Site of Grace.

name: Smithing Stone [5] - Grand Cloister

name: Greathorn Hammer
description: Dropped by Ancestral Follower located in  Siofra River

name: Ghostflame Torch
description: Ghostflame Torch can be found on a body at Nokron, Eternal City. To find it, you must start from the beginning of Nokron, Eternal City, entering from the Meteorite Crater. Once you get to the first set of rooves in Nokron, you will see a derelict tower off to the right of the roof ramp. You will need to jump from the ramp to the tower to reach torch. There is no other way to reach the Ghostflame Torch if you proceed to the lower roof platforms of Nokron. There is no way back up except to start over from the Crater again.

name: Lichdragon Fortissax
description: Multiple Bossfight. Massive four-winged black dragon with powerful lightning attack. Defeating it is required to finish Fia's questline and to unlock the "Age of Duskborn" ending. Fought alongside Fia's Champions, Sorcerer Rogier and Lionel the Lionhearted.

description: Can be found at Nokron, Eternal City on a dead body suspended in the waters of the river

name: Preserving Boluses
description: Siofra River Well In the second section after taking the lift again, a body inside a building structure will contain this item.

name: Arteria Leaf
description: Can be found at Siofra River Well, on a dead body at a campsite under the bridge

name: Old Fang
description: Can be found at Siofra River Well on a dead body hanging over the edge of the cliff

name: Trina's Lily
description: Can be found at Siofra River Well just on the lower level of the plateau.

name: Celestial Dew - Night's Sacred Ground
description: Celestial Dew found within Night's Sacred Ground, behind one of the buildings southwest of the Ancestral Woods Site of Grace.

name: Celestial Dew - Nokstella, Eternal City
description: Found North of the Nokstella, Eternal City Site of Grace, next to some snails.

name: Numen's Rune - x5 - Deeproot Depths
description: Dropped by the Queen Ants, within the small cave you can access by one of the branches.

name: Golden Rune (13) - Siofra River
description: Found at the end of the fractured bridge.

name: Golden Rune (7) - North Siofra River
description: Behind the wall on the platform.

name: Golden Rune (7) - South Siofra River
description: Held by a corpse near the Mimic Tear Boss.Held by a corpse next to the Stake of Marika

name: Golden Rune (4) - Hallowhorn Grounds
description: Held by a corpse near the Giant Land Octopus.

name: Golden Rune (4) - Nokron Bridge
description: Located at the bridge.

name: Golden Rune (4) - South Siofra River
description: Held by a corpse within the stairs.

name: Golden Rune (3) - Hallowhorn Grounds
description: Held by a corpse near a tree.

name: Golden Rune (3) - Nokron, Eternal City
description: Held by a corpse laying against a column.

name: Golden Rune (6) - Hallowhorn Grounds
description: Underneath the staircase leading to Hallowhorn Grounds.

name: Golden Rune (6) - x2 - Nokron, Eternal City
description: Held by a corpse within the structure before reaching the Nokron Site of Grace.On a dead body near a Teardrop Scarab.

name: Golden Rune (2) - Nokron, Eternal City
description: Held by a corpse within the stream.

name: Golden Rune (5) - Nokron Access
description: Held by a corpse on the way down from Mistwood. Note that the Radahn Bossfight must be completed prior to the crater to appear.

name: Golden Rune (10) - Lake of Rot
description: Beside the Dragonkin Soldier Boss.Held by a corpse within the Lake of Rot.Back of a large structure

name: Golden Rune (9) - Lake of Rot
description: Held by a corpse within the ruins.

name: Great Waterfall Crest
description: Site of grace, directly after leaving the resting coffin.

name: Staff of the Avatar
description: Staff dropped by a Lesser Erdtree Avatar.

name: Ghost Glovewort (4)
description: Found on the hill, near a yellowish small tree.

name: Ash of War: Golden Land
description: Dropped from a  Teardrop Scarab

name: Godfrey, First Elden Lord
description: Legend Type BossLocated in the chamber atop the long set of stairs southeast of the Queen's Bedchamber Site of Grace where Morgott was previously fought. Mid-battle, Godfrey assumes the role of Hoarah Loux, Warrior.

name: Leyndell, Ashen Capital
description: An instance of Leyndell, Royal Capital after it falls into ruins. This version of the capital is accessible only after making significant story progress and features the same structures and landmarks as its intact counterpart, albeit altered in slight or significant ways.

name: Leyndell, Capital of Ash
description: Site of Grace within the obliterated city.

name: Capital Rampart
description: Site of grace at the Ashen Capital's rampart.

name: Auriza Hero's Grave
description: Site of Grace within Auriza Hero's Grave.

name: Crimson Amber Medallion
description: Crimson Amber Medallion +2. Held by a corpse hanging over one of the wooden beams on your way down.

name: East Capital Rampart
description: Site of Grace at the East side of Leyndell.

name: Underground Roadside
description: Site of Grace found underground within Subterranean Shunning-Grounds.

name: Leyndell Catacombs
description: Site of Grace within Leyndell Catacombs.

name: Ghost Glovewort (6) - Leyndell Catacombs
description: Beyond the stairs southeast of the door leading to the Bossfight, in front of a statue guarded by Skeletons.

name: Crucible Scale Talisman
description: Within the chapel accessed by using one of the flame throwing sculptures as a lift. Located next to the statue guarded by an Omen.

name: Grave Glovewort (9) - Leyndell Catacombs
description: Located within Leyndell Catacombs, in one of the main halls with a large statue. Guarded by an Omen.

name: Grave Glovewort (8) - x2 - Leyndell Catacombs
description: The first Grave Glovewort [8] is found over the central grave in one of the main halls. The second one is in front of a large statue following the stairs southeast from the first Grave Glovewort.

name: Witch-Hunter Jerren (Second Location)
description: Witch-Hunter Jerren appears here while progressing through the Sorceress Sellen questline. He may be first encountered in Castle Redmane after the defeat of Starscourge Radahn.

name: Flame Peak
description: Flame Peak is found in the Mountaintops of the Giants region.

name: Leyndell Soldier Ashes
description: Found in Sainted Hero's Grave in Altus Plateau. After a floor collapsed, make your way back up and retrieve from a corpse.

name: Smithing Stone (2) - Lakeside Crystal Cave
description: Smithing Stone (4) and Smithing Stone (2) are Looted from two corpses on one of the lower levels of the Lakeside Crystal Cave, just before the fog gate.
